1.content:
One morning, Kari woke up after a dream about walking through a town made of balloons.

"Wonder what that was all about?" she wondered out loud.

"Good morning, Kari." a voice said.

"Oh, morning Gatomon." Kari replied.

Gatomon is Kari's digimon partner, a catlike digimon with razor-sharp claws.

"What are we going to do today, Kari?"

Kari thought...
1.title: The day starts...

choices: walking into a strange flower patch!
about to enter a strange factory...
11.content: "Let's go to the digiworld," smiled Kari, before she and Gatomon headed for Kari's computer. Later, at the digital world, Kari was exploring, not realizing that she was...
11.title: At Digiworld

111.content:
Kari felt a presence behind her... she turned around and was greeted by the sight of a Madpuffymon! The Madpuffymon shot a tube out of its arm that went straight into Kari's mouth...

"PUMP IT UP!" the Madpuffymon yelled, before sending a highly pressurized blast of helium down the tube...
111.title: Madpuffymon attacks...

1111.content: Kari could feel air fill and swell up her body, causing her body to expand. Her belly and butt grew in width, and her limbs begun to sink into her flesh. She kept growing until she was the size of a house, in the shape of an orb. Madpuffymon laughed and tied a cord around Kari's ankle. Kari was then dragged to...
1111.title: Kari the Blimp

choices: Gatomon was ambushed by another Madpuffymon
11112.content:
The Madpuffymon took the Kari-balloon to a cave... many more Madpuffymon awaited them inside...

Gatomon had noticed Kari was missing. "Kari must have wandered off somewhere without me..." She decided to look around for Kari... until...
11112.title: Meanwhile...

111121.content: Gatomon quickly digivolved into Angewomon, but several Madpuffymon tackled her down, and one stuffed his arm tube in her mouth. He then proceeded to blow her up...
111121.title: Angewomon's Turn

1111211.content:
Angewomon quickly blimped into a near-spherical shape, roughly the size of a hot-air balloon. A Madpuffymon tied a cord to Angewomon's ankle, and the group of Madpuffymon dragged her to the cave...

When Kari saw the bloated Angewomon, she said "Don't tell me they got you too..."

"What are they going to do with us?" Angewomon asked?
1111211.title: Trapped by the Madpuffymon

choices: Kari and Angewomon grow even bigger
11112111.content: The Madpuffymon then came back and said, "We're simply going to make you even bigger..." and two of them forced their air pumps into Kari and Angewomon's mouth. They then began forcing air into their mouths...
11112111.title: Blimping Up More

choices: the rest of the digidestined show up
111121111.content:
Kari and Angewomon got bigger and bigger, larger and larger, rounder and rounder.
they got so big that they are the size of plantets (the small kind).
Their feet started to swell up as the size of very large trucks.
Then their hands started to swell up as the size of small cars.
They got bigger until.....
111121111.title: larger than life

choices: The other digidestined are inflated like she is.
1111211111.content:
Kari had to admit, as fun as being a balloon was, she felt a little embarassed. She watched the Madpuffymon below her, scurrying and fiddling about. She craned her neck as much as she could and saw that they were taking Angewomon away into another room, then she felt a tug at her foot and realized that two of her captors had tied a rope around her foot and were leading her away as well!

Kari's head bumped along the ceiling as the Madpuffymon led their digidestined blimp into a giant empty cavern. It was easily twenty times as big as she was, and there were posts along the walls, like the kind you would tie a horse to. The Madpuffymon tied Kari to one of the posts and scampered off again. For a moment, Kari just floated there for a moment and thought. She was a very strange sight to behold, an enormous ball the size of a small planet that was pink and white on its top half and yellow on the bottom. She would've been completely round if not for her almost microscopic head on top and her extreamly swollen hands and feet. Kari tried to stretch out her limbs, but that only led to another problem. The sound of the tearing of fabric filled the air for a split seccond and Kari's gloves, socks, and shoes fell off in shreds.

"Oh great!" Kari thought to herself. "First I get turned into the next Goodyear blimp, then I get seperated from Angewomon, and now I've torn my favorite gloves and I'm barefoot. What else could happen today?"

The other Digidestined were brought in.

"Oh yeah. My friends could be brought in and I could just die of embarasment!"
1111211111.title: The gang's all here.

choices: A ballooned Sora came bounding to greet them
11112112.content:
The Madpuffymon came and led Kari and Angewomon, the living balloons, away... when they finally stopped...

"Angewomon, what is this place?" Kari was confused.

"This looks like Balloonburg... it's the town where almost everything is inflated..." Angewomon replied...

The Madpuffymon left Kari and Angewomon inside the town, and left.

"Looks like we're on our own. At least we're not floating away..." Kari said. Suddenly...
11112112.title: Balloonburg, the Town of Balloons

choices: More Madpuffymon come with helium tanks
111121121.content:
"Oh, I see you guys have been blown up too," said Sora to Angewomon and Kari.

"Where's Biyomon?" asked Angewomon, before Sora responded, "I don't know. One minute I was with her, the next I'm the new Goodyear Blimp," It was then...
111121121.title: At Balloonburg

choices: Angewomon starts reverting to her Gatomon form
1111211212.content:
Suddenly, a bunch of Madpuffymon dragged Biyomon through the gate. Biyomon was also inflated, just like Kari, Angewomon, and Sora were.

"Don't tell me they got you too..." Sora said.
"Yep..." Biyomon said.

"You know, this actually feels pretty nice..." Kari said.
"I agree." Angewomon said.

"Yeah, but it's hard to move like this..." Sora said.

Suddenly...
1111211212.title: Enter Biyomon, and a realization

11112112121.content:
Angewomon's body glowed as she returned back to her Gatomon form. Due to how huge Angewomon was, Gatomon now resembled just a huge white balloon with her paws, legs and tail sunken into her huge body leaving just her head.

"W-Wow! Gatomon you're massive!" Kari exclaimed, as Gato giggled.

"Y-Yeah! An ya know, this feels even better!" She replied, giving content purrs "Being so enormous isn't all bad~"

"Hehe, well glad you're having fun" Sora added "But, what are we gonna do now?"
11112112121.title: Angewomon starts reverting to her Gatomon form

11112112122.content: "Hey guys, there's a helium tank over there! If we blow ourselves up with that, we can simply float away and escape!" smiled Biyomon, before she bounced over and grabbed the hose with her beak. She dragged it over and placed it in Angewomon's mouth, and one by one, the girls were inflated.
11112112122.title: Escape From Balloonburg

choices: Kari asks to go back to Balloonburg
111121121221.content:
The girls and digimon started floating up and out of Balloonburg... Kari was starting to have second thoughts, however...

<I liked being there...> Kari thought to herself. <Maybe...>
111121121221.title: Kari thinks...

1111211212211.content: Instead can we go back? said Kari. The others then say...
1111211212211.title: Going back

11112112122111.content:
"You want to go back"?! said Sora. "Well being a balloon looks kinder fun a I like to be one forever" said Kari. "Kari is right" said Gatomon. "Even if we like it how are we surppose to go back" said Biyomon.

Suddenly...
11112112122111.title: Have to go back

1111211212212.content: Kari decides to keep quiet, knowing she could always come back later in the future. The girls keep floating until...
1111211212212.title: Out of Balloonburg

choices: The still-inflated girls decide to explore the town
11112112122122.content:
Suddenly, there is a blinding flash and the girls black out. When they awaken, they find that they have been returned to Balloonburg.

"We might as well get used to being here... it seems something's keeping us here..." Sora said.

"It's probably a sort of safety net to keep the people who live here from floating away and getting lost..." Kari said.
11112112122122.title: No escape...?

111121121221221.content: The girls bounce around, looking through Balloonburg for answers. Suddenly, a Madpuffymon comes by with a clipboard and says, "These will be your new duties,"
111121121221221.title: Exploring Around

choices: Sora fills in for a broken hot-air balloon
1111211212212211.content:
Kari read the list.

"Let's see... one of us has to test the compressed helium cylinders for defects... another of us has to fill in for a broken-down hot-air balloon ride for non-inflatable guests to the town... the remaining two have to see the town's leader about... citizenship?" Kari said. "Well, I guess I can test the helium." she said

"I'll go fill in for the hot-air balloon ride..." Sora said.

"I guess that leaves us to go see the town leader..." Angewomon said.

[Pick a scene...]
1111211212212211.title: Duty calls... (not like that)

11112112122122111.content: Kari is rolled over to helium testing, and is presented with two different tanks. "Tank A is slightly different than Tank B. We want you to test the efficiency of each one," said a Madpuffymon, before Kari decides to test...
11112112122122111.title: Testing

choices: Kari is deflated and continues with Tank B
Meanwhile, at the broken-down hot-air balloon ride...
111121121221221111.content:
"I think I'll try Tank A first." Kari said.

"Then what are you waiting for?" a Madpuffymon asked.

A tube shot from the top of the helium tank into Kari's mouth. The flow of helium started and as such, Kari swelled with it...

By the time the tank was finished, Kari was almost completely round and as huge as a 2-story house... A Madpuffymon tied her down.

"Well..." Kari said in a noticably higher tone of voice... I guess that one works..."
111121121221221111.title: A it is.

1111211212212211111.content:
She begins the test for tank B. Kari puts the hose on the tank into her mouth, then turns the dial. Her belly puffs up until her belly is the size of a beach ball.

Kari looks down at her belly, then looks up. "I think this one is broken." she says.

Then...
1111211212212211111.title: Testing Tank B.

choices: Angewomon and Biyomon are visiting the leader
1111211212212211112.content: Sora was having a tube placed in her mouth and was being pumped up. Her body swelled and swelled until she was completely round, and several cords were tied to her. Meanwhile...
1111211212212211112.title: Sora The Balloon

choices: And now, the city hall with Angewomon and Biyomon...
11112112122122111121.content:
Mimi stood outside the town of balloons, staring at it, curious.

"What is this place...?" she wondered. "...Hmm... I'm hungry..." she noticed.

She saw a tree with fruits on it that looked delicious, but what she didn't see was the Madpuffymon hiding in a bush that had planted the tree...

Mimi got a fruit from the tree and ate the whole thing... she patted her full belly. "That was delicious! So filling... and filling... and... filling?" Air hissed from her belly. "Aah! I'm blowing up like a balloon!" she squealed as she swelled up, quickly rounding out. She started to float, and the Madpuffymon leaped out of the bush, tied a cord to Mimi's ankle to keep her from floating away, and took her to Balloonburg...
11112112122122111121.title: Mimi Blows Up

111121121221221111211.content:
Angewomon and Biyomon bounce around the city hall, looking for the mayor of Balloon Burg.

"Maybe he's out for lunch," suggested Biyomon.

"That's a good idea, let's check the cafeteria," smiled Angewomon, before the two bloated digimon bounced off for the cafeteria. On the way, they pass by several balloon and non-balloon type citizens. At the cafeteria...
111121121221221111211.title: Looking For the Mayor

1111211212212211112112.content:
The two digimon bounce into the cafeteria and look around, but no matter where they look, they can't find the mayor.

"Hum...maybe we should just wait at his office until he gets back..." said Angewomon.

Biyomon nods in agreement. "Right. Let's wait. He's got to come back some time."

Meanwhile, as they head back to the office...
1111211212212211112112.title: He's Not Here.

11112112122122111121122.content: Mimi was taken to the town square and then dropped off. She looked around. "Where am I? And why is everything here a balloon?" Mimi wonders. "I think I'll just walk...er...hop around until I find something..." she says, as she begins to explore the strange town.
11112112122122111121122.title: Mimi in Balloonburg.

111121121221221111211221.content:
Bouncing around town, Mimi came upon a somewhat large building. Above the main entrance was a sign saying "Helium Tank Factory" in bold letters.

"Why would there be a factory for just one thing?" Mimi asked aloud. Curious, she entered the building. Inside, she met up with a Digimon she had never seen before.

"Hello." The Digimon, a Madpuffymon, said. "I didn't know we' be getting more help today."

"Help? What do you mean help?" Mimi inquired. "I don't even know where, or why, I am right now."

"Oh. Well, follow me and I'll explain everything."

Not having many choices, Mimi followed the Digimon.

"You're in a town called Balloonburg, a place where almost everyone and everything is inflated." The Madpuffymon said.

"I noticed." Mimi stated.

"Hm? Oh right, of course you did." The Madpuffymon said. "Well, being a Digidestined, you must've heard about Chimeramon, right?"

"Well, yes, I got an email about it, but how did you know I was a Digidestined?"

The Madpuffymon chuckled. "Good gossip, how else?"

"Oh." Mimi said. Then the realization dawned on her. "I guess this place was hit by Chimeramon."

The Madpuffymon nodded. "We rebuilt the town, but most of the populace felt unsafe, even after everything was restored. To keep the town going, the mayor recently decided to bring some of the Digidestined in to see the town and get a feel for the place. But since they might not have come of their own free will, different measures were taken."

"Well, I see your point there." Mimi said, remembering when she was inflated. "So some of my friends are here too?"

"Well," The Madpuffymon said, coming to a halt. "We're here on the testing floor so why don't you see for yourself?"

Mimi looked around and spotted Kari and called her name.

"Mimi!" Kari exclaimed as Mimi walked over to her. "They got you too, huh?"

Mimi nodded. "I guess you can't get away from everything, can you?"

"I don't mean to break up the reunion, but we still need to test the other tanks." The Madpuffymon interjected. "We have two ready for testing."

"I guess I can help out." Mimi said.

"Okay, then you'll have to be deflated so that the tests are accurate." A Madpuffymon said.

After Mimi was deflated, she was given two choices. One was tank C, which was built to vent gas faster than A or B. Another was tank a new version of tank A. Tank C was just as big as A or B were, it just had a different nozzle. Tank A ver. 2 was as tall as Mimi, but twice as wide as she was. Kari told Mimi how big she had gotten when she tested tank A, making Mimi a little nervous.

'If I take the big one, I could pop.' Mimi thought. 'But if I take the smaller one, Kari'll get stuck with the big one. What tank should I pick?'
111121121221221111211221.title: Mimi Tachikawa'a balloon factory (You know whe

1111211212212211112112211.content:
"I'll take tank A!" says Kari.

Mimi looks shocked. "Kari! Are you insane?"

Kari shakes her head. "I just don't want you to get the large one before you had some more experience." she says.

"But you could end up popping, Kari!" Mimi says.

Kari nods. "Better me than you." she says.

"I guess so...be careful, Kari." Mimi says, as she is hooked up to Tank C. Next, Kari is hooked up to tank A.

"Alright...begin the test." says one of the Madpuffymon.

The tanks activate simultaneously. The two girls puff up like balloons, Mimi going much faster than Kari. Their bellies start inflating, then the rest of them rounds out.

Within a minute, Mimi's tank had ran out, leaving her around 20 feet wide. She looks over at Kari, who is only one forth that size at the moment.

"I hope she get's through it alright. She's got a long way to go." Mimi says to herself.
1111211212212211112112211.title: Testing...

1111211212212211112112212.content:
"I guess I'll try tank A." Mimi said hesitantly.

"Mimi, are you all right?" Kari asked.

"Oh I'm just fine Kari." Mimi said reassuringly.

Placing her mouth over tank A's nozzle, Mimi braced herself for the worst.

"Ready?" The supervising Madpuffymon asked. Mimi nodded. "If you have a problem, feel free to tell me before you start. You don't have to worry about popping if that's what's bothering you."

"Hmm?" Mimi inquired.

"Yeah, the atmosphere in the Digiworld is much different than the one you're used to." The Madpuffymon said. "Plus we chemically treat the helium in the tanks to allow the tester to take in the entire contents."

Mimi exhaled quietly through her nose.

"Are you two ready to test the tanks?" The Madpuffymon asked.

The two girls gave the Digimon the go ahead, and the tanks were turned on. Kari soon blew up to twenty feet in diameter, with Mimi catching up. Kari moved from Mimi to allow her some extra room, as Mimi had reached thirty feet and widening.

Wider and wider Mimi grew, her limbs long absorbed by her girth. She grew so big that the tank itself was lifted off the floor and onto her flat, yet large chest. Mimi stared blankly as she got closer and closer to the ceiling, ignoring the cold sensation that the tank had made. Mimi kept growing until the tank was empty, leaving Mimi a full one hundred feet wide. One would have to go up to the very top of Mimi in order to not confuse her with a balloon.

"Whoa." Kari muttered quietly as the Digimon present stopped and oggled at the behemoth.
1111211212212211112112212.title: Pat, I'd like to buy a vowel.

11112112122122111121122121.content:
Sora was completing her third flight over the town, her body a 50' round hot air balloon, covered in a mesh of white ropes with a large basket underneath. As she lazily floated over the balloon buildings, she noticed a large factory. "Hm...that must be where Kari is helping out. I should pay her a visit once I finish." She thought as a strong breeze carried her back down to the landing area. The various digimon filtered out of the basket as Sora was slowly deflated.

"Thanks for all the help." A plump Madpuffymon smiled up to Sora. "You know we could always use a full-time hand around here if your interested."

"Ah, it was no problem." She giggled. It was actually pretty fun flying over the town, such a peaceful place. The more she thought about it, the more she felt like this was where she truly belonged. "I'd like that a lot, but right now I really should check on my friend."

The Madpuffymon nods, adjusting Sora's deflation till she's 8' wide and floating a foot off the ground. "I see, in that case, take this." He takes a large red and white sticker from a box near him and sticks it onto her bellybutton. "This is a Transport patch. It'll mark you as a fully employed transport blimp around here, should also make traveling around a bit easier."

Sora smiles, noticing that she was fully able to control where she's moving. "Wow, thank you! This is pretty great." She kisses him on the head as she floats down the street. It doesn't take long for her to reach the large helium factory when she hears a loud PFfffft noise, and through the windows of one of the large warehouses she sees a pink ball swelling up. "Wow...Kari must be getting pretty huge." She giggles as she floats though a set of double doors.

"Oh, hey Sora, finished already?" Kari smiled as she looked to the swollen digidestined. Sora looked over and blinked as she saw the 20' round ball of Kari.

"Huh? Kari if you're here...Then what's that?" Sora marveled up at the enormous 100' pink sphere. She floated up to the very peak to see Mimi's smiling face. She had a very peaceful look on her puffy face as Sora touches her belly against her side. "Wow...Mimi you've gotten huge! But how?"

Mimi yawned as she looked over. "Hmm? oh Heehee, I guess I have kinda let myself go." She giggles. "It was one of those helium tanks down there." She pats her body with her puffy hand. "Thats some pretty great stuff, you want some?"

Sora thought about it for a minute. "Hmm...if I was this big, I bet I could be the best blimp ever! I should definitely convince the girls to get jobs here too."
11112112122122111121122121.title: Sora gets a job

choices: Kari wants to be a permanent blimp also.
11112112122122111121122122.content:
Kari wobbled around as the Madpuffymon removed the hose from her mouth, her 20' wide body just barely able to move as she starred up at the gigantic balloon that was her friend Mimi. The girl floated inches from the celing as a pair of ropes were tossed around her back, rolling her down closer to the ground. Her head was stretched out wide and puffy, cheeks swollen huge as she came face to face with Kari. "Ooohheehe..This feels...soo incredible! I wish we had discovered this place sooner." Kari nodded happily as she rubbed her round body, slowly deflating out her mouth bit by bit as a Madpuffymon in a lab coat moved closer.

"It looks like the test was a complete success, at least for you Kari." He poked her middle as he slowly turned toward Mimi. "However miss, I'm afraid there was a slight...miscalculation."

"Miscaluwhat?" Mimi raised an eyebrow, genuinely confused.

"Yes, it seems the specially treated helium has bonded with your body. I'm afraid you're going to be stuck at this size forever. You can grow larger, but never smaller."

Kari gave her friend a worried look. "Oh Mimi...I..."

"Y-you mean...I'm stuck like this..." The gigantic blimp girl smiled. "That's Great!" She giggled as she wobbled side to side a bit. "I don't mind in the slightest, being so big feels amazing!"

"Oh..well, I'm happy if you're happy." Kari giggled.

"Yep! So happy in fact..."
11112112122122111121122122.title: Let's see the others recover

111121121221221111211222.content:
Meanwhile, above the streets of Balloonburg, Sora was on the return trip of the ride.

'I have to admit, this place isn't so bad.' Sora thought. Now that she though about it, this was the first time since the escape attempt that she had been so high up in a town or a city, and didn't have to deal with traffic sounds, people, or even a stray Digimon. This was totally different, this was serene, peaceful.

'I wonder why those strange Digimon felt it was best to jump me, as well as the others, if they didn't mean any harm.' This thought would have to wait, as Sora saw the site of the balloon ride not too far from her.

-----

After the ride had ended, Sora was fully deflated so that she could get a drink or anything else she needed. After freshening up, Sora decided to see what was wrong with the ride to begin with. She walked up to a Madpuffymon who had introduced himself as the Maintainence Chief prior to her ride.

"Excuse me." Sora said politely. The Madpuffymon turned his head back to Sora.

"Yes? how may I help you?"

"I'm curious, what was wrong with the balloon ride to begin with?" Sora asked.

"Hmm?" Oh, that, the burner wasn't igniting for some reason." The Chief said. "You can't have a hot air balloon without heat."

"Oh, I see." Sora said. "Thank you. Is it okay if leave to check up on my friends?"

The Madpuffymon thought about it. "Yeah, I found what was wrong with the burner, so you can go. Or you can stay and work the next ride if you want."

"No thank you." Sora said with a small laugh.

-----

Walking out onto a sidewalk, Sora wondered where she should go first.
111121121221221111211222.title: Shift's over

choices: Check on the Digimon and Mimi
1111211212212211112112221.content:
"Hum...I wonder how Kari is doing." Sora thinks to herself. She decides to head to the factory to find out for herself.

Sora arrives at the factory and walk in. She doesn't have to walk in that far to find Kari, who's finished with her shift. Kari is inflated, but not that much. She looks like a balloon with limbs and a head. Her body has been inflated to about one and a half feet.

"Hiya, Sora. Isn't this place great?" Kari asks.

"Yea, it is. I wish Mimi was here, though." Sora says.

Kari chuckles. "She was, but she left a little while ago to check on Biyomon and Angewomon."

Sora nods and smiles. "That's great! Now we can all be together!" Sora exclaims.

Kari nods. "Yea. Anyway, you wanna do anything now that we're off work?" Kari asks.
1111211212212211112112221.title: Checking on Kari.

1111211212212211112112222.content:
"Biyomon and Angewomon must have found the mayor by now. I'll just go over to the town hall and check on them." Sora says to herself.

At the town hall, Sora goes up to a random Madpuffymon. "Hello? Have you seen a couple of digimon that don't look like normal citizens?" she asks.

"You mean the pink balloon bird and the angel? Yea, they just went in with the mayor." he nods, the points in the direction of the mayor's office.

Sora smiles. "Thanks." she says, and walks in the direction he pointed.

In front of the mayor's office, Sora walks up to the secretary, who happens to be a diffrent balloon digimon. "Hi, do you have an appointment?" says the secretary.

Sora shakes her head. "No, a couple of my friends are in the mayor's office. I wanted to check up on them."

The secretary looks at her. "Oh, you're one of the Digidestined, right? Then by all means, go in." Sora turns to go in, but the secretary stops her.

"Wait, you can't go in there like that. You have to be round, first. Then you can go in." the secretary pulls out an air pump.

Sora shrugs. "When in Rome..." she says, before putting the hose in her mouth.

The secretary turns on the pump. "Don't worry, it'll stop when you are completely round." says the secretary, as Sora inflates. In a mintue, Sora had finished swelling up into a ball-like form. The pump shuts of a second later.

"There, now you can go see the mayor." says the secretary.

Sora nods, and hops into the room.

Sora walks in and shuts the door. Biyomon and Angewoman turn towards the door. "Sora! Glad you could make it!" says Biyomon.

The mayor, who looks like a larger version of the Madpuffymon, looks at her. "Ah, so you really are the partners of the Digidestined. For a second there, I thought you might have been lying to me."

Angewomon turns to Sora. "We've been having trouble getting citizenship. You see, outsiders have to have a something else going for them besides being inflatable." says Angewomon.

The mayor nods. "Yea, and now that I know these girls are with you, I won't have trouble getting that worked out." the mayor hovers over to Sora. "Now, just get your friend Kari over here, and we can get you all set up."

Sora thinks for a second. "What exactly happens when we get citizenship? Do we have to spend the rest of our lives here?" she says.

The mayor shakes his head. "No, that just means you can stay as long as you like, and you won't get the same treatment you got when you first came here. Of course, you can get inflated if you ask. Also... if you DO want to stay here for the rest of your life, we can arrange for that. Not that you have to." says the mayor.

<Hmm... stay here?> Sora said. <You know, being a balloon actually is pretty cool... and I could be a balloon forever... but...> Sora became lost in thought.

"Sora?" Biyomon tried to get Sora's attention..
1111211212212211112112222.title: Meeting the Mayor... and a choice

11112112122122111121122221.content:
Sora thought for a moment. Sora suddenly smiles. "I've decided to become a permanent resident." she says.

The Mayor nods and snaps his fingers. Suddenly, a wall raises and two Madpuffymon float in. They pick up Sora and carry her into where they came from.

"Ok, what exactly is going to happen to me?" Sora asks.

One of the Madpuffymon chuckles. "Don't worry, you'll find out soon enough..." he says. Suddenly, he injects something into Sora's arm. Within seconds, Sora is fast asleep.

---

A while later, Sora wakes up. Takes a look at herself and notices that her skin is completely red. Her clothes look the same as they did before she blacked out, but they were shiny, as was her skin. Her hair is still the same color it has always been, only it's shiny too.

A Madpuffymon smiles. "Do you like it?" he says.

Sora nods. "Yea, but I thought I was going to be a bit rounder."

"Don't worry, that'll be taken care of in a few moments." The Madpuffymon points toward a door. "Just go in there. That's where you'll get inflated."

Sora nods and walks into the room. There, she meets another Madpuffymon. "Ok...let's see..." he says, as he uses a tape measure to check Sora's height. "...you're about...four feet and six inches."

Sora looks confused. "Why are you getting my height?"

The Madpuffymon laughs a little. "So I can make you as wide as you are tall. That will be your default roundness. You can get bigger than that, but not any smaller. In other words, after this, you'll never be able to deflate lower than four feet and six inches round. Don't ask me how, it's all very complex."

Sora imagines herself at that size. "I'm fine with that." Sora says.

---

Kari and Mimi are headed toward the town hall. "I hope Biyomon and Angewomon have gotten everything settled." Kari says, as they approach the door. Suddenly, the door burst open, knocking Kari and Mimi a few feet back. They both look up and see Sora.

"Sora, is that you?" Mimi asks.

Sora nods. "Yea! I've got great news! Me and Biyomon are now permanent citizens!" she says.

As if on cue, Biyomon floats out of the town hall. "Hello, girls!" she says.(For the record, the skin of the digimon are the same color as it usually is.)

Kari can't help but be amazed at what she say. Then, Kari runs up to Sora. "That looks cool! Do you think they would let me become a permanent citizen too?" Kari says, thinking about being a balloon as well.

Mimi's jaw drops. "Kari! What about your friends and family?"

Kari giggles. "I can see them anytime. Although I would proabally freak them out." she says. "So, can I?"

Sora nods. "You, me, and Mimi can be citizens."

"What about Angewomon?" Kari says. Just then, Gatomon floats out, inflated the same way as Biyomon and Sora were. "I perferred being a kitty balloon." Gatomon says. Kari giggles.

"What are we waiting for, Sora? Let's go!" Kari says, running into the town hall.

Sora floats over to Mimi. "So, what about you?" Sora asks.

"Let me think about it..." Mimi says.

Sora smiles, and the girls walk/float inside.

The group go up to the mayor's office. "Hi, did our friend run in here a moment ago?" Mimi asks to the secretary

"If you mean the cute little girl in the yellow shirt, she did pass throught here, and I believe she is already in the process of becoming a citizen." says the secretary. "And what about you? Do you want to be a citizen?"

Before Mimi can answer, Kari, now a balloon as well, floats in. Her skin is light pink. Like Sora, her clothes are the same color as they have always been.

Kari smiles. "This is great!" she exclaims.

The secretary nods. "I'm gald your happy."

Kari turns to Mimi. "So, are you going to be balloons like we are?" Kari asks.

Mimi scratches her head. "I think I..."
11112112122122111121122221.title: Here to stay.

111121121221221111211222211.content:
"Hmm..." Mimi thought for a while, before she made up her mind.

"Oh, what the heck... Balloonify me, too!" Mimi said.

"All right!" Kari, Sora, Biyomon, and Gatomon were pleased.

"Just go in there and they'll take care of everything." Kari said.

So Mimi bounced into the town hall.

---

Later, in the prep room...

"Well, before we start the process, would you like anything specific about your inflation?" the Madpuffymon on duty asked.

"Huh?" Mimi was a bit confused.

"You can choose to have normal air, helium, or a special, extra-light gas. What will it be?" the Madpuffymon asked.

Mimi thought a bit, and envisioned herself floating freely about the skies of Balloonburg.

"Extra-light, please!" Mimi said with a smile.

"Okay." The digimon made a little check mark on a clipboard. "Okay, you're ready. We'll put you to sleep now..." A poke with the syringe, and Mimi was fast asleep...
111121121221221111211222211.title: A little extra...

1111211212212211112112222111.content:
After a while, Mimi starts to come to. "Mommy...I don't wanna go to school..." Mimi says. Then, she realizes that she's floating on the ceiling.

"You said you wanted extra-light, right?" asks the Madpuffymon.

Mimi chuckles. "I guess I did...is there anyway you can get me down?"

He points to her belt. "You should be able to mentally control your altitude, movement, and speed with that belt."

Mimi looks the Madpuffymon. "How?"

The Madpuffymon chuckles. "That's like asking how to walk. Just think about moving, and you should. I gave your friends similar devices. The device is set to, by default, keep you at a certain altitude, so even if you lose consentration, you won't float off into the air. That teleportation field is not always active, you know. And without that belt, that one time would be enough to send you into space..."

"Uhm...you lost me at the part where you said the device keeps me at a fixed level..." Mimi say.

The Madpuffymon chuckles. "In short, you're so light that without that belt you would proabally never stop floating into the air."

Mimi nods. "Ah. Ok. Now, let me try moving around..."

Mimi starts to fly down to the ground. "Ah..."

Mimi suddenly start to feel a bit dizzy. "Wha..what's going on...I feel so strange." she says, as she floats back up into the air.

The Madpuffymon chuckles. "Don't worry. That's normal, since your are so light."

Mimi nods. "So...how do I get out of here. I can't stay on the ground very long."
1111211212212211112112222111.title: Lighter than a lot of things that are really light

11112112122122111121122221111.content:
Mimi noticed her reflection in a mirror and saw that her skin had turned a light shade of green.

"Wow! I'm balloonified... and green!" Mimi said.

"Indeed you are." the Madpuffymon attending to her said. "By the way, you should be able to stay on the ground if you just think about being on the ground."

"Oh, good!" Mimi said. It took her a couple of minutes, but Mimi finally got down to the ground and exited.

"You look splendid!" the mayor said. "Wait until your friends see you!
11112112122122111121122221111.title: It Isn't Motion Sickness

choices: They are looking for a house.
111121121221221111211222211111.content:
Kari and Gatomon float over to her. "Wow, you look great, Mimi." says Kari.

"Thanks, Kari." Mimi says. She then looks around for Sora and Biyomon. "Hey, where's everyone else?" asks Mimi.

"They went house hunting. They should be back soon." Kari says.

---

Sora and Biyomon...
111121121221221111211222211111.title: Fluffy Chapter.

choices: Kari and Mimi are having trouble thinking too...
Yolei has shown up in baloonburg
1111211212212211112112222111112.content:
Sora and Biyomon were floating around baloonburg day dreaming. Ever since the procedure Sora's mind had started wandering from time to time, as she floated she accidently bumped into a building and woke back up.

"Huh? what the... hey Biyomon, do you feel a little weird?"

Biyomon, who was also in a trance, snapped out of it when Sora addressed her. "Yeah, its like its becoming harder for me to concentrate, plus my memory is getting fuzzier."

Sora nodded in agreement, it was becoming harder and harder to remember anything that happened before they came to baloonburg.

"I think we should talk to the mayor" Sora said, trying to shake the cobwebs out of her head, "there might have been some side effects to this procedure he didnt mention to us before."

"Good idea, lets go."

Sora and Biyomon began to float to the mayors office, but then a strong wind blew in and started whipping them around, when it stopped, they had forgotten about going to see the mayor.

"Uhh, what were we gonna do again?" sora asked bewildered.

"I think we were looking for a house werent we?"

"yeah, lets go..." Sora said, as they floated down the street, they bumped into a large (bigger than them) blue baloon with a human face on on side.

"oh... sorry" the baloon said.

"No, my fault. Im sora, who are you?"

"Im a blimpmon, one of the denezins of baloonburg, who are you?"

"uh, I told you, Im sora."

"Oh, Im sorry, we Blimpmon dont have very good memories, most of the time we just drift around and dont think about anything."

"Oh, I understand" Sora didnt know why, but she started to feel worried.

"By the way, we just became permanent residents ourselves, we need a place to live."

the blimpmon smiled, "Okay, why dont you come live with me? I could always use a new roommate miss... what was your name again."

Sora thought for a second, "Uh, I think it was sora wasnt it?" Sora looked to biyomon for help, but the inflated bird just shrugged.

"Well Okay Sora, Ill show you to my place."

Sora, Biyomon, and the blimpmon began to float away. meanwhile...
1111211212212211112112222111112.title: Air brained

11112112122122111121122221111121.content:
Back at City Hall, Kari and Mimi were waiting for their friends to return. They too were having trouble thinking.

"What are we doing here?" Mimi asked. She had lost her concentration and was floating above Kari.

"Uh, I don't know." Kari answered. she didn't even notice that Gatomon was missing.

-----

Gatomon was floating aimlessly through a hallway. She happened to pass by two Madpuffymon during her little voyage.

"Looks like they chose to be citizens." The first one said.

"Yep." The second one said. "How long will it be before they completely zone out?"

"Should only be a couple hours." The first one said.

Gatomon floated past the Madpuffymon until she reached the end of the hall. Then she dug her claws into the wall and turned the corner. For some reason, she didn't seem to be affected how the digimon suggested. Now she had to get herself and the others out.
11112112122122111121122221111121.title: Gatomon learns something.

choices: a Madpuffymon enters, reporting that they have captured Yolei
111121121221221111211222211111212.content:
Gatomon decided to continue hanging around and see if the Madpuffymon were going to reveal any more information, suddenly a nearby door opened up and a shadowy form stepped out.

"Does all go according to plan?"

The madpuffymon bowed, and one spoke up.

"Yes sir, three of the four female digidestined and there partners have been given the treatment, soon they will be mindless blimpmon. All we need do now is capture the fourth. a girl named Yolei, our comrades are searching the area even as we speak."

"Good... good..." The shadowy figure stepped into the light, revealing a metallic teddybear like creature.

"I, metal monzeamon, was created by the dark masters as a fail safe device in case of there defeat. Once those meddling chosen girls are turned into mindless blimpmon, Ill lure the male digidestined here and do the same to them! then Ill plunder their world and avenge my masters! Wark wark wark!"

The mad puffymon just stared at Metal Monzeamon.

"Sir, you have the dumbest laugh."

"I know, by the way, I just remembered that the gas is less effective on champion digimon, so you may have to give the cat digimon a booster."

"we shall do so at once my liege."

Gatomon gulped 'Oh crap', she thought, 'I have to get the others out of here.'

but before she could translate thought into action...
111121121221221111211222211111212.title: Enter the bad guy

1111211212212211112112222111112121.content:
All of a sudden, one of the Madpuffymon saw Gatomon relfected in Metal Monzeamons body.

"Its her! she's in here!" They yelled.

"Get her!" Metal monzeamon decreed.

"Yes my lord!"

"Oh crud" Gatomon said to herself as she turned and attempted to escape, unfortunetly in her inflated state she couldnt move so well, and the madpuffymon caught her.

Metal monzeamon grinned as they dragged the inflated champion before him, Gatomon looked up in defiance. "What are you going to do with me?"

Metal monzeamon thought for a second, he could give Gatomon another shot, that would cause her mind to start fading like the others, or he could do something much worse...
1111211212212211112112222111112121.title: Busted!!!!

choices: Sora has started to change into a blimpmon
Yolei has been captured by the madpuffymon
11112112122122111121122221111121211.content:
Metal Monzeamon grunted at the captured gatomon. "Just give her the shot, I dont have enough time to be creative right now."

"Of course my lord." the madpuffymon bowed to metal monzeamon as he exited the room and another madpuffymon entered with a new syringe.

"no!" gatomon struggled as the madpuffymon held her in place. the head madpuffymon got up close and stuck the syringe in her neck, injecting her with the serum.

"ow! youll pay for that you creep!" gatomon hissed as the madpuffymon released her, "Wait till I... till I..."

Gatomon floated in midair and tried to remember what she was about to say, but for some reason she couldnt think of what she was gonna say, in fact, thinking about anything was giving her a major headache.

"Ow... uh, how did I get in here?"

The madpuffymon smirked to one another and one walked up to her. "you just got lost in here, Ill take you back to your friends."

"My friends?" Gatomon thought for a second, "Oh thats right! yeah, take me back to them."

The madpuffymon dragged Gatomon outside, where Kari, Mimi, and Palmon were waiting.

Were Gatmon able to remember what they use to look like, she would have been shocked at how much Kari and Mimi had changed in appearence. They had grown much larger, so much so there cloths had ripped off completly and all the defining features of there bodies had vanished; there hair, there breasts, even their fingers and toes. they both looked like vaugely humanoid shaped balloons.

"Oh, hi guys.." Gatmon said, trying to remember there names.

"Oh, hello, who are you little kitty?" Kari floated up to Gatomon and looked her over.

Gatomon thought for a second, she didnt really know who she was, but she really didnt care either, she didnt really care about anything but inflating and floating around without the need to think.

Madpuffymon smiled, "Well, Ill leave you alone to get reaquainted. I have other things to check on..."

Meanwhile...
11112112122122111121122221111121211.title: Gatomon joins the other

choices: Ken and wormmon were approaching balooburg.
111121121221221111211222211111212112.content:
"Let me go you creeps!"

Yolei and hawkmon had been wandering through the forest, looking for Kari and the others, when suddenly they were happened upon by the madpuffymon, they grabbed her and dragged her into baloonburg, they also locked hawkmon into a crate. (The madpuffymon didnt like inflating male humans and digimon for some reason.)

Despite her struggling, Yolei was no match for the digimon as she was forced into Metal Monzeamons office.

"Ah, very nice, now we have them all!" Metal monzeamon chortled as the madpuffymon dropped her.

"What do you mean "have them all?" what have you done with my friends you metal jerk?"

"Tut tut, there well be time for that later, now its time for you to become a blimpmon like your friends, once you do, youll forget all about your friends, and everything else for that matter?"

"What are you talking abou..." Yolei tried to speak, but was cut off as a tube shot out of metal monzeamons paw into her mouth.

"Blimp up!"

Suddenly, a strange gas began to pump out of the tube into yolei, slowly her belly, then the rest of her body started to expand, making her rounder and rounder, her skin also started to turn blue.

At first, Yolei fought against the expanding, trying to hug her expanding body to keep it from swelling, but as she started to raise off the floor, her concerns began to fade, and she started to enjoy the sensation of growing bigger and bigger.

also as she grew, her mind and memorys began to fade, as metal monzeamon predicted, she forgot all about her friends, and also that she had been abducted to this baloonburg as well.

Finally metal monzeamon pulled back his tube, as Yolei floated there, dazed and spherical, as well as blue.

"Woah... what a trip... how did I get here?"

Metal Monzeamon smirked, "My dear, youve always been here, I was just giving you a routine reinflation."

"Oh... Okay" Yolei said, she didnt know if the robotic bear was telling the truth, but she also didnt care, thinking about it was giving her a headache.

"Take her and put her with the others, Ive got other work to do."

The madpuffymon bowed and brought the blimped digidestined with them out into the streets.

Metalmonzeamon smirked to himself and the trouble he had caused. "Yes, now there all brainless baloons, now nothing will stop me!"

Little did he realize...
111121121221221111211222211111212112.title: Yolei starts blimping

choices: On to the Pin-ishment (Man thats lame...)
11112112122122111121122221111121212.content:
"Hm, for you kitty, We need something very special..." MetalMonzemon scratches under Gatomon's chin lightly as she twists her head away as much as she can. The wicked digimon chuckled loudly as he walks off through the door. "Take her to the pin-ishment chamber...and make sure her partner watches." The two Madpuffymon secure a pair of hoses around her middle as she claws at him.
"Ugh...Let me go! You can't do this...Kari, Help me!" She shouts as she is pulled down the hall. The Madpuffymon tighten their grip around her middle.
Meanwhile, Mimi was busy giggling as she floated up and down repetitively. "Wow, I can float up! I didn't know I could do that!" She giggles as she presses the up button for the 25th time. Yet, as silly and mindless as Mimi was becoming, Kari was still somewhat aware. "Sigh...you said that already..." She rolls around in mid air, rolling around as she waited for Sora to return. Before Mimi floated down, she saw a big white balloon being pulled by a bunch of Madpuffymon. "Hi kitty!...Bye kitty!" She giggled as she pressed the down button. "Hey Kari, you wouldn't believe what I can do..."
Gatomon sighed as she watched the green balloon Mimi decending. "I've got to do something before they all loose their minds..."
11112112122122111121122221111121212.title: Take her away!

choices: Help Dorumon save everyone and cure the Blimpmon
Distroy the remaining shots and defeat MetalMonzemon
111121121221221111211222211111212121.content:
As Mimi mindlessly floated up and down Gatomon tried to escape. Just as Gatomon was about to get out of sight of Mimi and Kari the Madpuffymon got knocked out. Then Gatomon saw a Dorumon falling down to the ground from the roof of the town hall. "That was close"Said Dorumon"If I didn't do anything then you might have befallen the same fate as the digimon hit by the X-Virus sent by Yargdrassl."
"Who is Yargdrassl?"asked Gatomon
Dorumon explained about the incident with the Royal Knight Digimon and how he was an experimental digimon made by Yargdrassl(Find a way to watch Digimon X-Evolution to find out the whole story.)
"Why don't I remember anything about that?"Asked Gatomon
"Only the Royal Knight Digimon can remember because we were in the Royal Knight Space"Said Dorumon
Just then Kari bounced over and said"Who are you kitty?"
"This should restore you to normal"Said Dorumon just before removing Kari's belt with his claws, and then using a X-antibody maker.
"What happened?"asked Kari"Why am I not pink anymore?"
"I used a modified X-Antibody on you"said Dorumon"The shot the Madpuffymon gave you was made from the remains of the X-Virus if I can get this antibody to everyone affected then I can restore their memories and remove the X-Virus before everyone who was given the shot is killed by the X-Virus."
111121121221221111211222211111212121.title: A suprise hero

111121121221221111211222211111212122.content:
The Madpuffymon travel a long distance through the balloon mayor's mansion, reaching the basement, then a strange stone underground passage. Light shone down through multi-colored balloons above as Gatomon was dragged along like the helpless balloon she was. She sighed deep and long, hope was starting to fade as they reached a huge chamber. There was little in the room except for a massive depression with several hoses and a large pin dangling from the ceiling, almost 300' above the floor. "Alright, in ya go!" One of the pump-like creatures tosses her into the middle of the room, small jets activating to keep her in the middle above the depression.
"Hey, the boss said we have to get the girl who came with her...what’s her name...."
"Heh, plenty of time for that." He turned around to Gatomon, smiling as a hose secures itself inside the her mouth. "She ain't going anywhere." Gatomon moans and screams as air begins to flow into her, inflating her slowly as the creatures leave.
One of the Madpuffymon turns to the other. "Hehe, yeah...er...which one was her partner again?" They both shrug as they head back up to the mansion.

Meanwhile, Sora floats steadily toward the Mayor's house. "I can't wait to tell Karen and Mini about the place. They'll just love it."
Biyomon chirps happily, following behind slowly. "Yeah...er...wait. Did we actually see any places for sale?"
Sora thought for a moment. "Umm....I think so...right?" She stops for a minute as she looks around. "Biyo, I don't think we got a place at all!"
"Me neither...what do we do?" They both shrug as they continue on their way. As they approach an alley, a pair of long hoses shoot out and inflate them steadily. Biyomon rounds out almost immediately as Sora's hands and feet sink into her round body until they both become little more than balloons with their faces attached. They are dragged bouncingly along by a mysterious trio of robed figures.

Kari yawns as she sits on a sofa as Mimi floats back up for the 55th time. "Hehee, This is amazing! I love being a balloon!" She shouts as she descends next to her.
"Mhm...wonder what’s taking Sora so long...and have you seen Gatomon? She was just here a minute ago..."
"Gato-who?" Mimi giggles as she bounces up and down, rubbing her belly. "Doesn't ring a bell...Hey, I can float!"
Kari sighs and sits up, bouncing to the door. "I'll go look for her...er...you'll be ok here right?" She says as Mimi continues floating up and down like she wasn't even there. With a slight shrug, she bounces out down the hallway as two Madpuffymon turn the corner.

"Right...so one of the ones in the building is the cat digimon's partner...I think they were right down here." The smarter Madpuffymon turns a corner as the dumber one reaches his hose out.
"I got her right here!" He pulls his hose back as the other narrows his eyes with a grin. On the other end was...
111121121221221111211222211111212122.title: You get what you pay for with minions

choices: She get dragged into the same room as Gatomon
1111211212212211112112222111112121221.content:
Kari meeped, as she found a hose attached itself to her body, and make her balloon even bigger. Flailing her already sunken in hands, Kari gasped as she came face to face with the Madpuffymon.

"H-Hey! W-What's the big idea and where's Gatomon?!" Kari exclaimed, glaring at the two.

"Oh, you're gonna find out pretty soon~" They murred, blowing up Kari a few more inches.

Gasping, Kari felt herself getting dragged away as she looked around desperately for least some means of escaping her predicament. Calling to her friends wouldn't help, since they were acting like a bunch of air heads by now. So, she had to think of something and fast, or things would end up badly for her!
1111211212212211112112222111112121221.title: ....Kari

choices: Metal Monzemon gloats at Kari and Gatomon
Kari tries to save Gatomon somehow.
11112112122122111121122221111121212212.content:
Kari struggled against the Madpuffymon as they dragged her along the underground passage, but there was little she could do. Her hands and feet were all that remained of her limbs. When she tried to bounce away, the Madpuffymon that was attached to her simply blew her up a bit more. This was incredibly distracting, especially as each new blast of air caused her hands and feet to disappear into her body a little bit more.

"Where are you taking me?!" she demanded.

"To your friend," one of her captors replied.

"I thought they were partners," the other commented.

The first Madpuffymon sighs in exasperation. As they go further down, Kari can hear muffled groans and shrieks further up ahead, and she recognizes them immediately. "That's Gatomon! What are you doing to her?!"

"You're about to see!"

They reach the chamber and shove Kari inside. Kari barely has time to register what is happening before the chamber seals shut behind her. She sees a large, super large, completely round balloon floating in front of her, maybe about fifty feet wide. There are hoses stuck in the balloon's mouth; Kari's eyes widen as she recognizes the balloon's face. "Gatomon!" she exclaims.

Gatomon tries to say something to her, but the hoses prevent her from being understood. Kari looks around, trying to understand what's going on, and then sees the large, sharp, frightening pin in the ceiling 300 feet above the floor, 240 feet away from pricking Gatomon's inflated body. She realizes with horror what is happening.

"No! I won't let them pop you!" she declares.
11112112122122111121122221111121212212.title: She get dragged into the same room as Gatomon

choices: Kari try's to make a deal with Metal Monzemon
111121121221221111211222211111212122121.content:
"Ohohoh...I don't think you'll be able to do much about it~" Metal Monzemon said, as his face appeared on a nearby screen.

"Y-You fiend! Let her go right now!" Kari yelled, and then meeped seeing another hose activate and make it's way to her.

"Oh, I don't so my dear, but you can join her~" He said, smirking at Kari trying to desperately escape the evil hose "I honestly thought it wouldn't come to this. But, I cannot have both of you ruining my careful plans~"

Gatomon let out a muffle, as she felt her growth double and triple, as her features sunk deeper into her body with her massive balloon form rising further and further getting much closer to the pin.

"Y-You won't get away with this! Our friends will find out we're missing!" Kari said, finding herself driven into a corner.

"Hahah! THat's why you think! By now they should be just busy wanting to grow bigger and nothing else" Metal Monzemon gloated as his eyes glowed red "Face it girl, you and your kitty friend are about to become scraps on the floor and nothing else. So, my suggestion is that you try to enjoy yourself while you have the time. Because, I can say the cat ball really doesn't have much left~"
111121121221221111211222211111212122121.title: Metal Monzemon gloats at Kari and Gatomon

choices: Metal Monzemon accepts (and alters) the deal
1111211212212211112112222111112121221212.content:
Kari desperately tried to think of something as she saw Gatomon inflating bigger and bigger, nearly at 80 feet now, her body getting closer to the pin. Worse, the hose in front of Kari lunged at her mouth, but she managed to move her head so it missed, but she knew it was eventually going to hit its target if she didn't act quickly.

Metal Monzemon laughed. "Futile efforts! Give in! You're simply wasting time!"

"Just wait a moment! We can make a deal!" Kari exclaimed.

"What deal could you possibly make that would be better than watching you both pop?" Metal Monzemon asked.

"Uh... um..." Kari dodged another lunge from the hose, but it wrapped itself around her neck, and aimed itself only inches from her lips. "We'll be your personal balloons!" she said frantically, then shrieked as the hose plunged into her mouth and its air kicked on at high strength, making her gain a foot in mere seconds.

"Hmmmmmmm," Metal Monzemon made a show of thinking it over. Gatomon moaned in defeat, watching Kari begin inflating bigger as she herself reached 100 feet round. "Personal balloons... but I already have your friends as my personal balloons..."

Kari joined Gatomon's moan in defeat as her hands and feet sunk into her inflating body. She kept her eyes locked on her partner, wishing she had taken a moment to say something to her before she popped.

Metal Monzemon continued thinking out loud. "Though, those are delightful moans you both are making, recognizing your predicament, which your friends aren't able to do because, oh yes, I corrupted their minds!" He laughs at his own ingenuity. "And it's not like either of you can do anything to me now that you're so nice and big and round and helpless..."
1111211212212211112112222111112121221212.title: Kari try's to make a deal with Metal Monzemon

1111211212212211112112222111112121221212.content:
"Hmmm...But nah, I think I'll enjoy this show more." Metal Monzemon said, clapping his paws together "But, instead let's make it a more fun event!"

Just then, the top opened as another pin descended down, making Kari's eyes go wide with horror as she realized what was gonna happen. Then, she felt the rush of air speed up even further, thus making her growth speed up faster as she was clearly catching up to the poor Gatomon, who by this point has submitted to her fate.

"Why don't we have a fun little race and see who goes out with a bang first!" Metal Monzemon said, cackling to himself in an evil fashion "After all, what's best than two friends sharing a final moment together!"

Kari muffled, her limbs have long disappeared into her massive body, as she lifted higher and higher into the air soon enough being on the same eye level as Gatomon. Staring into the felines eyes, Kari essentially was saying sorry she was that this was happening and how they both will soon explode.

In response, she read in Gatomon's eyes how the feline was just glad that Kari was by her side, so she'll least manage to pop while enjoying it with her closest friend. Both girls blushed, as the needles grew ever closer as now it was just a question who'd go out first as Metal Monzemon was taking bets among the MadPuffymon.
1111211212212211112112222111112121221212.title: Metal Monzemon rejects the deal.

choices: Somebody saves Kari in the nick of time.
1111211212212211112112222111112121221212.content:
Gatomon and Kari grew bigger, and bigger, while staring into each other's eyes to share last words while Metal Monzemon's laughter filled the room. They were both nearly two hundred feet big already, and taking up so much room in the chamber that they were both pressed against the wall, and then against each other, their bodies squeaking as they rubbed together. The sensation was ticklish, and Kari involuntarily giggled. Gatomon giggled as well. Having resigned to their fate, she was determined to help Kari get through their final moments bravely.

As their faces came closer to each other, it occurred to Gatomon that maybe she could use her mouth to grab the hose out of Kari's. She tried to lunge forward, opening her mouth in a hope that her teeth could grab Kari's hose and free her, but to her surprise, Kari also lunged forward, opening her mouth, and they bumped faces with other. The inflation of their bodies kept their faces pressed into each other. Gatomon looked deep into Kari's eyes, and realized that Kari had had the same idea she had; she sees recognition in Kari's eyes as she realizes the same thing.

Gatomon smiles at Kari, and purrs, letting Kari know how she feels. Kari smiles in return.

Then, with a gasp, Gatomon feels the needle prick her skin, and time seems to freeze for a second. Then she pops, with a great scream.

Kari is blasted backwards by Gatomon's popping, but she has nowhere to go, so the force squishes her against the wall, but then the pressure inside her forces her to bounce forward, and she ends up bouncing back and forth around the chamber, yelping and screaming as pieces of Gatomon's rubbery, balloon-like skin flutter around her, the hose steadily remaining in her mouth.
1111211212212211112112222111112121221212.title: Gatomon goes bang!

1111211212212211112112222111112121221212.content:
Watching her friends white shreds snow around, Kari was simply stunned as she couldn't even say anything; not because of the hose in her mouth but because she simply was too shocked. Not to mention a massive wave of defeat rushed trough her, as she didn't even pay much attention to Metal Monzemons gloating. All that was in her mind that soon she'll end up just like Gatomon, just a pile of shreds on the floor, an oddly the idea of that wasn't scaring her. Maybe it was because of her massive body or how tight and sensitive she was feeling, but just the thought of exploding was strangely arousing to her.

Looking up, she saw the pin wasn't far away and Kari found herself actually craving for it to get closer and closer, as if hearing her wishes the air flow sped up even more making the girls body rise faster as she was now close to 40 feet with all her features sunken into her massive body. Soon, she started feeling the edge of the pin brush against her massive blimpy body. Yes, here it was coming! It was gonna happen now! An with a few growth spurts, Kari's tight body hit the pin. As the hose left her mouth, Kari let out a yelp of horror and pleasure, as her body detonated sending her skin colored shreds all around.
1111211212212211112112222111112121221212.title: And now Kari pops.

1111211212212211112112222111112122.content:
Before she could do anything, Gatomon heard the sound of footsteps from down the hall. It was a third Madpuffymon. To avoid detection, Gatomon moved further down the hall.

"My liege!" The Digimon exclaimed. "We have captured the last Digidestined girl."

"Excellent." Said Metal Monzaemon. "Report to communication. Have them notify all troops in the city; place the other girls where they won't be seen."

"Yes sir!" The third Madpuffymon sounded, giving a salute. As he turned about and left, Gatomon saw a door into a janitor's closet.

"As for you two, find that cat at once!"

-----

Gatomon had already gotten through the door as Metal Monzaemon ordered her capture. Now she had to get out undetected and get the girls out. The only other way out was through an air vent, but she was too wide to get through.

Let's see, chances are the field that keeps us from floating out also blocks any transmission going out of Balloonburg. Gatomon thought. And I also have to figure out how to deflate myself and the girls back to normal.

Suddenly, Gatomon felt a gurgling sensation from within her body. Looking down at her body, she saw that she was deflating. Once she touched down, she guessed that she had at least partial control over her inflation since she was at Champion level. Experimenting, Gatomon focused on her belly inflating, and sure enough, it grew out.

This could be useful. Gatomon thought, climbing into the vent. "Now I have to get to Kari and the others."
1111211212212211112112222111112122.title: The problems are growing(no pun meant)

11112112122122111121122221111121221.content:
Back in the Mayor's office, Metal Monzaemon sat down at his desk, Madpuffymon being a decoy to trick the girls. He flipped a switch under his desk, causing the wall on the right to slide up into the ceiling, revealing a group of monitors. On them, obviously, were live feeds of the girls.

Sora and Biyomon had long since zoned out and drifted away from the Blimpmon, both vertically and horizontally. The two had gone about fifty stories high before they were found by the other Madpuffymon. The Digimon dragged Sora back to the hot air balloon ride. As for Biyomon, she was simply stored in a warehouse.

Mimi and Kari were out back in the loading area. The Digimon were having trouble loading the girls into the trucks that was bound for the helium tank factory.

"Soon. Very soon, everything will be made right." Metal Monzaemon said. A grin took residence on the Digimon's face.

-----

Meanwhile, Gatomon was walking through the ventilation duct. She didn't need to crawl, as she was small enough to fit inside the ducts. As she tried to get her bearings, she came to a vent. She looked down at two Madpuffymon.

"You people still need help the other two girls?" The 'mon on the right asked. He seemed confused.

"It's not so much loading the girls into the truck, it's getting them to stay inside the truck." The left-hand 'mon said. "When we push the shorter girl inside, the taller one's body just pushes her back out. We just need something that can hold the tall one."

"I'll see what I can find. It shouldn't take more than thirty minutes." The first one said, walking off to a supply room.

So the girls are still here. Gatomon thought, stalking off. Now all I have to do find them. From how they talked, there might a truck or something in the back.

-----

Gatomon reasoned that she had spent almost all of her time finding a way outside. She had almost decided to just get out of city hall and just look around the city for the girls when she heard a truck engine.

I found a way out! Gatomon happily thought. Running to the source, she came to a vent about five feet above her.

Gatomon wasn't bothered by that though; she just concentrated and inflated herself. In seconds she was able to grab the vent. Deflating, Gatomon opened the vent and saw...
11112112122122111121122221111121221.title: Saved?

111121121221221111211222211111212211.content: Gatomon hops down from the vent to see that the two trucks are getting ready to leave. "Hum...which truck should I try to get on?" Gatomon says to herself.
111121121221221111211222211111212211.title: Which Truck?

choices: Gatomon causes a distraction while Kari restores Mimi.
Kari causes a distraction while Gatomon restores Mimi.
1111211212212211112112222111112122111.content:
Gatomon acts quickly and gets into the bed of the truck that's holding Kari, and waits until the trucks have left the loading area. Then, she goes over to Kari. "Kari!" she shouts.

Kari looks down at Gatomon. "Hey, Gatomon! Are you here for the trip, too?" She says, barely having any attachment left to reality.

"Drat, her mind's already slipping...perhaps if I get that gas out of her..." Gatomon says to herself. "Sorry to have to do this to you, Kari, but I have no choice!" Gatomon goes up to Kari's head, and lips locks her, and starts taking the air out of her, stopping occationally to get the air out of herself as well.

After a while, Gatomon gets Kari back to her normal size. After a moment, Kari regains her senses.

Kari looks around, wondering where she was, and sees Gatomon across from her. Gatomon looks to be a little out of it from the gas she extracted from Kari. "Gatomon! Are you alright?" She says, as she goes over to the slightly puffy cat.

Gatomon shakes her head a bit the looks up at Kari. "Ah, good. It worked." says Gatomon. Kari looks at Gatomon, slightly puzzled by what she just said. "What worked, Gatomon?" asked Kari.

Gatomon tell Kari what she overheard from Metal Monzeamon. Kari's jaw drops a bit. "Oh my, that's horrible!" Kari says. "What should we do?"

Gatomon takes a moment to think. "Well, we need to get the Madpuffymon at a disadvantage so that we can get them to tell us where they've taken Sora, Biyomon, and Yolei." Gatomon says.

"Well, before we do anything else, we should puff me back up to the size I was when I was loaded onto the truck." says Kari.

Gatomon nods. "Alright, I can take care of that. We'll worry about a plan once they take us to wherever we're going." Gatomon says. She then starts reinflating Kari back to her previous size.

-----

Eventually, they reach the Helium tank factory. "Alright, Kari, do you have any ideas?" Gatomon asks.
1111211212212211112112222111112122111.title: Kari's restored.

11112112122122111121122221111121221112.content:
"Alright, Gatomon, here's the plan. I'll puff myself up and attract their attention while you take care of Mimi." Kari says.

With that said, Kari forces herself out of the truck. "Come and get me!" She shouts, as she starts bouncing around the factory, with all the Madpuffymon trying to catch her.

In the meantime, Gatomon jumps from the roof of the truck she was on to the bed of the truck Mimi was loaded onto. Mimi just stares off into space as Gatomon walks over to her.

Just as Gatomon is about to deflate Mimi, she hears a scream from Kari. She looks out of the truck and finds that Kari has be recaptured, and is threatened by a pin. "Alright, Gatomon, we know you're there! There's no way this girl could restore herself, so come out, or we'll make her pop!" Shouts a Madpuffymon. "And don't cause us any trouble, because I can pop her the second you try anything funny!"

Gatomon sighs, and hops out of the truck. The Madpuffymon keeps his promise, and lets go of Kari, but only after Gatomon is properly restrained.

-----

Later, Kari and Gatomon are brought to see Metal Monzeamon himself. He looks at the two girls, and chuckles to himself. "Wark wark wark...though you could stop my plan, did you?" he says, glaring right at Gatomon. He then shifts his gaze towards Kari.

"Hum...yes...I though of a perfectly fitting punishment for your insolence...I'll make you into Blimpmon as is! With your sentience intact, you'll have no choice but to watch as I systematicly take over the entire Digital World!" He says, grining the whole time.

Kari glares angerly at Metal Monzeamon. "You won't get away with this, you monster! Once Gat-" Kari is interupted by Metal Monzeamon.

"Once she evolves? I've already put that into consideration. It's a speical gas that cancel's out a Digimon's power, including the power to evolve. In fact, it's in this room at this very moment, but don't worry about me. I've made it in such a way that only me and my troups will be unaffected." He says, with a smug look on his face. "Now, enough talk! Take those two away!"

-----

Several hours later, the 4 human girls and 2 Digimon, who all are completely spherical, are tied to the town hall as a display of sorts. Kari and Gatomon look on as a couple of Madpuffymon finish tying Yolei down. Yolei is lavender in color, and is unable to do anything but randomly giggle. Kari and Gatomon then look over at Sora, Mimi, and Biyomon, who are rose, green, and pink, respectively. They too cannot do anything but giggle.

Metal Monzeamon walks out of the town hall, and looks up at the display. "Very nice...you all seem to be enjoying yourselves..." he says, specificly looking towards the pink Kari and white Gatomon balloons.

Kari sighs, and looks over to Gatomon. "I can't believe this is happening..."

Gatomon smiles. "Don't worry, Kari...we've been through worse..."

They hear Metal Monzeamon chuckle, and look over to him. "You two are too much...so optimistic, even when your fate is so wonderfully sealed..."

Kari and Gatomon grumble, as they slowly inflate along with the other girls.
11112112122122111121122221111121221112.title: Uh oh.

11112112122122111121122222.content:
Sora mulled over the choice given to her. Like similar decisions, it was only easy at the surface.

On one hand, she could stay in the Digiworld and live in Balloonburg for the rest of her life. Sora looked down at her body. The special nature of being a citizen was no problem. If someone had asked Sora about being inflated before she came here, she would respond with the idea itself being impossible, if not very painful. But after being in Balloonburg...

Sora was lost in her thoughts of becoming larger for a moment before she snapped out of it.

On the other hand, she could go back home and return to Balloonburg whenever she wanted. The problem with being inflated is the lack of mobility, plus it was rather difficult to hide in some cases. Not to mention that she wouldn't be separated from her family and friends on earth.

"I'm afraid I'll have to pass on the permanent residency." Sora reluctantly replied.

The mayor nodded. "That's fine. You can change your mind later if you want to though."

Sora politely nodded in response. "I'll go get Kari and bring her here."

"You don't have to." The Mayor said. "I'll just call someone at the factory to send her over here. In the meantime you can wait here or do what you want."

"Thanks." Biyomon chimed.

"I'll stay here and wait for Kari." Angewomon said, waving at the others. "You can go on without me."

Sora and Biyomon waved back at Angewomon and left.

-----

"So Biyomon," Sora began. "What should we do first?"

"We could get much more done if we split up." Biyomon suggested.

Sora waddled out of the Mayor's office and to the factory.
11112112122122111121122222.title: Be it ever so humble, you know the rest of it...

11112112122122112.content:
Sora bounced over to the amusement park where she would fill in for the hot-air balloon. She spotted the site of the ride easily; it was the only place that had a basket. She bounced over to who she thought was the mechanic. It was yet another Madpuffymon.

"Excuse me" Sora asked. "are you the mechanic in charge of this ride?"

The Madpuffymon, who's back was turned to Sora, grumbled something under his breath. "Look, I know you're bored, but you'll just have to wait like everybody else!" He didn't bother to look behind him.

"Oh I'm not a customer. I was sent to fill in for the balloon ride." Sora said.

Now the Digimon looked behind him. "Oh, I'm sorry." He looked Sora over. He wasn't expecting a human. "Wait here."

The Madpuffymon walked over to the other side of the basket and wheeled two helium tanks into sight. There was a blue package of some sort tied to the tanks.

"What's that thing on the tanks?" Sora asked.

"It's a bodysuit that you'll have to wear while you're working here." The Madpuffymon said.

"Why's that?" Sora asked again.

"Because you have to placed so that you're face-up." The Madpuffymon responded. "If not, the blood will rush into you're head, or you'll be mooning the whole town. It'll also let people think that you're a real balloon, so that some of them won't be looking up from time to time, if you catch my drift."

Sora wondered what that meant, then blushed in realization. "Oh, I see."

"There's a fitting room with a suction pump over over by the roller coaster." The Digimon said, pointing towards the other ride. "You have to deflate to fit into the suit, so come back when you're ready."

"Sure!" Sora said as the mechanic handed her the bodysuit.

-----

About twenty minutes later, Sora was filled with helium and escorting the parkgoers as the new balloon.

Meanwhile...
11112112122122112.title: Sora the blue balloon

choices: It slows to a stop soon after they leave the flower field.
They keep swelling, and start to float in the air.
112.content:
As she and Gatomon continue on their way, they are oblivious to the weird flower patch they that Kari is walking through. At least, until they start to feel funny.

"Whoa...I'm starting to get light headed, Gatomon..." Kari says, as she stops and looks around. "Those flowers...I might be having an allergic reaction to them..."

Gatomon nods. "You and me both, Kari. Let's leave this area." Gatomon says. Kari nods, and they go back the way they came.

About halfway back to the edge of the flower field, the two hear strange hissing noises, but notice that nothing else is around. They then look at each other and realize that they are both swelling up like balloons.

Kari yelps. "Oh my! I'm getting bigger!" she shouts in panic. "And so are you, Gatomon!"

"Yeah...how weird..." Gatomon calmly says, which causes Kari to calm down just a little.

"Well...you certainly don't seem to care, Gatomon." Kari says, as they exit the flower field. By this time, Kari is so round that her feet barely touch the ground. "I hope this doesn't go on much longer..."
112.title: The Flower Field of Puffyness.

choices: Kari wants to try to get bigger
Kari wants to try to return to normal
1121.content:
Kari and Gatomon soon stop swelling up after they get clear of the field of flowers.

"Well... it looks like we made it out safely, Gatomon." Kari said, sighing.

"Yes, but we're still swollen." Gatomon pointed out.

"Yeah... but most allergies don't do stuff like this... why are we so big?" Kari asked.

"Well... see, the pollen from those flowers tends to aggravate pretty much anyone's allergies enough to make them puff up like this." Gatomon shrugged as well as she could in her inflated state. "Personally, I kind of like it a bit, considering that it doesn't really make you itchy or anything."

"Oh, I see... hmmm..." Kari said, thinking.
1121.title: A Safe Escape

11211.content:
Kari flapped her hands as she waddled along, thinking more about how light and airy she felt. The more she moved, the more she enjoyed her new size and shape until she couldn't help but giggle.

Gatomon looked up at her. "You ok?"

"Hehe, yeah I'm ok..its just..." She smiled as she rubbed her puffy sides as best she could. "I think I kind of like this."

"Really?" The feline digimon looked up at her partner, a little confused as she rocked back and forth a bit. "Well...it actually is kind of nice, isn't it?" Soon both girls were laughing at how big they were.

"Hey, why don't we go back through those flowers and see how big we can really get?" Kari bounced in anticipation, something about being huge felt just so wonderful.

"Hm...I don't know...I remember hearing something about flowers like that...some sort of warning." She tried to think about what it was, but nothing came to mind. "I know about another place, some kind of mushroom field with magical spores that are said to help digimon grow larger, maybe that would be safer."

"Hmm...." Kari wobbled as she thought about where to go.
11211.title: It seems to be 'growing' on her...

choices: Nah, lets keep this just for fun
112111.content:
"I think we'll be ok." Kari smiles down at Gatomon as she starts waddling back to the flowers. "If there's any trouble, we'll just kick its butt like always, right?"

"Yeah..I guess." Gatomon shook her head, bouncing after her friend. "Though I really don't think there are any bad digimon around here." She looked around as she spoke softly to her self "In fact...there don't seem to be any digimon around here..."

It didn't take long for the girls to arrive back at the flower field, the strange pink flowers glowing with a faint haze as the girls rolled around. Slowly, this hissing sound returned as Kari squealed with delight, her body bloating up bigger and rounder. Her clothing still hugged her spherical body tightly as her head, hands and feet pull deeper into tight divots on her 6' wide form.

Gatomon swelled even faster to match her partner, making almost a competition of it as she breathed in the pollen right off the flowers, her head sticking out on a 5' wide white orb. "Mmh..I bet I can grow faster than Kari." She thought to herself. "In fact..."
112111.title: Flower Power!

1121112.content:
"...nah, its just nice growing here with Kari." Gatomon smiled as she sniffed the flowers, swelling up next to Kari as she rolled a little closer to her friend.

A bit more time passed as the girls rolled and breathed in the flowers, growing ever larger and swelling bigger.
