She was now almost 15' wide, her gloves sticking out from her huge body just like the end of her once long tail stuck out above her rear. "OOohhh...Kari..I don't think I can move around, we should go."

Kari was now larger than a house, her hands and feet had long vanished completely as her face stuck out from her side, her hair framing her puffy cheeks. She giggled ecstatically as she wobbled around feebly. "Heheheheee Gatomon, you worry too much." She blushed more as the hissing grew louder.

A look of worry washed over Gatomon's face; She remembered why these flowers were so dangerous now! She had to get Kari out of here before things got worse! With a heavy heave, she tried to get onto her feet, barely managing.
1121112.title: Flower Sour...

choices: They reincarnate as balloonified versions of themselves.
They reincarnate as 50 foot wide balloon Digimon.
11211122.content:
"UUUghhhh!!" Gatomon rocked back and forth, sliding onto her round bottom, but just rolled onto her back. "Nooo, Kari! You have to help me...the flowers...I just remembered why they're so dangerous!" She flapped her hands and feet, trying to righten herself as Kari giggled and continued expanding. All she was now was a 40' wide orb, her body taking on a deep pink tone as her clothing still maintained her modestly, although they were torn and just barely clinging on.

"Kari! Please snap out of it! The flowers will make us keep growing until we burst! We...pph...aaf..to.." She found it harder to talk as her swelling balloon body puffed around her face, her head pushing deeply inside her body as a deep pink tone arched across her own fur. Her tail, gloves, everything had either fallen off of her 35' blimpy body or was completely absorbed. Gatomon shut her eyes as she whispered to her friend. "Kari..I'm sorry."

The orbs continued to expand, every trace of their former selves right down to their hair and faces were gone. As they became a pair of 50' wide pink balls, a thunderous popping noise echoed across the field. Both pods had exploded into a mist of new pneumaflower seeds, off to create new fields for unsuspecting travelers.
11211122.title: Flower Downer

choices: Tickling Gatomon until they both grow big again
Head off toward the villiage for more fun
112111221.content:
The light, pink seeds were thrown far by the winds of the field from Kari and Gatomon's explosions. There wasn't so much as a crater left in place of the two spheres, just a pair of short green stalks. Atop each one was a pink ball that puffed up larger and larger, growing into watermelon-sized fruits. As they swelled, one turned a more human skintone, the other a brilliant white as small arms and legs pushed out on the surface. In a matter of minutes, both Kari and Gatomon had regrown, stalks attached to their head. The cat digimon was first to awaken, sitting up and instinctively pulling on the stem at the top of her head. "Ugh..wh..what happened?" She looked down at herself; her body looked more or less normal except for a rubbery sheen. "Kari, are you ok? Get up." She started to prod her companion as she slowly came to.

"Oohn...Gatomon...what...huh..." She sat up, looking down at the clothing that had grown atop her body. "Wow...last thing I remember was getting all giggly and puffy...I guess we're ok now...right?"

Gatomon shook her head, giving the skin on Kari's arm a tug as it snapped back like rubber. "It doesn't look like we're alright...Whatever these things did to us, we're now all rubbery and smooth." The digimon stood up, looking around for an exit but the path they had been walking was long gone. Meanwhile, Kari smiled, tugging at her stem a bit with a giggle. "What's so funny?"

"Hehe...it's kind of silly really...growing into a big balloon, then coming back as a rubbery fruit girl." As the girl giggled, Kari's belly began to wobble and swell, growing noticeably rounder. By the time Gatomon put her hand over her mouth, her belly already grew to look full term pregnant.

"Hey, we don't want to burst all over again, right? Hm..." She stood up on top of a large rock, squinting her eyes to the horizon as Kari coughed up a little bit of pollen. "I think I see a village in the distance. We may be able to get help there."

Gatomon hopped down and started to walk as her partner rubbed her own belly, a mischeivious smile growing on her face. "Right behind ya."
112111221.title: Rubbery Ressurrection

choices: They end up getting to the pink seed-pod stage...
They don't get much bigger than 15 feet wide...
1121112211.content:
Kari gently grabbed her partner and pulled her back so she landed onto her swollen belly. "Whoa, Kari, what are you doing!?"

Kari giggles a little, which causes her midsection to swell some more. "Well we might not want to burst, but I would like to get all big again at least!" She says, as she begins to run her fingers across her partner's belly. Gatomon tries to resist laughing, but soon finds herself unable to stop, which in turn leads to a significant amount of swelling. Kari herself giggles along with Gatomon, growing not nearly as quickly but still enough to get the two of them well on the way to being big and round. Kari's extra elasticity allowed her to tickle her partner up to the point where both of them are swollen to 10 feet wide. Kari just giggles a little once she realizes what she's done. "Ehehehe, ooops! I think I made us just a bit too big, I guess we'll just have to explode all over again!" she says in a tone of voice that suggests she was going for this result all along.

"But...what if we don't regenerate again!?" Exclaims Gatomon, but Kari just giggles some more, advancing her situation compared to Gatomon.

"Hehe, like I said, you worry too much, now just relax and and try to enjoy it, okay?" Kari gently squishes against Gatomon, causing her to roll along.

Gatomon yelps a bit as she's pushed along. "J-just what are you trying to do now!?"

"I wanna try to take it nice and slow this time, so we spend a lot more time being huge and near-bursting just before we go! Hehehe..." says Kari, as she manages to roll them out of the field, the two of them still swelling from the pollen already inside of them...
1121112211.title: Tickling Gatomon until they both grow big again

11211122111.content:
"Kari, are you sure about this?" Gatomon asked, still worrying about exploding again.

"Gatomon, just relax and breath in~" Kari winked, as both she and Gatomon began to swell.

Gatomon sighed, not having much of a choice as she relaxed with her companion. Both girls murred and cooed, feeling their bodies swell bigger and rounder with each second becomin' more and more pink seed-pod stage, as their limbs and heads began to sink into their growing bodies. Despite the fear of exploding, Gatomon had to admit that the feeling was rather good and Kari had a point about it. Being so snug in her huge and round body, she couldn't it and began to purr loudly and contently, while Kari herself was practically on cloud nine from being a huge and helpless balloon.
11211122111.title: They end up getting to the pink seed-pod stage...

choices: Gatomon says nothing to worry about.
Keri starts to ascend she begins to fall from the sky.
1122.content:
Kari looks at Gatomon as she drifts past her. "Why are you so calm, Gatomon!?" she cries, as she floats above her head. "Gatomon, look at me!" she screams...but Gatomon seems to be enjoying her adventure.

Kari and Gato keep floating. A plane passes over their heads. "Oh my, did you see that jerk!?" Kari
yells "Hello, somebody help me!" she screams. Gatomon doesn't really do much except for make a gesture asking Kari to be quiet.

Kari decides to polish her nails as she floats around. "This is kind of nice, isn't it, Gatomon...wait, she's asleep! Wake up Gatomon! Are yoiu crazy?" screams Kari. "We are floating off the face of the solar system!" She continues to scream.

(For the record, Gatomon is a FEMALE cat. Blame the localization of Digimon for that one, as her original name is Tailmon.)
1122.title: kari and gato

choices: Gatomon's right, they start to decend now.
Gatomon's wrong, they start to float away from the earth.
11221.content:

"Whoa, really?" TK asks.

The woman nods. "Yea. I think you two would make great balloon people." she says.

She hands them the cotton candy. "Enjoy, I know I did." the woman says.

TK turns to Kari. "Are you sure we should do this?"
12121111.title: The Blue...Cotton. (Or, One Really Big Conicedence

121211111.content:
TK gets his answer in the form of Kari stuffing the cotton candy into his mouth, right after she gulps down her share.

TK blinks. "I'll take that as a yes." he says. Suddenly, their skin starts to change color. TK's skin turns yellow while Kari's skin turns pink. Their skin also becomes reflective. Within seconds, the transformation is complete.

They both look themselves over. "Wow. We're really balloons." Kari comments.

TK smiles. "Can I try something?" TK asks.

"Not at all." Kari says.

TK grins and walks in front of Kari. He puts his lips on hers and starts blowing into her.

Kari slowly grows round from TK's blowing. It doesn't take long for TK to inflate Kari to the point where her limbs have dissappeared into her body.

But TK doesn't stop there. He continues to inflate Kari until every part of her is completely round. When he's finished, Kari is a 8 foot round ball.

Kari suddenly gets an idea.
121211111.title: TK's balloon.

1212111112.content:
Kari started to blow into TK making him inflate into a 15' round balloon.
TK: "that was fun. Now what should we do?"
1212111112.title: blowing back

choices: No. They want to get much bigger.
12121111121.content:
Kari smiles. "Let's keep doing this."

"Alright. But why don't you let me get us to the same size?" TK asks.

Kari nods. "I don't see why not." Kari puts her lips on TK's, and TK blows into Kari until she is as large as he is.

At this point, they breathe into each other one at a time, quickly making each other bigger.

---

In about 5 minutes, they manage to get each other to around 25 feet wide. They release the lip lock.

"Is this big enough?" Kari asks?
12121111121.title: Growing Couple

choices: no, keep going still they pop
121211111212.content:
TK: "No, lets get bigger."
Kari kisses TK again and they start to blow each other up again. After about 10 mins they are 45 feet around.
Kari: "I'm starting to feel tight, should we stop now?"
121211111212.title: no, bigger

choices: Surprise either TK's or Kari's mom.
1212111112122.content:
TK chuckles. "Don't worry. We'll be ok." he says.

So they keep blowing into each other. By now, Kari and TK look like a pair or pink and yellow orbs, respectively. From the looks on their faces, they seem extremely happy.

Suddenly, their bodies creak, which is shortly followed by a loud bang, as the two get blown into many yellow and pink shreads of rubber.

As quickly as the explosion happened, the shreads reconstructed themselves in the shapes of TK and Kari's bodies. When finshed, the two restored kids just look at each other.

Kari speaks up. "Did we really just get blown to bits? And then live to tell about it?"

"Well, we're alive. And we're small again." TK says, still a little shocked.

Kari chuckles. "Amazing, eh?"

TK nods. "Yea. Anyway, what do you want to do now?"
1212111112122.title: Getting a little carried away.

12121111121222.content:
Kari pulls out a couple pieces of cotton candy that are about the same size as what they ate. "Well, we are gonna have to tell our mothers about this sometime...why don't we bring them along for the ride?"

TK blinks. "You're not serious, are you?" TK looks at Kari, who has formed a devious grin on her face. "You are serious...well, who's mom, then?"
12121111121222.title: Who's mom?

choices: Let's see Kari's mom before we do anything else.
121211111212221.content:
"How about my mom?" TK asks. "Since I don't live with my dad, he wouldn't be around to get in the way, or something like that."

Kari nods. "Yes, that's ture."

So with that, they head of to TK's apartment.

---

(Mrs.)Takashi hears the door bell ring. "I'm coming." she says. Takashi is a young looking woman, looking like she's in her mid 20's. She has straight blonde hair. She's currently wearing a black short sleeved blouse, and a pair of grey shorts.

She opens the door. Needless to say, she's surprised to see TK and Kari's condition.

---

"So that's the whole story, Mrs. Takashi." Kari says. All three of them are sitting in the living room.

Takashi takes a deep breath. "So let me get this straight...you ate some cotton candy, and you suddenly became living balloons...and then you blew each other up until you popped, only to reform, perfectly normal, right?" she asks.

"That was after we inflated without being balloon people." TK says.

Takashi sighs. "Oh, right. After..."

"So...you're not mad at us?" TK asks.

Takashi shakes her head. "I don't know Kari's mom would say, but as long as you kids are still alive and well, they're really nothing to be upset about. Heck, I wouldn't mind being an balloon too if it meant I could stay young and live forever." she says.

TK and Kari grin.

Takashi blinks. "Let me guess, you were planing to make me a balloon person all along, weren't you?" she asks.

"You don't mind, do you?" Kari asks.

Takashi smiles. "Why not? It can't hurt." she says. Kari hands Takashi the cotton candy, and she eats it. "Mmm...this stuff is good to boot."

Soon, her skin becomes a rubbery light grey color. "Hum...feels interesting..."
121211111212221.title: TK's Mom

choices: Takashi inflates to one hundred feet and beyond!
Takashi inflates to one hundred feet and pops.
1212111112122212.content:
Takashi looks herself over. "Well, this is bizarre."

Kari giggles. "It's about to get weirder! TK, where's that bicycle pump you have?"

TK grins. "I'll get it."

Takashi looks a little alarmed as TK runs off. "What? You're not going to inflate me, are you?"

Kari smiles. "Come on! What's the point of being a balloon if you're not going BE a ballon?"

TK comes back with the bicycle pump. Takashi looks at it nervously, then sighs in resignation. "Oh, fine. Do your worst."

Kari cheers, and Takashi puts the hose in her mouth. Kari grabs the handle of the pump, and begins pushing it up and down, as quickly as she can. Takashi moans as her body begins to expand. TK watches, finding it surreal to see his mother being inflated by his friend.
1212111112122212.title: Get the pump!

122.content:
"Let's go to the fun house." Kari says.

"O-kay." Gatomon says.

---------

Kari sees two paths.

"Let's see... which path?"

Two signs... one says 'Go down this path for an uplifting experience'.

The other says 'Your life will be swell forever if you go down this path.'
122.title: The Fun House. How Fun.

choices: Gatomon is staring at Kari, wide eyed.
1221.content:
"Both sound nice, but I think I'll just take the 'uplifting experience' path." Kari says.

Gatomon nods. "Ok, then. Let's go." Gatomon says, as she follows Kari down the path.

The lining of the path looks like it's made of balloons. "How odd. It's like walking on air." Kari comments.

A moment after she said that, Kari begins to feel something unusual. "That's strange...I feel like I'm bloated."

Kari looks at herself and notices that she's starting to inflate. She looks at Gatomon...
1221.title: Down the Road, Path 1

12211.content:
Sure enough, Gatomon was also being inflated.

Since Gatomon was being inflated at the same rate as Kari, Gatomon was much rounder than Kari was. The feline Digimon achieved an orb shaped body when she was the size of a medicine ball. A furry medicine ball with paws, a tail, and a head.

Kari looked back at her belly, which was already protruding from under her pink and white shirt, and saw that it was already as large as Gatomon, and it was getting wider. She felt the same bloated feel as it entered her thighs and backside, making them slightly fuller.

'What's going on?' Kari thought. She then felt something like a throwrug brush up against her right leg.

Looking back at Gatomon, Kari saw that her partner Digimon had already gained half a foot in size. Now part of Gatomon's tail had been absorbed by her pnuematic bulk.

"Kari, what shoul we do?" Gatomon asked.
12211.title: Kitty!

122111.content:
"There's not much we can do besides walk down this way." Kari says. "I doubt going back way will make us smaller, since we haven't stopped growing since we're standing still."

Gatomon nods. "Makes sence to me."

"Then it's settled, we keep going down this way." Kari says.

As Kari finished her sentence, she notices that she had gotten so round that her arms and legs had dissappeared into her body. Gatomon was inflated to the point where her feet no longer touched the ground.

For a while, Kari waddled down the path while Gatomon floated behind her. But eventually, Kari's feet stopped touching the ground as well, forcing her to move by floating.

Kari looked up. "Gatomon, I can't see a ceiling. I wonder how high this hall is?"

"I don't know, but I know one thing. We're about to find out." Gatomon says. Kari looks down to see that they are both floating upwards. Both of them are around 15 feet wide when Kari notices that they are floating into the air.

"I guess I never noticed since we were not touching the ground." Kari says.

Gatomon looks up, and sees...
122111.title: On The Up and Up.

choices: They get assistance from a large motorized fan
They have to do it themselves
1221111.content:
Gatomon sees a ceiling.

"Well, the good news is, we'll stop going up in a little bit." Gatomon says.

"Any bad news?" Kari asks.

"We can't move." Gatomon grumbles.

With a thump, the two hit the ceiling.

"I wonder what's going to happen next?" Kari wonders out loud.

A door opened in the near wall. It was ceiling-accessible, but they could not move.
1221111.title: ...And Up and -*thump* No More Up.

12211111.content:
Kari and Gatomon suddenly feel themselves being blown toward the opening in the wall ahead of them. "Well, I guess that solves one problem." Kari says.

They both roll into a room with a control panel. The two girls go up a little, but not much. "I guess we're not light enough to go up anymore." Gatomon says.

Kari looks at the control panel. "Hum...it says that we we say up or down after we say move, we'll go on." Kari says, trying to avoid activating something by accident...
12211111.title: Which way?

122111111.content:
"Let's try going up." Gatomon says.

"Okay, then... Move up!" Kari says.

Kari and Gatomon feel themselves start to swell again, becoming lighter. They eventually go through a hatch in the ceiling...
122111111.title: Moving On Up

1221111111.content:
The girls stop floating the moment they enter the next room. "Kari, look at that." Gatomon says, gesturing to an orb that has a plaque hanging above it.

Kari looks at the plaque. "Touch this orb to receive the powers you have earned." Kari reads aloud.

Kari shurgs. "Touch it with what? Our hands and feet are gone." Kari's answer comes when Gatomon manages to make herself bounce into Kari, which cause Kari to touch the orb. Upon doing this, Kari and Gatomon black out.

When they come to, Kari and Gatomon are have reverted to their normal sizes. Aside of Kari is a book of sorts.

"Hey, we're not balloons anymore, Kari." Gatomon says.

Kari nods. "Yea..." Kari says, dissappointed. Then, she see's the book. "Hey, what's this?" Kari says, as she picks up the book.

The book has "Air Magic" written on the cover. "Air magic? That sounds interesting." Kari says, as she picks up the book and reads.

"Air magic? What's the big deal? What's it gonna tell you? How to make it windy?" Gatomon says, somewhat confused.

"No." Kari points a finger at Gatomon and mutters a few words to herself.

Gatomon gasps as she blows up like a balloon. Within moments, she is completely round, except for her head and tail. Gatomon starts to float into the air, but Kari grabs Gatomon's tail.

"I think I'm going to have some fun with the girls..." Kari says, as she smiles and walks of with Gatomon.
1221111111.title: Magic Expanded.

choices: She heads over to Mimi's house.
12211111111.content:
Kari is walking near Sora's apartment while thinking about who to inflate, Kari bumps into Sora. Kari almost lets go of Gatomon.

Sora smiles. "Hello, Kari, how are you?" Sora asks.

Kari smiles. "I'm fine, but could you stand there for a few moments?" she asks, seemingly innocent.

"Ok. What's up, anyway?" Sora asks.

"You are." Kari says, with a cute yet devious grin on her face.

"Huh? What do you mea-" Sora starts to ask, as she hears a hissing sound come from her. She looks down to see her body growing big and round, her limbs beings absorbed as she gets bigger. Sora starts floating into the air. Kari ties Sora to the ground with a heavy piece of sting, then ties Gatomon down by her tail.

Sora looks at Gatomon. "What's going on here?"

Gatomon giggles. "Kari's got a new toy. And she's trying it out." she explains.

Kari smiles. "Ok, Gatomon. You and Sora stay here for a while. I'll look too suspicious if I'm caring you two around."

By now, Sora is inflated like Gatomon, only five times as big. "So, what are we supposed to do?" Sora asks, as she floats as far as the string lets her.

"I don't know...just float there and look cute." Kari says, as she walks off.

Sora and Gatomon blink. "This is twisted." Sora says.
12211111111.title: Playing with the New Toy.

122111111112.content:
As Kari heads for Mimi's house, Sora and Gatomon try to figure out how to get down.
Sora: "Well, if i press your body, the air might come out right?"
Gatomon: "Kari tried that already."

(Note: I'm not sure if she did try that.)

Sora: "Well hmm."
Gatomon's body had deflated a bit so she can move her claws.
Gatomon: "Hmmm, what if i try to pop you?"
Sora: "Say what?"
Gatomon: "Well, i beleave that our skin is now made out of rubber so if we pop, we shouldn't die."
Sora: "Shouldn't?"
Gatomon: "Well, if you want i can pop myself if your going to be a chicken."
122111111112.title: What to do.

1221111111122.content:
Sora shakes her head. "I really don't want to pop. I'm beginning to like this."

Gatomon raises an eyebrow. "We're in front of people, Sora."

Sora grins. "I don't care. I'm waiting for Kari to get back."

Gatomon shakes her head. "Alright, but I'm getting down..." Gatomon says, as she poke herself.

Gatomon bursts like a white balloon, but then regenerates and fills up with the air she lost from popping herself.

Gatomon blinks.

Sora giggles. "Well, I guess we're stuck here until Kari gets back." she says.
1221111111122.title: It Didn't Work?

choices: To find out how to make them bigger and pop?
to find someone esle to inflate?
12211111111221.content:
Kari knocked on the door to Mimi's house. Kari got the spell ready as Mimi opened the door.
Mimi: "Oh, hi Kari."
Kari: "Hi, hey, you ok? You look a little swelled up."
Mimi looked as her body inflated as KAri used the spell without her knowing. She lifed into the air and Kari grabed her foot and tried a string to her leg and walked to where Gatomon and Sora were.
Kari: "Here you go. A nother inflatable friend for you two."
Kari walked off again leaving Sora, Gatomon and the newly inflated Mimi.
Sora: "Now where is she going?"
12211111111221.title: Ballooning Mimi

122111111112211.content:
Kari smiles. "It's a good thing using any spell on you in this book allows you guys to regenerate. Wouldn't want you girls to be in a million pieces forever." Kari smiles, obviously bored.

Kari looks them over. "Now, who should go first...how about...Gatomon?" Kari says.

Having already popped, Gatomon really didn't mind. "Sure. How are you gonna pop me anyway?" Gatomon asks.

Kari giggles and murmurs a spell to herself. Suddenly, Gatomon's head, feet, and hands sink into her body, making her a perfect orb. Kari giggles. "Big ball goes boom." she says, cutely.

Gatomon shuts her eyes and purrs. She expands until she is 40 feet wide. Gatomon rumbles a bit, then finally explodes in a puff of white smoke. A split second later, Gatomon falls out of the cloud and hits the ground. "And it's fast too." Kari says.

Gatomon shakes her head, trying to regain her bearings. "I'll say."

Kari scratches her head. [Hum...that looked like fun. Maybe I should do it to myself?] she thinks.
122111111112211.title: Kitty go Boom!

1221111111122111.content:
"Hmmm...Why not~" Kari said outloud.

The trio looked at her curiously as Kari repeated the spell and suddenly she fwoomped, making her friends gasp as they watched Kari swell to Sora's and Mimi's size, then continued to blow up bigger and bigger. Kari giggled, as her limbs began to sink into her ballooned body, followed by her head.

"Wow! Look how big she's getting!" Sora exclaimed.

"Yeah! Girl can really balloon!" Mimi added

Kari never expected the sensation to be such a rush for her, as her body reached the size of 70 feet wide before it began to rumble and then exploded with a loud bang!

Flopping on the ground Kari sat up as she let out a joyfull laugh, as she hugged Gatomon against her chest.

"Wow! That was amazing!" She said, smiling at her companions

"Well, what shall we do now Kari?" Gatomon asked curiously.
1221111111122111.title: Kari pops herself.

choices: They discover a side effect for Sora that didn't happen to Gatomon
12211111111221112.content:
"Pop one of the other girls, obviously," Kari said with a delighted grin.

Sora and Mimi glanced at each other, a little nervous over how Kari was acting, but deciding to go along with it for now since there wasn't much they could do anyway.

"You should pop Sora!" Gatomon suggested. "She wouldn't let me pop her earlier."

"You weren't sure if it would kill us!" Sora protested.

"Now we know it doesn't!" Gatomon countered, "so what's the problem?"

Kari is a little confused about what happened when she was away inflating Mimi so Gatomon fills her in. Afterwards, she ponders. "Interesting. So if I use my magic to inflate somebody past their limits and pop them, they regenerate in their normal size, but if you pop them with something sharp, they regenerate as a balloon." She looks at Sora with a smile. "I want to see!"

Sora sighs, knowing there's nothing she can say and it seems perfectly safe anyway. "Fine."

Kari claps. "All right!"

Gatomon brandishes her claws. "May I?" she asks her trainer. Sora shivers.

"Go for it!" Kari exclaims.

"Wait, what is wrong with you two?" Mimi asks, but she's ignored as Gatomon bounds forward and pokes her claws into Sora's body.

Sora gasps, goosebumps spreading across her ballooned body from the spot where Gatomon punctured her, and she pops. Within seconds, her body regenerates and refills with air, and she floats there, a little dazed.

"Whoaaa," she murmurs.

Kari cheers. "That was awesome!"
12211111111221112.title: Pop Sora next

choices: Inflate herself and Gatomon into large balloons
122111111112211121.content:
"Hey, let's do the same to Mimi!" Gatomon suggested.

"Hey, now wait for a minute! I didn't agree to this!" Mimi exclaimed.

"Shush, you also didn't agree to be a balloon and yet here you are." Sora murmured "Besides, it wasn't that bad. Once you get passed being dazed."

Mimi glared at Sora, while Kari gave a nod and gave Gatomon a thumbs up. Brandishing her sharp claws, the feline didn't waste time and then sank them into Mimi's puffy body. Letting out a surprised yelp, Mimi then popped just like Sora and within seconds she regenerated and was back to being big and puffy like Sora.

"Hehehee..Oh man, this is awesome!" Kari said, giggling and hugging her feline friend close.

"Oooo..O-Okay...Must admit...isn't half bad...But man does it make me somewhat dizzy..." Mimi replied, shaking her head a little bit.
122111111112211121.title: Mimi's turn to pop

choices: Kari decides Gatomon needs to be a balloon again.
Gatomon goes on a popping frenzy.
1221111111122111211.content:
Kari clapped and laughed. "My turn!"

Gatomon purred. "Oh, I can't wait to pop you."

Kari giggled and cast the spell. She rapidly inflated, gasping and cooing as she did so. The other girls watched as she grew to their size and then stopped. "Okay, I'm ready!" she said excitedly.

"You're gonna like it," Sora said, watching eagerly.

"You're all nuts," Mimi groaned.

Gatomon brandished her claws and gently ran them along Kari's inflated body, teasing her. Kari shivered from both the touch and the anticipation. "Do it!" she squealed.

"As you wish!" Gatomon said, and sank her claws into Kari's body.

Kari cried out and popped, and quickly regenerated and inflated again.

"Woooooooooow," she drawled. "That was amazing." She giggled as she recovered. "Okay, let's see... what should we do now?"
1221111111122111211.title: Kari's turn

choices: Just see how huge they can grow
12211111111221112111.content:
"Hmmm..Ya know, not fair that Gatomon is missing on the fun here~" Kari purred.

Gatomon grinned knowing what was gonna happen next, as Kari repeated the spell with the feline blowing up into a big round balloon once more, with her paws and tail sunken in.

"Aaah! Thanks, Kari feels so good to be big and round again" Gatomon said with a content purr.

"Hehehe..Yeah! It does feel nice~" She replied.

"Sooo..Wacha crazies wanna do now?" Sora asked, raising her eyebrow.
12211111111221112111.title: Kari decides Gatomon needs to be a balloon again.

choices: Kari just lets herself and everyone else float high in the sky.
Kari makes herself and everyone else bigger.
122111111112212.content:
"Hum...maybe mom would like to have some fun with us." Kari says, as she heads home.

At Kari's apartment, Mrs. Kamiya was sitting on the couch, watching TV. Mrs. Kamiya looks like what Kari would if Kari was around 25 years old. Her hair is almost the same, but her hair in back is tied together. (In other words, she is extremely cute, and is still relitively young.)

"Hello, Kari." Mrs. Kamiya says, as Kari enters the house.

Kari smiles. "Hiya, mom. Anything new?" she asks.

Mrs. Kamiya shakes her head. "No. What about you?"

"Well, I want to show you something, but it's in the park." Kari says.

Mrs. Kamiya smiles. "Ok, Kari. Lead the way." she says.

---

Later, in a grassy and secuded area of the Park.

"Ok, Kari, what do you want to show me?" Mrs. Kamiya asks.

Kari smiles. "Close your eyes. When I say open them, look down."

(We'll just call Kari's mom Kamiya from now on.)

Kamiya does so. Kari casts the same spell on Kamiya that she cast on Gatomon, Sora, and Mimi. "You can open them now."

Kamiya looks down to see her body bloat up like a balloon. "Huh? What's this?" Kamiya asks.

Kari giggles as she ties a string to her neck. "That's just part of the surprise, mom. I'm going to show you the other part, now." Kari says, walking off as Kamiya slowly forms into an orb.

---

Later, back with Kari's balloon collection.

"Kari, why am I and your friends blown up like balloons?" Kamiya asks, as she is tied down next to Sora.

Kari grins. "Just playing around, mom." she says, happily.

"So, what are you going to do with us?" Kamiya asks.

Kari giggles. "We're all going on a balloon ride." Kari ties a string from her neck to the ground, then casts the spell on herself. Within moments, Kari inflates until she is as large as the others.

Somehow, the strings snap, and they all float into the air.

---
122111111112212.title: Kari's Big Mama.

1221111111122121.content:
'Oh well.'Kari thought as she felt the string break. 'I guess all we can do now is just float on up.'

-----

"Excuse me, but aren't you one of Kari's friends?" Kamiya asked. She was asking Sora, as she was the closest one.

"Um yes." Sora replied.

"Do you know why Kari's doing this?" Kamiya asked.

Sora shook her head in response. "No, she just came to me house, blew me up and eventually brought me here."

Kamiya sighed. "This is the second time Kari's done this."

"She blew you up before?" Sora asked. "When?"

"About nine years ago when she was concieved." Kamiya deadpanned.

Sora figured out Kamiya was talking about. "Oh. That."

Suddenly, a strong gust picked up, scattering everyone.

"Oh great, what next?" Kamiya asked.

==

Who do you stay with?
1221111111122121.title: Let's see the forecast for this!

12211111111221211.content:
Somehow, Kari and Gatomon manage to stay together.

"Kari, what do we do now?" Gatomon asks.

Kari smiles. "Don't worry, Gatomon. We can float around for a while. Besides, this is nice, so just enjoy yourself."

Gatomon shakes her head. "How can you enjoy yourself at a time like this?" she asks, as the two continue to float further away from the others.

Meanwhile...
12211111111221211.title: Relax, Gatomon.

12211111111221212.content:
Kamiya sighs. "Hum, Kari's really gotten us into a big mess this time."

She giggles. "I would ground her if this whole being a human balloon thing wasn't starting to feel pleasant."

Suddenly, a bird lands on Kamiya's skin.

Kamiya looks a little scared. "Shoo..come on, shoo."

The bird doesn't move. "For the love of God, shoo!" she says. The outburst causes the bird to get spooked enough to cause one of it's talons to break Kamiya's skin. A quick burst of air rushes from the hole, blowing the bird away. The hole quickly repairs itself.

Kamiya grins. "Heh, Kari must have thought of everything. Well, almost everything." she says.

"I wonder how the other's are doing, anyway?" she asks.
12211111111221212.title: Balloon and Bird.

choices: Find a way to make herself bigger!
122111111112212121.content:
Meanwhile Gatomon was starting enjoy being a big cat balloon.

"mrrrr..Ehehe..This isn't half bad actually. I could really get used to it" She purred, closing her eyes.

Opening them again, from the corner of her eyes she could see Kari's mother who def looked bigger. That did give Gatomon an idea maybe she should be bigger, as it would probably be even more enjoyable.
122111111112212121.title: Check on Gatomon.

1221111111122122.content:
'This is nice.' Kari thought. Kari remembered what she planned to do once she and the others got high enough. 'I wonder if I should though? Mom might not like that. On the other hand, she might enjoy it.'

Kari spoke a few words, and in the next second, she and everyone else began to inflate even more. Especially Kamiya, who was already taller than the girls to begin with.

As the girls inflated further, they started to bump into each other. The collisions, though the same as just bumping into each other, was enough to knock them away from each other.

-----

"When I get my hands on Kari, she's going to grounded for a month!" A still inflating Kamiya snarled. "Figuratively and literally."

Kamiya looked around her. The girls were roughly 50 to 100 feet away from her, and at triple their previous size. But for some reason, Kamiya was five times her previous size, and still growing. Not only that, but she started to lift higher into the sky, and she felt her inflation accelerating.

"If I can get back to Kari. But on the plus side, inflating like this isn't bad at all."
1221111111122122.title: Jumbo sized

12211111111221222.content:
Kamiya smiles. "On second thought, maybe I won't ground her. This is really starting to feel good." she says, as she rubs her massively distended body.

At this moment, Kamiya is around 10 feet wide, while the girls are around 8 feet wide. Kamiya watches as she moves further away from the girls. "I just hope I don't go too high. This is nice, but it's not worth getting blown far away from home." Kamiya says.
12211111111221222.title: Rethinking Things

choices: Bumps into one of the girls
122111111112212221.content:
"aaah...This is the life. Just being huge and floating without a care in the world." Kari murmured.

Looking at her huge puffy body, she gave a soft giggle as she was just now 8 feet wide, though there was always a chance to grow bigger and bigger. Maybe until they were planets, after all they were now just huge balloons so why not make the whole experience even more relaxing.
122111111112212221.title: Kari.

1221112.content:
Kari and Gatomon were floating higher and higher into the air. While Kari was turned upside down, Gatomon was upright enough to see where they were going. What she saw didn't please her.

'Clouds?' Gatomon thought as she and Kari passed through a small one. 'This isnt good.'

Gatomon was right. At higher altitudes, the lack of pressure would make her and Kari widen much faster, possibly beyond what their bodies could handle. Plus the clouds they were passing didn't look too inviting.

The only option open in Gatomon's mind was Digivolution. As Angewomon, she could fly back to the ground, with Kari in tow. It might also remove all the gas from her body.

"Well, here goes." Gatomon said, focusing on her transformation. Kari moved herself in time to see Gatomon begin.
1221112.title: It's like the opposite of Wile E. Coyote's

12211122.content:
As Gatomon digivolved, she felt all the gas being expeled from her body. When her transformation was finished, Angewomon was back to her normal size.

'That was easy.' Angewomon thought as she grabbed Kari and pulled her down.

-----

"Why did you digivolve?" Kari asked. She had stopped inflating recently.

"I just thought we were going too high that's all." Angewomon answered.

Upon landing, Angewomon was trying to find a way to deflate Kari. She obviously couldn't go home in her current size.

-----

It had been a hour since Kari and Angewomon had entered the funhouse. Kari was still being held down by Angewomon, although Angewomon was lucky and found a weight and some rope to tye Kari down.

"You know, it isn't that bad being inflated and all." Kari said.

"I know." Angewomon said. "I just don't want you floating away from me. I'm going to look for some equipment to deflate you, I'll be right back."

"Don't hurry on my account. I like being huge." Kari giggled. "You might like too. I wouldn't be suprised if you came back bigger than I am." Angewomon just rolled her eyes.

-----

Angewomon had searched a dozen different hallways and still hadn't found anything that she could use. She was about to give up when she noticed a door she had overlooked. She remembered seeing it earlier, but just didn't open.

"Why not?" Angewomon asked nobody in particular.

Opening the door, Angewomon found the opposite of what wanted; inside the room were dozens of assorted gas tanks.

'This won't work.' Angewomon thought. As she closed the door, she remembered when she was inflated. Angewomon kept the temptation at bay by remembering Kari, but she also remembered that she liked being inflated. Kari also seemed to hint that she wanted her, Angewomon, to be inflated as well.

"Oh why not?" Angewomon said, walking back inside.

-----

Angewomon selected a helium tank and put the hose in her mouth.
12211122.title: Touchdown

choices: Go back to Kari now, so that they can both inflate together.
122111221.content:
Angewomon grins as she turns the dial on the tank. She grins as the helium causes her body to swell up. Within moments, Angewomon's body starts to make her limbs sink in.

---

After a few minutes, the tank runs dry. Angewomon's limbs are almost gone, with only a little bit of her arms and legs sticking out. Otherwise, Angewomon would be completely round.

"Is that all that tank holds?" she asks. She then looks at the other tanks. "Kari might like this find...but then again, I want to be rounder than this when I go back to Kari."
122111221.title: Angewomon Balloons

choices: Turn back to Gatomon and then inflate
1221112211.content:
"Hmmm..naaah, wouldn't be right to hog all the fun" Angewomon purred.

Floating her round body back to Kari, her friend gasped seeing the puffy Angel.

"wow! Look who's nice and puffy!" She said, as Angewomon patted her puffy body proudly.

"Yeah, an it feels SO good~" Angewomon purred "C'mon, I'll show you the loot!"

Later they were back at the tanks as Kari looked at it with glee.

"Soooo...What shall we do now, Kari?"
1221112211.title: Go back to Kari now, so that they can both infl...

1221112212.content:
"I'm sure Kari wouldn't mind." Angewomon decided as she turned the tank back on.

Angewomon felt her limbs sink deeper into her orb like body. She was mesmerized by the feeling of her skin growing taut, and the air moving throughout her body. Within five minutes, Angewomon was completely round, except for her head, hands, and feet. She looked like an overly decorated party balloon.

Well, that was fun. Angewomon thought. I should get Kari in here.

Although her legs were of little use, Angewomon could still fly around. But when she tried to get out the door, there was a little problem. The door was two feet wide, but Angewomon was five feet too wide.

Oh great. I can try and blast my way through, but I'd have to throw my arrow. And I doubt I can make that accurate a throw at this size. Angewomon thought. Or I could just squeeze through.
1221112212.title: Digivolving boosts size more than one way

choices: Kari brings a bunch of tanks out.
Kari decides to inflate inside the room.
12211122121.content:
Angemon struggles, and little by little, she manages to 'flow' out of the door. "Ok, now to get back Kari." Angewomon says, as she flies toward Kari's direction.

---

Angewomon gets back to Kari.

Kari giggles. "Two questions. How did you get like that, and where did you get like that?" Kari asks.

Angewomon smiles and manages to grab the rope that tied Kari down. "This way." Angewomon says.

---

Back at the room with the tanks.

"I had some trouble getting out of the room at this size." Angewomon says. "Do you think you could go in and bring a bunch out?"

Kari nods. "Ok." she says.

Kari floats into the room and looks at the tanks. "Wow, so many of them..." she comments.
12211122121.title: Kari's Turn.

122111221211.content:
"How many do you want?" Kari asked from inside the room.

Angewomon would've shrugged if she could. "I don't know. Bring six out."

Kari brought out the number of tanks Angewomon requested. It was somewhat difficult as Kari could get a good grip on the tanks in her current state. "Where do you think should use them?"

Angewomon blinked. "That's a good point." She looked around her. " We don't have much room in this hallway. And I don't want to go back in there."

"Well, there might be another room somewhere around here." Kari suggested. "Or we could just go to the Digiworld."

"Well we have to pick a place." Angewomon said. "Where do you think we should go?"
122111221211.title: Moving out

choices: About 2 to 3 times bigger than she is now.
1221112212112.content:
"Why don't we just go to the Digiworld? We might have a better chance of not running into anyone we know there." Kari says.

Angewomon nods.

---------------------

A little later, a large desert somewhere in the digiworld.

Kari smiles. "This place is a great area for us to get bigger in. There's nothing but sand for miles around." she says.

Angewomon looks at the tanks, then at Kari. "So...uhm, where should I put it?" Angewomon asks.

Kari thinks for a moment. "How about my belly button?" Kari ask.

Angewomon pulls out a hose, and looks at Kari's navel. "With it all stretched out like that, it might fit." Angewomon says.

She takes the hose over to Kari, then almost effortlessly put it into her navel. Kari giggles a bit from this.

Angewomon smiles. "Ok, pointless question, but are you ready?" she asks.

Kari nods. With that, Angewomon turns the dial on the tank the hose is attached to.

The moment Angewomon turned on the tank, the rest of Kari's limbs dissappeared into her body. As she reached the point where she was inflated up to her hands, feet, and head, those very parts also sank into her body.

Angewomon watched as the last bits of Kari disappeared, leaving only a light beige ball with Kari's clothing on.

Angewomon turns off the tank and floats over to the 'Kari-sphere'. She took a closer look and noticed that Kari's face was staring out of the neck hole of Kari's shirt. Circlular breaks in her clothing showed where her limbs, hands, and feet used to be.

Angewomon tilts Kari over until she is face to face with her. "How's this?" Angewomon asks.

Kari giggles. "I can't decide. Make me bigger, and maybe then I can tell you."

"And how much bigger should I make you?" Angewomon asks.

"Why don't you decide that for yourself?" Kari says.
1221112212112.title: Really Round Kari

12211122121122.content:
Kari says, "Don't stop till I'm HUGE, OK Angewomon."
Angewomon just goes down to the tanks and turns the knob to full. Kari's body quickly grows larger... and larger... and larger... the tank doesn't run out untill she is around 300' wide. Then all of a sudden she stops. Her libms have seemingly vanished and her head seems to be lost in the gigantic ball that is Kari. Somehow her clothes STILL fit, they seemed to have streched with her body. Angewomon just smiles at how large Kari has become, and flies over to where she thinks Kari's face is. After a while of searching, Kari's head is finnaly found, sunk into her body quite a bit, Kari seems to be sleeping at the moment just enjoying the feeling of being so large. Angewomon atempts to roll Kari so her face is facing up, then lies down (as best she can) on top of Kari near her head. And soon also falls asleep. When they wake up Kari asks, "what happened, I'm so big." Angewomon just replies, you emptied the tank. ummm, I was wondering, if, umm, You could get me as big as you..." Kari thinks for a minute and then says, "Well we could use the tanks..."
to which Angewomon replies, "Or you could blow your air into me..."
Kari has to think a little about that one. Kissing her best friend after all... it would feel wierd, but it would be faster, and she might get back to small enough to move around a bit..."
12211122121122.title: Kari was big, now she's HUGE

choices: try some helium (more if that was in the tanks)
122111221211221.content:
Kari: "Ok, i'll blow you up."
Angewomom took Kari's inflated body and kissed her on the lips, Kari then started to blow into Angewomon, as she did this Kari found out that it felt kinda nice kissing and blowing up her friend like a balloon. Soon Angewomon was aboout 45 feet round.
Angewomon: "Thanks Kari."
Kari: "Your welcome, but now what should we do now?"
122111221211221.title: blow up angel

choices: The path leads to another part of the fun house.
The path leads to the outside world.
1222.content:
"A swell life forever? That sounds pleasant." Kari says. Kari runs into the path, with Gatomon close behind.

Kari and Gatomon walk down the path until they get to a wall with a place for someone to put their hands. A plaque on the wall reads, "Place hands on the slots, but be warned that when you do this, there is no turning back."

Kari giggles. "Wow, these attractions always seems so realistic. Alright, here I go."

Kari places her hands on the plaque. Suddenly, she starts to twitch as if she was being electricuted, as a pink, static like aura surrounds her.

"Kari!" Gatomon yells. A moment after Gatomon called out to Kari, she was thrown back. She gets up, with a soft, pink aura now surrounding her.

"Wow, what a rush." Kari says. She looks herself over, and notices that her skin is starting to turn a shiny hot pink color. "What the...?" Kari says.

The wall starts to lift into the ceiling, reveiling a large passageway. Without warning, Kari begins to inflate rapidly. "Whoa!" Kari yells, as her limbs start to dissappear into her body.

Kari closes her eyes and grins as her hands and feet start to sink into her body.

Gatomon, however, is too shocked to react. "K-k-k-kari." Gatomon stutters.

As Kari's fingers and toes dissappear into her, the aura around Kari fades, leaving her as a large sphere with her head attached.

"Oh my god...Kari..." Gatomon says, awestruck at the sight of the bloated girl.

Kari looks herself over and smiles. "'A swell life forever', it says. Being a balloon forever sounds great to me." Kari says.

Gatomon blinks. "Wow, I've never seen this side of you before."

Kari starts to hop down the passageway that had opened. "Come on, Gatomon." she yells, as she continues to bounce/roll down the path.

Gatomon runs after her. "Well, she cetainly adapts quickly." Gatomon comments.
1222.title: Down the Road, Path 2

12221.content:
Kari and Gatomon find themselves in a hallway with an arch. Kari floats through effortlessly, but when Gatomon tries to walk through, she seems to hit an invisible wall.

"Ouch! What the..." Gatomon looks up. "It says... 'This part of the Fun House is for balloons only?'" she reads off the arch.

"Looks like you'll have to balloonify yourself if you want to go through..." Kari says.

<I want to go with Kari...> Gatomon thinks... <but how will everyone else react when they see me?>
12221.title: Gatomon's Decision...

122211.content:
"Wait here, Kari." Gatomon says. Kari nods, as Gatomon runs back to where Kari became a balloon.

There, another place for someone to put their hands had appeared, as well as another plaque. This one read "Just in case you wanted to be a balloon and the passage happened to be opened for some deranged reason. Oh, and you can't go back to not being a balloon."

Gatomon rolls her eyes. "Ok, here goes nothing..."

---

Kari is waiting where Gatomon told her to. "I wonder what's keeping Gatomon." she said. "Oh, wait, there she is!" Kari says, as she spots Gatomon floating down the path, inflated just like Kari was. "There, now we can go."

Kari giggles. "You look much cuter like that."

Kari floats throught the barrier, as does Gatomon. On the other end...
122211.title: Gato's turn.

choices: Someone else or some other people?
1222111.content:
"What... is this?" Kari and Gatomon exclaimed in unison.

It was the balloon town from Kari's dream.

"This is the same town as in my dream! Then that means... this is my dream come true?" Kari said.

"Geez, fate sure picked a strange dream of yours to become true." Gatomon said.

Suddenly, some figures came floating up to greet them...
1222111.title: The Other Side

choices: Sora and Mimi know their way around the town.
12221111.content:
Gatomon chuckles. "It seems this attraction is more attractive than we thought."

Mimi, Sora, and Biyomon float up when they see Kari and Gatomon. All of them are inflated just like Kari Gatomon. As colors go, Mimi is neon green, Sora is red, and Piyomon is pink.

Kari smiles, happy to see some familiar faces. "Sora, Mimi, Biyomon, how did you get here?"

"Well, Sora figured what the sign really meant by sell. She wanted to be a balloon, so I went along...to...uhm...watch." Mimi says.

Sora chuckles. "You don't have to lie to her. You pratically begged me to let you come along as well."

Mimi chuckles. "I would have perfered if it actually let you chose your colors, instead of just randomly giving us one. I mean, green totally clashes with red." Mimi complains.

Biyomon giggles. "But you know what they say, Mimi. Beggers can't be choosers." Biyomon says.

Mimi nods. "True." she says.

Kari smiles. "Well, do you guys know if there is anything to do here?" Kari asks.
12221111.title: The Gang's All Here

1222112.content:
Beyond the barrier there was a small room made of brick with a large hole in the celing. As they entered, they began to feel lighter and started floating into the middle of the room. "Wow...kind of cozy, isn't it?" Kari giggled as she rolled around in mid air. She noticed a sign on the wall that read.

"THE TIME HAS COME TO CHOOSE YOUR DESTINY. HAVE FUN BEING ROUND FOREVER!"
Kari smiled as she floated toward Gatomon "Hmm...'chose your destiny?' I wonder what's going to happen next?"

Suddenly, a strong wind started sucking both girls up the large tunnel on the celing. Kari started to swell up larger and rounder untill only her face remained on the side of her 10' round form. Gatomon had ballooned to half that size, the last bit of her tail and ears poking out of her white orb-body. They floated up untill they came into a spacious glass room. There were two 20' wide ports large enough for both girls to glide through, they were labeled...
1222112.title: Swollen Destiny

12221121.content:
Kari giggled and started to drift toward the Blimp tunnel. "Hmm...being a blimp forever sounds like fun, I think I'll do this. How about you Gatomon?"

Gatomon looked around a bit. "Hmm...well, it would be nice having to worry about fighting in the digital world anymore..." She glanced around and found a tube much too small for Kari. Atop it was a sign that read "For little balloons only; Become an unbreakable Pool Toy!"

"Ooo, I like playing with kids..but do I really want to leave Kari..."
12221121.title: Kari decides on Blimp

choices: "One blimp and one small white cab....
122211212.content:
"Hmm...nah, Kari would get into all kinds of trouble without me." Gatomon then floated close to her freind as they floated through the glass tunnel. They could see the entire city benieth them, but were unable to gauge how high they were. In front of them, it looked like they were heading toward a floating factory, a giant metal airship on top of a huge rotor. The girls found themselves being pulled by a strong wind as they neared the entrance.

Inside, the factory was surprisingly open spaced, aside from the odd gear assembly above and several dozen gas tanks sticking out of the wall. "Wow...this place is neat." Kari smiled as she floated deeper.

"Just be sure not to pop yourself on those gears..." Gatomon said as she stayed close to her partner. All of a sudden, a dozen metal hands decended and started holding Kari and Gatomon in place. A televison screen on a robotic arm decended before her. "Eeeek!"

A box appeared on the screen as a mechanical voice spoke what text appeared in the box. "Twin Blimp Units Have Arrived. Cab Assembly Still Missing?"

"Cab Assembly?" Kari thought for a moment what it could mean, then she smiled. "Oh, that thing under the blimp..hmm..." SHe looked at Gatomon with a mischevious grin....
122211212.title: The factory in the sky

1222112122.content:
"Whaaaat?!" Gatomon looked up at Kari with a start as the hands pulled her downward. The hands that held Kari moved her up toward the spacious celing.

The robot voice chimed in. "Blimp assembly in progress." Kari squirmed eagerly as a hose on an arm moved closer to her mouth. She closed her eyes and opened wide as the hose filled her mouth and began pumping lighter than air gas. Kari felt herself swell immensly as the mechanical hands began stretching her into an appropriate shape.

Meanwhile, Gatomon was stretched wide and long, a hose pushing inside her mouth as she wiggled in protest. Eventually, she accepted what was happening and closed her eyes as she swelled outward in a half-circle shape. After a few moments, her back was painted with some kind of liquid as she was pushed skyward.

After a while, Kari had virtually dissapeard into her 60' long, 30' wide body; Her face looked super-puffy at the nose of her blimp body. She gasped as something large and cool was pushed to her underside, but then smiled as she heard Gatomon's voice. "Eeep...whats...whats happened to me!?"

Kari giggled like the airhead she had become. "Heehe, we're a blimp now, silly." As the machines finished, a large rudder was secured to her tail end, along with a pair of rotors for stabilty.

"Blimp unit KA-RI compleate...." The mechanical voice echoed. "Proceed to docking bay with other blimps."

"Other blimps...I wonder..."
1222112122.title: Kari the Blimp- For Real!

choices: Kari decides to play with the helium
123.content:
Kari went to the balloon stand, only to find that noone was there...

"Looks like nobody's here, Kari." Gatomon said.

"Hmm..." Kari thought...
123.title: The Unattended Balloon Stand...

choices: Kari grows to the size of a house
Kari grows to the size of a whale
1231.content: Kari placed the helium tube in her mouth, and turned the dial. She felt the air build up in her body, causing her to inflate. Her body swelled and swelled into an orb shape, and her limbs sink into her ballooning flesh.
1231.title: Kari Bloats

choices: Kari manages to stick a tube in Gatomon's mouth
12311.content:
"Kari, what are you doing?" Gatomon asked, very confused.

Kari spit out the tube. "I'm a big balloon!" Kari giggled, in a high pitched voice.

"...This is so unlike you." Gatomon rolled her eyes.

Suddenly...
12311.title: Big Happy Kari

123111.content:
Gatomon too begins to float, as she begins to form into an orb shape and her limbs sunk into her body. "Hey, you're right! This is kinda of fun!" smiled Gatomon, before the two began to float up.

"Uh...what know?" said Kari.
123111.title: The Inflated Digidestined and Partner

choices: They float around for a bit until...
1231111.content:
Suddenly, Kari and Gatomon start floating away...

"Uh oh... I should have tied us down first..." Kari said.

"Well, we can't stop it now. We might as well go where the wind carries us." Gatomon replied.
1231111.title: Floating Away

12311111.content:
Soon, Kari and Gatomon see a balloon factory, with big balloons attached to the roof. "Quick, grab the cords!" shouted Kari, before the two grabbed them. They climbed down into the building, and tried to keep away from open windows. "Hey Kari, look at those helium tanks," smiled Gatomon.

"I bet I can get inflated bigger than you can!" challenged Kari.

"You're on!" accepted Gatomon, before the two bloated girls began the contest...
12311111.title: The Contest

123111111.content:
Kari and Gatomon begin their contest, and after the tanks are emptied of their contents, Kari turned out to be much bigger than Gatomon.

Kari giggles. "I did it." she said, patting her body as well as she could.

"You big showoff." Gatomon says with a smirk on her face.

"Ok, so now what should we do?" asked Kari.
123111111.title: Kari Gets the Spoils.

choices: Deflate, then look for the other digidestined girls
123111112.content:
Eventually, after the helium tanks were exhausted...

Gatomon turned out to be bigger!

"I win! I win!" Gatomon said happily, in a very high-pitched voice.

"Well, I didn't win, but I still got big!" Kari said, a little upset, but still very happy.

"There's one little thing, though... what are we going to do now?" Gatomon said.
123111112.title: Gatomon 1, Kari 0

1231111122.content:
"Hey, there's a balloon parade today. Let's sneak in and pretend to be balloons," smiled Gatomon.

"Okay, but aren't parade balloons more inflated than we are?" asked Kari, before Gatomon smiled and they went to find to more helium tanks.
1231111122.title: The Plan

choices: Enlist the help of the other digidestined and digimon
12311111221.content:
Kari and Gatomon quickly swelled to the size of parade balloons...

"Well, now that that's done, how are we going to get to the parade?" Gatomon asked.

"Hmm..." Kari said.
12311111221.title: Fit for a Parade

123111112212.content: "Digivolve me into Angewomon, and I can carry us there," said Gatomon. Kari nodded, and Gatomon changed into Angewomon, before carrying Kari to the parade. When they get there, Angewomon devolves back to Gatomon and they join in the parade.
123111112212.title: The Parade Begins

choices: Do something else, Tai might freak out or something.
1231111122121.content:
One on the people on the floats notice Kari and Gatomon.

"Hey, I don't recall thoes balloons being in the parade...oh well, it must be a surprise or something." he said to no one in peticular.

Going back to Kari and Gatomon...

"Kari, what if somemon we know sees us like this?" Gatomon asked, somewhat conserned.

Kari looks somewhat puzzled. "Hum...that's a good question..." she ponders to herself.

What should they do...
1231111122121.title: The Parade.

12311111221211.content:
"Let's show off!" Kari said.

"If you say so." Gatomon said.

So the parade continued on, and...
12311111221211.title: Showoff time!

choices: Break from the parade to talk to T.K.
123111112212111.content:
So they both float around in the parade, and keep up with the flow of traffic. "Wait until everyone sees us." Kari said.

Meanwhile, at the TV station, Matt's dad is watching over the parade on the screens, when he sees a screen of Kari and Gatomon. "Hum...why do those balloons look so familiar?" he says, then he reconizes them. "What on earth? Isn't that Tai's sister and her Digimon? Oh my god, it is!" he exclaims.

At the Kamiya residence, a similar reaction is taking place. "Wha...the...heck?" Tai manages to sputter, before fainting. Their parents look on, both with a raised eyebrow.

Back at the parade, T.K. and his mom see Kari and Gatomon pass by. Nancy just watches in absolute confusion, while T.K. looks on with a sort of facination. "Hey, she looks pretty cute like that." he says, blushing a bit.

Kari notices T.K. on the ground. "Hey, there's T.K. Maybe I should stop and talk to him..."
123111112212111.title: Moving With Parade.

choices: TK  really likes Kari's new look
TK... isn't so happy about Kari's new look
1231111122121111.content:
"I think we should go see him. It'd really surprise him!" Kari said.

"All right, then." Gatomon agreed.

At the next opportunity, Kari and Gatomon broke formation, making sure not to scare the crowd. They managed to squeeze into an alley and not be seen. When the coast was clear...

"Psst... TK..." Kari whispered.

"...Huh?" TK turned around.

"Come here..." Kari said.

TK entered the alley...

"Kari? Gatomon? Is that really you?!"

"Yes, it's me..." Kari said. "Hi!"
1231111122121111.title: Surprise!

12311111221211111.content:
TK takes a moment to look over Kari, then smiles. "Wow, how did you get like that?" he asks.

Kari giggles. "I was just playing 'round with a helium tank?" TK laughs a bit at the pun.

"Yea. But how can you two stay on the ground like that? Wouldn't you just float away like a balloons?"

Kari smiles. "We had to get rid of some of the helium inside us. In fact, we can't float much right now, since we let a lot of the helium out."

TK notices that Kari is quite a bit smaller than she was in the parade, but still large compared to himself. "Ok, I think I get it."

"So, you like?" Kari says, hoping for a positive reaction.

TK thinks for a moment. "Well...yea! You look cute like that!"

Kari fakes being offended. "So you mean I don't look cute any other time?" she says.

"Of course not...you just look cuter like that." TK says, his face now beet red. Kari just giggles some more.

Kari looks at TK. "So..."
12311111221211111.title: TK Approves

123111112212111111.content:
"So, why don't we go off some place more...comfortable?" Kari says.

"You mean like an airplane hangar?" TK says, laughing.

Kari laughs too. "Yea, something like that."

"We could always go back to that big helium warehouse." Gatomon suggests.

"I like the sound of that." TK says. Kari nods.

Gatomon digivolves into Angewomon. "Alright, let's go, then." she says. Angewomon picks them both up and flies them over to the warehouse. Once inside, Angewomon reverts to Gatomon. TK lands on top of Kari, who is still ballooned.

"Ok, now what are we gonna to do?" TK asks.

Kari thinks...
123111112212111111.title: Two's company, Three's a party.

1231111122121111111.content:
"Say TK..." Kari said.

"Yeah Kari?" TK replied.

"You said you like it when I'm big like this, right?" The ballooned girl asked.

"Of course I did." TK answers. Gatomon instantly knew where the conversation was going and left the two alone.

"Well, I think there are still some unused helium tanks left if you want to fill me up some more." Kari stated. There was an eager tone in Kari's voice.

TK blushed beet red. "Uh...okay." He mumbled before he left to search for fresh tanks.

-----

TK returned later with five tanks that Kari and Gatomon had missed during their contest. "Is this enough?"

Kari nodded. 'That'll do just fine. Now just bring the tanks over here so I can get my mouth on the nozzles."

TK brought a tank and helped Kari get her mouth on.
