"I shall make them inflate and burst at the exact same time!" The Magician says, as he waves his wand. As they swell up, Kari and Gatomon hold each other's hand. They end up taking up the entire space of the stage, and once they reach 50 feet wide, they burst once more.

However, when the girls regenerate, the Magician keeps them in the liquid form. "Now, watch as..."
124111.title: Now Together.

choices: The Magician lets Kari blow up Gatomon
1241111.content:
"I shall turn them into gum!" said the magician. The auidence gasps.
"Don't worry, I won't swallow" laughed the magician as he waved his magic wand and turned Kari and Gatomon into bubble gum. He put Kari into his mouth and started to chew. As he chewed, the auidence went wild; some of them screamed in terror, some just watched in stunned silence, while others were cheering.
A couple minutes later, the magician blew out a bubble. The bubble took the form of Kari as it got bigger and bigger. Finally, Kari had formed into herself and stood next to the magician. The audience cheered.
1241111.title: Kari Gum

12411111.content:
All that stuck out of Kari's body was her head and hands. The rest was a large pink bubble. The Magician turns to her.

"Now, why don't you do the same to your friend?" The magician asks. "And don't worry, she won't stick to you. I made you two in such a way that you won't be able to stick to each other."

Kari nods, and brings Gatomon into her mouth and starts chewing. After a while, Kari blows a bubble, which ends up forming Gatomon. Kari giggles when she's done, and sets Gatomon down next to her. "That was interesting, Kari." Gatomon says with a grin.

"And now, I shall turn them back to their normal state of matter in their current state of puffyness!" The Magician shouts, ready to wave his wand.
12411111.title: Gatomon's a Bubblemon. *runs*

124111111.content:
"Hold it" said Kari.

"What?" asked the magician.

"We kinda like being like this" said Kari, grinning.

"Yeah" said Gatomon.

The magician smiled. "Ok, how about you two stay like that for the rest of the day?" asked the magician.

"Sounds like fun" said Kari.

"Oh right" said the magician. "Hey, i got an idea. Let's have you eat someone"

"What?" asked Kari, shocked.

"Don't worry!" said the magician, "since you two are like balloons now, no harm will come to anyone!"

"Really?" asked Kari.

"Yes, indeed!" said the magician.

"Boy, I dunno if we should" said Gatomon.

"Where's your sense of fun?" asked Kari. Gatomon shrugged and grinned.
124111111.title: Balloon fun

choices: Push on Gatomon's side until she forces her way out.
Another way, without the Magician's aid.
1241111112.content:
Before Kari can even react, Gatomon has her head inside her mouth. As Gatomon gulps Kari down, she makes the bubble part of her body deflate, causing Gatomon to fill up with even more air. Once Gatomon is finishes, she let's Kari fall to the bottom of her body.

Kari reforms herself from inside of Gatomon and smiles. "Wow...from in here, you seem to be the of a house." Kari comments.

Gatomon nods. "Maybe that's because I AM as big as a house." Sure enough, from the outside, Gatomon is around 20 feet wide.

"Now...how shall I get you out of here when the time comes?" Kari asks.
1241111112.title: Kari's in Gatomon.

choices: Kari eats the auidence member that yelled "Eat me!"
12411111121.content:
Kari pushes on Gatomon's sides and slowly but surely forces herself out. Gatomon returns to her normal size and shape. Kari smiles and bows to the audience. One person in the auidence yells "Eat me!", but its almost drowned out by the cheering.

"That was fun!" said Kari.

"Yeah, what shall we do next?" asked Gatomon.
12411111121.title: Kari's turn

choices: Teri wants to spend the time Kari has inside of her.
Teri wants out now, but also wants to be part of the act.
124111111212.content:
Kari blinks, and looks to the audience, with a large grin on her face. "I know who I'll go for next." Kari say, as she stretches an arm into the audience, and then pulls it back in, holding the audience member who asked to be eaten. The person is a girl about the same age as Kari. "So, what's your name? Kari asked.

The girl grins. "My name is Teri, and what you did looked like fun! I want to try it too!" The girl exclaims in a very eager tone.

Kari smiles, and puts her hands around the girl's waist. "Well, you asked for it, so here it comes." Kari says, as she lifts the girl over her head. She turns her head upwards and opens her mouth wide, dropping Teri once she has done this. Since Teri was falling, she ends up in the middle of Kari within a few second, creating a huge bulge in Kari's midsection. The audience cheers while Teri giggles from inside.

Kari grins and rubs her expanded middle. "So...ready to come out yet, Teri?"
124111111212.title: Introducing Teri.

choices: TK stays in the balloon Kari
1241111112122.content:
"I want out now" said Teri. "but I want to become part of the act!"

"Hey, no problem with me" said the magician. "the more, the merrier!"

Teri got out of Kari the same way that Kari got out of Gatomon a few minutes ago. Teri smiled. The magican waved his wand and Teri started to swell up like a balloon. Teri kept on swelling up until she took up all of the stage and pops. Teri re-forms a few minutes later.

"Wow, that was interesting!" said Teri, giggling.
"Would anyone else like to join the act?" asked the magician.
Nearly everybody in the audience raised thier hand. Kari noticed someone in the back. It was TK! He had his hand raised. Kari went over to the magician and whispered in his ear. The Magician smiled.

"TK, would you please come down?" asked the magician.
TK smiled as he walked onto the stage, along with Patomon.
"Well, TK" said the magician. "looks like you want to have some fun too!" TK Nodded.
Kari pounced on TK and ate him in one gulp. TK fell to Kari's middle, making a huge buldge.
"This is nice" said TK, moving within the balloon Kari, which made her giggle.
"Looks like everybody that comes on stage has to be eaten first" said the magician.
"TK, you wanna get out or stay in there?" asked Kari.
1241111112122.title: TK's Turn

12411111121221.content:
"I'll just stay in here for now, Kari." Says TK, as he gets comfortable. Kari nods. "All right, then..." Kari smiles as her head turns to Teri. "Hrum...I think I have an idea on something you could do." Kari says. She whispers to the magician again, and the magician waves his wand at Teri, instantly turning Teri's body into gum.

Teri giggles. "Oooh...I think I know what you want me to do." Teri says. Kari nods, hoping they are on the same page.

Teri grins, goes over to Kari, and gulps her down. Kari giggles as she slides into Teri's belly. "Ahh...is that what you wanted, Kari?" Teri asks.

"Exactly what I wanted, Teri." Kari says. "Now...what could we do next..."
12411111121221.title: TK stays, Teri goes.

choices: Gatomon wants Patamon to eat her  next
124111111212211.content:
"Get Gatomon to swallow you!" laughed Kari in Teri's body.

The magician waved his wand at Gatomon making her body into gum. Gatomon smiled and swallowed Teri. Teri giggled when she landed in Gatomon's belly. Gatomen's belly was now HUGE, easily taking half the stage. The audience cheered.

TK had to giggle at the situation. He was in Kari's belly, who was in Teri's belly who was now in Gatomon's belly. It seemed that they needed someone to swallow Gatomon as well.
124111111212211.title: Gatomon's huge belly

choices: Yes, but make it so they can switch. (Apply to TK as well.)
No. Make it permenant. (Apply to TK as well.)
1241111112122111.content:
Gatomon smiles. "Why don't you gulp us all down, Patamon?" She says, motioning for him to come over to her.

Patamon scratches his head. "Well...ok. But only if I get a form where you won't fill up my entire body." He says.

The Magician, although not personally being asked to do this, fulfills Patamon's request. Now, Patamon looks like an anthropomorphic version of his normal form. Naturally, he's made of gum now. Patamon blinks for a moment. "...well...I guess that'll do it." He says, preparing to gulp down Gatomon and everyone else inside of her.

After a short amount of time passes, Patamon manages to get Gatomon into his belly. Patamon is laying on his back, with his belly towering over him. The audience is clapping and shouting at the feat, as the Magician bows to them. Patamon smiles and gives a thumbs up, and everyone inside of him giggles.

"Now, I am sorry to have to spoil your fun, but since I should restore you, I'll have to let you all out." The Magician says, with a wave of his wand. There is a burst of smoke, and when it clears, everyone is back to being on the outside. "Now, are you all ready to be changed back into your normal selves?"
1241111112122111.title: Last but not least, Patamon.

choices: Explore some more of the carnival.
12411111121221111.content:
Kari nods. "Yes, but we don't want to fully give up these powers...could you make it so we can switch back and forth at will?" Kari asks.

The Magician nods, and waves his wand. All five of them are restored to normal (Patamon is left in his anthro form, though.) They all take a bow, and walk off the stage as the Magician gets ready for the next show.

Teri grins. "So, where are we off to?" she asks.

Kari blinks. "Wait...we? Are you coming along with us, Teri?"

"Mmmhum. I've sort of grown attached to you guys. Besides, I need to burn some time, anyway." Teri replies.

Kari smiles. "Well, I guess it won't be too much of a problem. But still...where should we go?"
12411111121221111.title: Back to normal. Sort of. (And Teri tags along!)

choices: Tentomon shows up  (not sure on spelling)
124111111212211112.content:
"Why not let's go to the Digital World?" asked Patamon.

"Where's that?" asked Teri. "and...what's that?"

"It's where we're from" said Gatomon. "all we need is a computer..."


TK and Kari both explain what the Digital World is to Teri. "Wow" said Teri.

The group finds a laptop that looks familar. It's on the ground and out of the way. It was Kari who spotted it.

"Hey, isn't that Izzy's laptop?" asked TK.

"Looks like it" said Kari.

The group goes to the Digital World. They end up in a grassy field. The sun is shinning, and it was not too warm, but not too cold either. Teri's eyes went wide as she looked at the scencery.

"Izzy!" yelled Kari. "Are you here?"
124111111212211112.title: Digital World with Teri

choices: Tell him about the magic show.
Ask about what he was researching. (Convientely, it's related to what they d
1241111112122111121.content:
Izzy sweatdrops from where he is. "I'm right behind you..." he says, holding the laptop they came out of.

"Oh, sorry, Izzy. We thought you might have been further along or something." Kari says.

Izzy shakes his head. "No, no. I was just doing some research. Tentomon's on the other side, keeping track of my laptop. Is there any reason why you're here, anyway?"
1241111112122111121.title: There's Izzy.

choices: Kari shows Izzy what Teri meant
Kari tells Izzy about eating everyone in balloon form
12411111121221111211.content:
"No reason" said Kari. "we just wanted to visit the digital world"

"We were at the carnival" said TK.

"Yes, so I've heard" said Izzy.

"You've heard about what happened at the magic show?" asked Patamon. Izzy blinks at Patamon in his anthro form.

"Yes, of course" said Izzy. "I overheard some kids talking about it. And who else would have--and I'm quoting-- "Funny-looking animals that talked" "

"Yeah, well" said Kari. "the magician needed a volunteer and I was picked, and Gatomon followed me onstage"

"Hi, my name is Teri" said Teri.

"Er...Hello, Teri" said Izzy.

"She was in the act" said Kari, giggling

"And I wanted to be IN you" said Teri. Kari and Teri giggled.

"What are you talking out?" asked Izzy. Kari smiled. Sounded like Izzy hadn't heard EVERYTHING that happened at the magic show.
12411111121221111211.title: Izzy already knew ....sort of

choices: Izzy wants to stay for a while longer
Tentomon saw what happened through the laptop
124111111212211112111.content:
Kari turned into her balloon form and licked her lips. Before Izzy could say anything, Kari grabbed his waist and ate him. A few seconds later, Izzy was in Kari's belly.
"Whoa!" said Izzy in a mixture of fear and amazement. Kari giggled.
"This is...nice" said Izzy, trying to get comfortable.
"Teri liked it too" said TK.
Teri giggled and nodded.
TK, Kari and Teri told Izzy all about the magic show. Izzy was impressed by the magic.
"Ready to come out?" asked Kari.
124111111212211112111.title: Izzy in Kari

choices: Greymon wants to be swallowed next!
1241111112122111121111.content:
"I would to stay in here for a while" said Izzy.

Kari giggled. "He likes it!"


Suddenly, the ground starts to thump. Something BIG was coming towards the group. As it grew louder, Kari saw Greymon coming towards them with Tai on his shoulder. As Greymon came closer, Teri shreiked in terror and fainted.

"Hey, guys" said Tai. "Who's that?"

"A new friend" said TK.

"Her name is Teri" said Kari. Tai glanced at Kari and did a double take when he saw Izzy in Kari's belly. Kari was almost transparent, like a balloon.

"IZZY?!" Yelled Tai.

"Let me explain!" said Kari and the group told Tai what happened.

"That's...weird" said Tai.

"Sounds like fun to me" said Greymon.

"You would say that" said Tai.
1241111112122111121111.title: Here comes Tai

choices: Teri sees greymon and faints again
You're choice(don't end in the next chapter)
12411111121221111211111.content:
"I want to be eaten too!"said Greymon.
Just as Kari was about to eat Greymon, TK noticed a digivice materialize in Teri's hand.
"Isn't that a digivice?!"shouted TK
"Yea it is."said Tai
Then they saw a In-Training Digimon running(Bouncing/Hopping/Jumping)towards them.
When the digimon got to Teri she woke up.
"Hi I'm Raymon"said the digimon
(Raymon is the in-training level form of a new digimon called Raramon) (I made up Raymon. Raramon is an official digimon)
Then Kari eats Greymon.
"This is great!"said Greymon.
12411111121221111211111.title: Teri a digidestand!?!?

12411111121221111211112.content:
Kari sweatdrops. "Maybe you should revert to Agumon, Greymon." Kari says, conserned about Teri. Greymon nods, and does so.

A few moments later, Teri regains her senses. She focuses on Agumon. "Whoa...did you change to what you are now from that really big thing?" Teri asks. as she stands up.

Agumon nods. "I did. I have other forms too, though."

Teri smiles. "Oooh, can I see one of them?" She says, with a grin forming on her face.
12411111121221111211112.title: Back to Agumon.

choices: Teri wants to see more digimon in other forms
124111111212211112111122.content:
Agumon changes to MetalGreymon.

"Cool!" said Teri.

"All digimon can do that" said TK.

"Even yours?" asked Teri and looks at Patamon. "What does he change into? A giant puffball?"

TK sweatdrops, along with the others.

"I'll show you!" said Patamon and digivovles into Angemon. Teri's eyes nearly popped out of her head.

"You look human!" said Teri.

"An angel, actually" said Angemon. "but there's lots of digimon that take on human shape"

"Really?" asked Teri.

"Yep" said TK.
124111111212211112111122.title: Digivovle into....

choices: A Teri-size ball shape with her head, feet, and hands attached to it. (Rookie)
A volleyball-size ball with no other features in the outline. (In-Training)
1241111112122111121111222.content:
Suddenly, Kari notices a symbol on Teri's right and left arms that were not there before she was brought to the Digital World. "Teri, you've got some things on your arms." Kari says, looking at her curiously.

Teri takes a look at the symbols and blinks. The two symbols have the pattern of a volleyball on them. "Whoa...I wonder how they got there..." Teri wonders, scratching the symbol on her right arm. "...and it seems to be stuck there..."

The others look at her curiously, and the whole group gasps as Teri is suddenly bathed in a white light. The rest of the group looks on as the girl-shaped light slowly forms into a...
1241111112122111121111222.title: Girl into some kind of ball

choices: They see if Teri will digivolve if she's inflated enough.
Kari wants to find someone to let Teri's air out into.
12411111121221111211112222.content:
As the light faded, the group glanced at where Teri once stood. She didn't seem to be ther.

"Wow.. where'd she go?" Kari asked, looking around.

"Whoa. That was a rush." A squeaky voice came from the ground. Everyone looked down to see a small, flesh colored ball with Teri's suprised face plastered onto it. "Hey.. what happened to me? Why did everyone else get so tall?"

"We didn't get taller. You shrank." TK said. "You're some kind of digimon, apparently."

"What?! But.. but I never KNEW I was a digimon!" Teri bounced up and down in a huff. "What am I gonna do?"

Kari smiled. "I don't know. What I do know is.." She bent down and picked up Teri. "..you look ADORABLE!" She gave the ball a hug.

"Erk.. Kari! Leggo!" Teri's body squished in the center, forcing the air in her hollow body to each side.

"Oooh." Kari noted, suddenly interested. "Lemme see something..."

Before Teri could protest, Kari placed her lips upon Teri's, and let out a large gust of air. Teri's body suddenly ballooned out from volleyball size to almost as large as she was when she was human.

"Wow!" Kari grinned. "I think you should be called Swellimon, Teri."

Next,
12411111121221111211112222.title: Swellimon.

124111111212211112111122221.content:
"Hey, Maybe she'll digivolve if we inflate her enough!" said Agumon.

"Okay" said Kari, blowing air into Teri's balloon body. Teri got bigger and bigger, but kept her basic shape. When Teri was as big as Greymon was...she exploded.

"Oops" said Kari.

Pieces of Teri re-formed into the ball shape again.

"I get a rush when that happens..." said Teri.
124111111212211112111122221.title: Digivolve into....POP!!!

choices: Let's make up a name for her first.
Let's see what she can do, first.
1241111112122111121111222211.content:
"Thanks for helping Kari, but I think I need to do it myself for it to work." says Teri, which causes Kari to set her down on the ground.

Kari smiles to Teri. "Ok, let's see what you can do, then." She says, as Teri starts breathing in.

At first it's hard for Teri, but after she gets to the size of a beachball, she finds herself to be easier to stretch, and keeps going until she's a three-foot wide ball. She stops because she gets enveloped in bright light again. This time, 5 points poke out of the sphereical light, and slowly form into the shape of hands, feet, and a basketball sized sphere at the top. When the light fades, the details of Teri's new form is revealed. Her color hasn't changed, although the main part of her body is volleyball paterned, with human sized hands and feet sticking out. The basketball-sized sphere is naturally Teri's head, with her face stuck on the surface of it. She smiles, and looks to the astonished group. "So...what do you all think?"

Kari giggles. "Very interesting, Teri. But...what species of Digimon are you now?" Kari says. Izzy does some typing on the laptop he was using, but shakes his head. "I've got nothing..."
1241111112122111121111222211.title: So what is she now?

choices: She really doesn't have a special technique yet...
12411111121221111211112222112.content:
Kari shrugs. "I guess we'll just have to see what she can do..."

Teri wiggles her toes, completely immoblilized. "Well...I actually have human parts in this form, which gives me an idea. Maybe I can get back to 'normal' in this form...but then again, this is really nice...maybe I'll just see if I can make myself more mobile without deflating."

Kari blinks. "Becoming moblie without deflating? How will you manage to do that?"

Teri points to her feet. "Keep your eye on those and you'll see. Then again, in a few moments, they'll be pretty hard to miss." Teri says, as she shows off one of her new ablilities by causing her feet to swell up. The group looks on in amazement as her small feet grow into blimp-like shapes with her toes bloating along with them.

When she's done, her feet are as long as she is wide, with her smallest toe being 2 times the size of a softball while her largest is twice as big as that, with her other 3 toes somewhere inbetween those sizes. Teri giggles at her accomplishment, and takes several steps forward just to try her feet out. "Hehe...great. For one thing, I can control the size of individual parts of my body. What kind of Digimon name would you give to one who can do that?"

TK grins. "How about Puffimon...even though that would have been good for your previous form as well."

Finally managing to get his bearings, Tai speaks up. "I'm not really an expert on this, but...Balloomon?"

Teri seatdrops. "Err...thanks Tai...I'll keep that one in mind." she says. "Well, let's see what the rest of you think."

Kari shrugs. "As much as I would like to side with Tai, I think Puffimon would go better with her." Kari says, with Gatomon nodding to it.

Izzy nods as well. "Puffimon sounds more approprate for Teri's personality, so I'll go with that." he says. "I agree with Izzy as well, and since unless Patamon wants to say different," says Tentomon, who gets interupted as Patamon chimes in, saying "And I don't. Puffimon works for me too.".

"All right, it's unanimous then. Teri's Rookie form will be known as Puffimon, even though we'll just call her Teri, anyway." Tentomon says.

Tai sighs. "Fine...but then we'll just use Balloomon for her Champion form."

"Cool. More forms. I just hope the rest just keep getting progressively better." She says, wiggling her stone-sized toes for lack of a better way to fidget around. "So I guess I'm ready to move on."
12411111121221111211112222112.title: Rookie Teri is Puffimon.

choices: Teri's plan just happens to do the trick.
Teri's plan just makes her burst again.
124111111212211112111122221121.content:
Izzy scracthes his head. "I don't know...I think it would be a little disappointing if Teri Digivolved again unless we see her special techniques?"

Teri blinks. "Special techniques? What special techniques, and why are you telling me just now. What if I wanted to see if I had any as Swellimon?"

Izzy chuckles. "Relax. In-Training forms all have the same special technique, and that is spitting out a reasonably-fast pink bubble. But Rookies and higer usually have one or more, among their normal abilities."

Kari smiles. "You seem to have a soft spot for bursting, Teri. Maybe you could see if anything special happens if you overinflate yourself. Then again, you could digivolve again..."

Teri grins at the thought of making herself pop. "Well, I guess it's worth a shot. Anyway...here it goes." Since she can make herself swell without needing to breathe in, she is easily able to make herself bigger. With ease, she manages to bloat herself to almost double what she was when she was Swellimon.

Fortunately for Kari's theory, Teri bursts with an explosive force powerful enough to knock everyone to the ground, as well as force Izzy out of Kari. Sure enough, the pieces that made up Teri come together on the very spot that she exploded on. However, she is back to looking like a normal human. "Huh...I guess I don't regenerate with any sort of puffyness...but since size doesn't seem to do it..."

"Well, it could be that you just can't get big enough yet...3 feet on your own in your tiny In-Training form is one thing, but it would probably take quite an acomplishment to go to Champion.

"If Agumon can digivolve to Greymon just barely a day...but that's only because we had the digivices...hrum...maybe it could take a while for you to be able to get to champion naturally." Tai says, trying to sound smart to make up for his temporary mix-up of logic.

Teri just grins. "Well, I have a plan that might work if we can't do that. Since I have the ability to puff up my body, hands, feet, and head, maybe if I got all of those to the same size and made myself grow evenly from there. Besides, if it doesn't work, then at least I can have some fun."
124111111212211112111122221121.title: Explosive Decompression, perhaps?

1241111112122111121111222211211.content:
Teri giggles as she gets ready to try out her plan. "All right, wish me luck." Teri says, as she starts making her head, feet, hands, and body simontaneously swell up. She couldn't help be squeal from the feeling of having each individual part inflate all at once. While her head and body quickly become spherical, her hands and feet take slightly longer to do so. But eventually, Teri ends up being 6 evenly-sized spheres.

The lack of support that her feet would normally give her causes her to end up flopping onto her back. Of course, the only way anyone knows this is because they can see Teri's huge, stretched-out face on the top sphere. At this point, each sphere is around 5 feet wide, but nothing seems to happen until each one is 10 feet wide. As soon as she reaches this size, she is once again consumed by bright light, and she starts to go through her next transformation.
1241111112122111121111222211211.title: On to Champion.

choices: Get bigger- she just might Digivolve again!
Try out the Wind Tunnel on Kari.
12411111121221111211112222112111.content:
The light eventually fades, revealing Teri's new form. She still appears human, but now her body seems to have matured. The volleyball pattern is still priminent on her body, and if it's possible, her hair seems somewhat 'poofier' than before.

"Oh my..." Teri said, in a voice different from her own. "This is something else."

"I'll say..." Tai gawked. "..And she's called Balloonimon, right? I called it, right!?"

"Yeah yeah, she's Balloonimon." Izzy said with a wave of his hand. "Now, let's see what kind of power she has..."

Teri nodded, and instinctively began to inflate. Her chest swelled out, but now each breast began to grow out as well. However, when she reached 15 feet around, she had the strangest urge to exhale... so she did.

"Whoa! Teri sure can hold a lo-" Gatomon began, before Teri exhaled a large gust of air. Instead of flying out as a massive blast, the air traveled in a straight line, before entering Gatomon's open mouth. The cat Digimon promptly grew into a 15 foot sphere, and rolled onto her back.

"Ohmigosh! Gatomon!" Kari ran over to her friend. "Are you okay?"

"Am I ever!" Gatomon yelled excitedly. "That was AMAZING, Teri!"

Teri blushed. "Well, I just had the urge to blow out. I guess that's my power."

"Amazing..." Izzy nodded. "I think we'll just call that the Wind Tunnel."

"Sounds good." Teri nodded.

"Okay, then... I have a few ideas. We could either see how big you can get in champion form, or, with Kari's consent, we can see if this 'wind tunnel' can work on humans as well.." Izzy said with a grin.
12411111121221111211112222112111.title: Balloonimon and the Wind Tunnel

choices: Do the Wind Tunnel on Kari again
124111111212211112111122221121112.content:
"Let's try the wind tunnel" said Kari.

"Oh right" said Teri, inhaling air. Teri got bigger and bigger until she was 15 foot around. Then, Teri exhaled and the wind tunnel went striaght into Kari's open mouth. Kari started to expand the instant the Wind Tunnel entered her. Kari turned into a 15 foot round balloon of herself.

"Wow!" said Kari. "That was fun!"

"I wonder how many times you can do that to a person" said Izzy.

"Let's find out if I have more powers or not" said Teri, giggling at the sight of Kari trying to walk with her balloon body.

"I thought I heard something in here..." the man says, as he enters the tent and finds Kari and Gatomon. "Well, what do we have here..."

Kari trembles a bit. "Please don't hurt us...we're sorry for sneaking into you tent."

The man scratches his head. "Hurt you? What makes you think I'm gonna hurt you? I snuck into lots of carnival tents when I was your age. Heck, that's how I got started."

Kari breathes a sigh of relief. "Thank you."

The man looks at Kari. "Hey, I've got an idea, why don't I give you a large crate of my formula? I'm sure you could use it more creatively than I could." he says.

Kari shakes her head. "I couldn't...it wouldn't be right."

"I respect your morals, but I insist." the man says.

Kari shrugs. "Alright, I'll take it." Kari says. "But how am I gonna carry all of it...oh, I know. Gatomon, digivolve!"

Gatomon complies, and digivolves into Angewomon. Then they fly off with the crate in hand. "Thank you!" Kari says.

"Wow...every day you think you've seen it all..." the man thinks.

"What should we do first?" Kari says, as they hover over the carnaval.
12512.title: Caught in the act.

125122.content:
Hovering over the carnival, Kari couldn't believe how lucky she and Angewomon were. She thought for sure that the Rubber Man would go ballistic on them or even call the police. She didn't want to think about her parents, or Tai, coming to pick her up while she was still inflated.

"You know Kari," Angewomon said, breaking Kari from her train of thought. "We should consider we should do with this crate."

"Well, we do have to hide it somewhere." Kari said. "But you know something?"

"What?" Amgewomon asked.

"I wonder if this formula works on Digimon?"

Angewomon's eyes went wide under her helmet. "Well, so far I have been able to eat human food and haven't suffered any problems, so the formula shouldn't be a problem."

"What do you say we find out?" Kari asked with a giggle. "I know the perfect place to go."

-----

"What is this place?" Angewomon asked.

"This is a warehouse where parade balloons are stored before and just after a parade." The still inflated Kari said. "I was here on a filed trip a while ago, so I know where they keep the spare helium tanks for the balloons."

"I see." Angewomon smirked. "This is the perfect place for me to try this stuff out. Where are the spare tanks?"

"They're behind the door with the large two on it." Kari said, bouncing around slightly. "There should be ten of them." After retrieveing all the tanks, Angewomon walked over to the crate, opened it up, and brought a bottle of the formula out.

'Well, down the hatch.' Angewomon thought, drinking the contents.

"Are you ready?" Kari asked, having readied a tank for her partner. There was even a hose.

"Of course." Angewomon said, now with the same shiny skin as Kari. "But I would like to try something different."

Putting the hose into her navel instead of her mouth, Angewomon turned the valve. After a few seconds, Angewomon turned the gas off, but still kept the nozzle where it was.

"Whoa..." A wide eyed Kari said. Angewomon did inflate, but istead of becoming round like Kari, she had gained a rather large hourglass figure.

"To be honest, this was just to see if we could still talk while we do this." A rather embarassed Angewomon stated, looking over her form.

Kari recovered from the shock and smiled. "I should consider that when I start dating!" Angewomon chuckled a little.

"Don't stop now Angewomon." Kari said. "It's not like anyone can see us in here."

Angewomon grinned and reached for the valve. Before she turned the gas back on, she wondered how she would continue.
125122.title: Heavenly Body

1251222.content:
"Just become round like I did!" Kari says.

Angewomon nods. "Alright, I will." she says, as she sticks the hose into her mouth and turns on the tank. First, her middle balled up, then the rest of her. In a few minutes, Angewomon was completely round.

"Hum...this is interesting...I wonder what would happen if I revert back to Gatomon like this." Angewomon says.

Kari shrugs. "I don't know...you decide..."
1251222.title: Just Like Kari.

choices: Kari inflates herself to look like Gatomon. (Ball)
Kari inflates heself to look like Angewomon.
12512221.content:
Angewomon turns back into Gatomon, with a somewhat surprising result: she retained all the air. Since completely round for Angewomon was around 10 feet wide, Gatomon appeared to be much fuller. In fact, Gatomon didn't even have paws. She was just a big white orb with a head.

Kari giggles. "Wow, Gatomon. If it wasn't for your head, I'd probably confuse you for a real balloon." Kari says.

Gatomon giggles. "Yea. This feels nice. You wanna be like this?"
12512221.title: Spherical Kitty

choices: Just stay like this for now
125122211.content:
"Yeah! This looks like it'll be fun!" Kari said

Putting the hose in her mouth she started to blow up at a very rapid pace, while Gatomon watched her companion swell and balloon with glee. Kari giggled herself, as her features began to vanish in her swelling body slowly turning her into a huge ball with just a head.

The moment the her hands vanished, Kari spat out the hose and giggled as she floated besides Gatomon.

"There we go! Now I'm a complete round ball like you!"

"Hehe, I must say you look amazing Kari~"

"Oh shuuush~"

The two giggled as they began to just float, looking very content with their current state and barely like they had a care in the world.
125122211.title: Kari inflates herself to look like Gatomon. (Ball)

choices: Hold on no matter no matter how big she gets.
Leave what happens next to fate and let go.
She starts to float off with the tank anyway.
1252.content:
However, Kari winds up turning the dial more than she intended. WIthout warining, the helium rushes into her and starts filling her up rapidly, enough so that the force of her body is enough to smack into Gatomon and send her flying to some other part of the the carnival. Kari can do little more than let out muffled yelps, her body already swollen five times as wide as she was tall. The bottom part of her rises into the air due to the helium, and not long after that she starts to approach fifty feet wide.

Kari keeps her mouth as firmly planted on the nozzle as possible, aware enough to know that if she lets go she'll go flying off into the sky. However, rapidly inflating does funny things to a girl's mind and she begins to wonder if she'd actually enjoy doing that.
1252.title: Kari turns it too much and expands wildly

choices: Gatomon manages to grab onto the tank.
Gatomon misses and has to think of something else.
12523.content:
Kari feels her head start to lift up a bit. She looks over the tank and realizes there's nothing keeping it attached to the ground besides it's own weight, which Kari is now starting to overcome. Regardless, she keeps her mouth planted on the nozzle, realizing it'll give her partner a chance to recover before she floats too far away to be helped.

One foot off the ground...two feet off the ground...each moment that passes causes Kari and the tank itself to pick up speed. Able to ignore the sound of the air filling her by now, Kari can hear the sound of Gatomon running towards her as quickly as possible. She makes a long, high jump off the ground and grabs for the tank.
12523.title: Unsecured Tank

choices: Her arms stretch out and she grabs Gatomon.
She can do nothing as Gatomon falls to the ground.
125232.content: Gatomon just barely misses the tank and falls to the ground, Kari's eyes widening as she feels her ascent continue to gain speed. She wiggles her useless hands as though she wishes she could reach out and grab Gatomon...
125232.title: Second Chance?

choices: See just how big this tank can make her.
Stop where she is for now.
1252321.content:
Suddenly, Kari's arms shoot out towards Gatomon. Both are slightly surprized until they remember that Kari is still rubbery from the potion. Quickly making the grab, Kari pulls Gatomon up to where she can see her after wrapping her with both arms a couple times.

Kari looks at Gatomon as if to say "Well now what?", her eyes having a worried look to them. Gatomon thinks for a moment and then comes up with a plan. "Kari, relax your limbs and I'll tie each one to something so you'll stop floating off!" says Gatomon as she climbs up onto Kari with her arms in two and makes her way to where the feet are. She grabs her legs as well and falls down to the ground at that point, Kari letting her limbs fall limp in order to help Gatomon with her plan. Gatomon makes sure each limb is tied to something that is firmly embedded in the ground. Once Kari feels her last limb being tied to something, she lets her limbs go back to normal, which stops her ascent for the most part. However, her expansion is still causing her to slowly rise into air, stretching her limbs out further.

Kari thinks for a moment, wondering if she should let go of the tank now at her current size of 100 feet wide or ride it out. At any rate, she decides to give her head a break from having to hold the tank up by stretching out her neck enough to bring it to the ground.
1252321.title: Her arms stretch out and she grabs Gatomon.

choices: Kari gets twice as big, somewhere around 200 feet wide.
The tank is magical and limitless.
12523211.content: Already standing out at the size she is, Kari sees no harm in exploring just how bigger she'll get from emptying the tank. The crowd formed to see what was going on with the 'balloon' is now a crowd who equally as curious as Kari to see how much bigger the young girl will get. Gatomon doesn't try to raise an objection, trusting that Kari knows what she is doing.
12523211.title: Might as well see it all the way through.

choices: Commited to inflate until the tank is depleted.
125232112.content:
250 feet...500 feet...1000 feet...Kari just keeps on swelling up, with seemingly no end in sight. Her friends Yolei and Mimi are among the growing crowd. Being into inflation themselves, they both hold up signs that show off their support and encourage her to keep swelling up as long as she can.

Kari's mom has showed up too, as she too is into inflation. In fact, she is even hanging out with Gatomon where the tank is, gently patting Kari's head every now in then.

"You're certainly getting large for your first time, Kari. I can't tell you how proud of I am of you." Kamiya says while Kari takes a break from inflating herself.

Kari nods, and explains how the only way she's probably able to expand as well as she did was because of the potion she took. In turn, Kamiya says she's heard of the potion and explains how it has a permenant effect on girls. She then gives Kari another pat on the head. "Still, though, I'm proud to have a girl who is willing to get as big as she can stand."

Kari giggles. "Or even as big as this tank will get me, right?" asks Kari, which causes Kamiya to sweatdrop a bit.

"Ah, Kari, this tank is special, since does not have a limit. Are you still going to try to do that knowing this?" asks Kamiya.
125232112.title: She does know it can't empty, right?

choices: "Let's swell together as mother and daughter."
"Bring me along so I'll always be with you."
1252321122.content:
Kari nods. "Hehe, I said I was going to keep going until the tank is empty. If it doesn't, I'm just going to keep right on inflating...besides, I'm really starting to like inflating like this. It's not a problem if I don't want to stop, is it?" asks Kari.

Kamiya hugs Kari's neck and holds her close. "Don't worry, dear, if you're really that committed to this, then I have no problem with it. However, I'll only allow it on one condition...but I think you'll like the condition." she explains in a voice the sounds like she really does have something nice in mind.
1252321122.title: Commited to inflate until the tank is depleted.

choices: Let's get some room to grow.
12523211221.content:
"If you're going to stick with this, wouldn't it be nice if we were both doing this together?" Kamiya asks.

Kari giggles. "Oh wow, you really want to join me? I'd love to inflate with you, mom!"

"Mmm...alright, then give me some time to get caught up, and then we can go for it." says Kamiya, patting Kari on the head before she starts making preparations. After drinking the same rubberizing potion that Kari took, Kamiya goes over to the air tank Kari is using and starts inflating herself, while getting someone to tie down her limbs like Kari's are. Kari watches on as Kamiya swells larger, impressed that her mother is handling this like a natural. Eventually, Kamiya is swollen to the same extremely large size as Kari. Once Kamiya is at this point, the hose on the tank is replaced with a split hose.

Kari smiles. "Well, mom, this is it...no stopping for anything, right?" she asks.

"Oh yes. We're this far along, no sense in stopping now." replies Kamiya. "Oh...by the way...do you think we should remained tethered to the ground, or do you think we should let ourselves float into space. After all...we're going to need all the room we can get." she explains. "We can bring along all your friends, of course."

Kari takes a moment to think about it.
12523211221.title: Mother and Daughter Swelling Together.

choices: Ask one of the other girls.
13.content:
Kari thought about her dream for a moment. "Why would I dream about a town made of balloons?" She gets up and sits on the edge of the bed. "Maybe I should ask someone about the dream?" she says to herself.

"Now, who would be a good source of advice..."
13.title: Thinking About the Dream

131.content:
"Dang, that is one weird dream, Kari." Gatomon says.

"I know, Gatomon. That's why I'm talking to you about it." Kari says.

Gatomon chuckles. "Well, maybe it's because you actually like to be inflated like a balloon."

Kari gasps. "I've never even been inflated like a balloon, Gatomon, so how would I know if I like it or not?"

Gatomon shakes her head. "Maybe you say it on TV and thought 'Hey, maybe it would be fun to be blown up like a balloon.'"

Kari looks up at the ceiling. "True, but how would I ever find out weither it would be fun or not."

Gatomon chuckles. "The way anyone would find out anything else." Gatomon says. She then runs off somewhere. "Stay here, Kari, I'll be right back."

Kari shrugs.

---

A short amount of time passes. Gatomon returns.

"So, where did you go, Gatomon?" Kari asks.

"You said you wanted to be a balloon, right?" Gatomon replies.

Kari shakes her head. "Not exactl-" she says, stopped by Gatomon suddenly shoving her to the ground.

"You said you wanted to find out if it would be fun to be a balloon, so that's what you're about to find out." Gatomon says, grinning.

"Huh? What do you mean by tha-" Kari says, before being interupted by a hose being put into her mouth.

"Now, what kind of balloon, I don't want to say, but you will be like a balloon." Gatomon says, as she hops out of the room. Kari tries to move, but she seem to be paralyzed. "Oh no...this isn't good." Kari thinks.
131.title: An Answer to a Question.

1311.content:
Gatomon had put an air pump hose in Kari's mouth and now she started to pump air into Kari's mouth, after about a hour of pumping Kari saw her figure start to inflate, soon her figure had turned into a ball. After two more hours of pumping Kari was a 25 foot round ball with hands feet and a head.
Gatomon: "Well Kari how what that?"
1311.title: filled with air

13111.content:
"Wow, this feels wonderful!" said Kari, dreamily.
"Glad you like it," replied Gatomon, who started filling her up with air again.
After a while of inflation, Kari was almost as large as the room, but then she felt something very sharp poke her...
13111.title: Getting bigger

13112.content:
"I feel awful, like I'm all bloated," said Kari.
"Well, you ARE a ball now," Gatomon replied.
"Well, I still don't like it. Please deflate me."
"Alright..."
Gatomon took the pump out of Kari's mouth and she immediately started to deflate... until she was flat as a pancake on the floor, and looked like one, too.
"Oops, I think I deflated you a bit TOO much."
Gatomon put the pump back in Kari's mouth and started pumping again. However, the more Gatomon pumped, the more Kari started to look like a ball, until she was as tall as she was before, and a perfect sphere.
"Well, this certainly wasn't suppossed to happen," said Gatomon, a little scared.
"No kidding," replied Kari. "Well, it doesn't look like I'll be able to return to normal after this, so what do you want to do?"
13112.title: Oops...

choices: as wide as she is tall
1312.content: Kari couldn't move, plain and simple. She tried to spit out the hose, but it seemed that her mouth was clamped on to it by some invisible force. Soon she felt a fluid coming into her mouth, "hmmm, water... At least I know what kind of balloon whe was thinking of." kari thinks to herself. Before long, the water began filling her up, first her belly justted out a bit, it kind of hurt to be forced that far out, but, quickly it went numb. Her belly kept expanding, but her belly was unable to hold all the water in, now, having gone to the digital world had altered her body and now the water that was making her belly stick out 1' was instead going to the rest of her body. Very quickly her body selled with water, not long after it had started she realized something: The water felt nice, plain and simple. She soon started to just relax, the water having a sort of hypnotic effect on her. She had lost track of time and when the water stopped coming, it broke her out of her trance, she glanced around and saw how big she had gotten because of Gatomon's little prank, at least, she thought it was a prank, what else could it be... But anyway, she was now like an underinflated ball, a bit flat to be totally round, but her limbs had sunken in and all that stuck out was her head arms and legs, she was---
1312.title: Gatomon's prank?

choices: Gatomon was talking about the whole apartment.
13122.content:
Kari looked up and noticed that her head was one foot away from touching the ceiling. She looked around, but she couldn't see anything but her body. Gatomon managed to squeeze out from under her, and hopped on top of her. This caused Kari's body to bob up and down, much like a waterbed.

Gatomon sweatdrops. "I think I overdid it a little..."

"A little? I almost fill up the room!" Kari shouts.

Gatomon giggles. "I'm sorry. I'll make you smaller if you like."

Kari shakes her head. "That's ok, this actually feels really nice."

Gatomon smiles. "I knew you would like it." Gatomon's smile widens. "Anyway, since you already fill up most of the room, do you wanna just go all the way?" Gatomon asks.

Kari nods. "Yeah, make me fill up the rest of the room!" Kari shouts with glee.
13122.title: A different way to flood a room.

choices: Mimi wants to make a pet out of Kari
1321.content:
Kari decides to go see Mimi about her dream.

---

Later, in Mimi's room. The girls are sitting in chairs facing each other.

"..So you're saying you had a dream about a town made of balloons?" Mimi asked, blinking. The two girls were

Kari nodded. "Yes. I'm not really sure what it means, either."

"...Hehehe. I read about something like that in a weird book that talked about dreams once." Mimi said, grinning widely.

"Ooh, really? What did the book say?" Kari said, interested.

"Hang on a moment, I need to go get something..." Mimi walked out of the room. She came back carrying a medium-sized air tank with both arms. "Oh, these things are so heavy! You'd think they'd be lighter or something..."

"Huh... isn't that one of those tanks you use to fill balloons up with?" Kari said, scratching her head.

Mimi nodded, smiling, as she took a hose from the tank. "Yeah... see, I'm going to show you what your dream meant now..."

Before Kari could say anything, Mimi took the hose and stuck it into Kari's mouth. "Mmmph?!" was all Kari could say around the hose, as Mimi turned on the flow of gas.

Kari's body somewhat quickly began to expand outwards, as she flailed her arms. She quickly puffed up into an orb shape, with just her head, hands, and feet sticking out of her rounded body. Mimi giggled and shut off the flow of gas as Kari reached 5 feet wide. She gently tugged on the hose and it popped out of Kari's mouth.

"Whoa... this raises all sorts of questions... for example, how did you do that to me? I thought stuff like this could only happen in cartoons..." Kari blinked, looking over her round body.

Mimi smiled. "Apparently, you're descended from a long line of girls who can have their bodies inflated naturally. The book I read about mentioned that... I wasn't expecting you to be like that at all, but it's really neat."

"Huh... that's kind of cool, I guess." Kari said. "But... I have a question. Why did you choose to blow me up now?"

"Well, duh!" Mimi said, giggling. "You came here and essentially told me that you were inflatable... you weren't expecting me to be curious?"

"Hehe. I guess I would've been curious if you were like this, too..." Kari giggled a bit as well... before she noticed that Mimi was lightly stroking her.

"Uhm... Mimi? Why are you petting me like that?" Kari said, blinking.

"Well..." Mimi started to say...
1321.title: Visiting Mimi

choices: She will inflater and then blow in Kair
13212.content: "I'm kind "into" girls who can inflate and stuff" Said Mimi with a soft blush. Kair blinked and blushed as well "It's ok, Mimi. If you want I ca be your "special" girl" She then winked to Mimi who smiled. "Thank you, Kari" "Don't mention it", Mimi then toock the hsoe an looked at Kari "Wanna get bigger?" Kari noded in respons, Mimi was already to put the hsoe back in her mouth but stopped "What's wrong?" Asked Kari confused "I have an idea" Said Mim grinning "Oh what is it?" "Well.."
13212.title: Puffy love

choices: Kari wants to play around like this.
Kari wants to make Mimi puffy as well.
132121.content:
"Maybe it would be more fun if I actually inflated you myself." says Mimi, as she gently strokes Kari's puffy body.

Kari can't help but blush. "Ahh...well...it could be. We might as well try, right?"

Mimi nods. "Hehe, oh yes, I'm sure you're going to love this, Kari." says Mimi as reaches over and plants her lips on Kari's. Kari coos softly a bit while blushing intensely, and then even more when Mimi actually starts puffing Kari up this way.

Mimi is soon able to rest her entire body on top of Kari. No longer having to hold herself up, Mimi is able to focus on puffing Kari up. Kari grins a little as she feels herself expanding faster as a result. Mimi stops to take a break once Kari is 10 feet wide. She notices that Kari is still blushing madly and can't help but giggle a little every now and then.

"Hehe, someone seems to really be into this." Comments Mimi as she gently runs her finger across Kari's surface.

Kari giggles some more. "Hehe, I'm not really sure what to think right now. I do know that I feel all funny-in-a-nice-way inside."

"Well, being filled up with someone's breath has to feel different than just air. It's nice to know you do like it, though." says Mimi, as she pats Kari on the head a bit. "So, is there anything you'd like to do now?"
132121.title: Mimi puffs up Kari herself.

choices: At least give puffing a chance.
1321212.content:
Kari nods. "Well, since you used your breath to make me puffy, why don't I just do the same for you, then?" she asks.

"Erp...I don't know...I don't really see myself being puffy..." says Mimi. "I have more of a girl to love when I'm like this. Don't you agree?"

Kari looks thoughtful for a second. "Hrum...well, the opposite is true for me, but if having it this way makes you happier, I don't have any problem with it." she says. "I just thought it would be a nice thing to try, really."

Mimi blinks, and takes a moment to think.
1321212.title: Reluctant Mimi.

choices: Find a way to shrink Mimi down.
Ask her if she'd be ok with puffing if she was always the smaller one.
13212122.content:
"Eh, I'm sorry, the whole feeling of having a big girlfriend would be lost if I was puffed up too. You understand, right Kari?"

Kari nods. "I think so, but I'd like to know what exactly you find interesting about having a big girlfriend." she asks, with a puzzled look on her face.

This makes Mimi grin a little. She almost seems eager to explain. "Just the thought of having someone like you towering over me makes me feel really nice. Like, I can already imagine the two of us walking around together-" begins Mimi, before Kari feels the need to interrupt.

"Wait, walking together?! I...think I'm a little too big even at this point, really." Kari says as she sweatdrops a bit while maintaining her happy appearance.

Mimi takes this oppertunity to hold Kari's hands, which are barely sticking out of her body at this point. "Hehe, I want you as a girlfirend, not a pet. I'll make sure that no matter how big you get you'll have no problem getting around."

"Hehe...'no matter how big I get?' How big are we talking about here?" Kari says, giggling a little.

Mimi blushes quite a bit. "Heee...now you've got me seriously thinking about it...every time I think of one size I just want to step it up...right now I can see myself walking along with you in a large field after you've been swollen to around five kilometers or so..."

Kari blinks. "Wow, I'd tower over just about everything on earth at that point!" Kari exclaims, shocked and excited at the same time.

"Mmm...but you'd especially be towering over me..." says Mimi, seeing Kari towering further above her with each though that goes through her head.

"Hehe...so basically, you really like the idea of small compared to me. Or at least, it seems that way to me." says Kari.

Mimi blushes a little. "Hehe, I do. More for me to love and all." She explains.

Kari nods, and starts to get an idea.
13212122.title: Mimi's Size Issues

choices: Go on a date as they are.
Make Kari bigger before they head out into the city.
132121222.content:
Kari then begins to explain. "Well, if it's just as long as you're smaller than me, then puffing isn't really an issue if I'm still bigger. Right?"

Mimi takes a moment to think about this. "Oh wow...now that I see it like that, I can actually see myself all puffed up. Hehe, well, it's settled then. I'm ready when you are, Kari." says Mimi.

The two girls lip-lock each other again without saying another word and Kari gets to work just as Mimi finishes removing her belt. Mimi shuts her eyes and gently smiles as she swells up. Mimi blushes as she feels her body force her higher. She rolls so that she and Kari are face to face again while her body swells up behind her as if she was a balloon being inflated. Kari stops when Mimi is as wide as she is tall.

The first thing Kari notices is that Mimi's dress has ended up being stretched around her. "Err...you did know this would ruin your dress...right?" Kari asks.

Mimi giggles a little. "Ruined? It still fits me just fine." She says with a grin. "I don't recall saying that we'd be doing any deflation, right?"

Kari giggles in return. "Hehe, I wasn't implying we would at all. Being puffy is too much fun. Not to mention having to start over if we did return to normal." says Kari.

"I couldn't agree more." says Mimi, as she gets off of Kari and drops to the ground. "Oooh...it's just like I imagined it would be like. You look absolutely lovely, Kari."

Kari smiles. "So, are we ready to actually try going out like this?"
132121222.title: Just a little puff.

choices: Kari and Sora manage to hide.
1322.content:
Kari decides to ask Sora about her strange dream.

---

A while later, Kari and Sora are sitting in Sora's room. "So, what's this dream you wanted to tell me about?" Sora asks.

"Well, you see, I was in this town made out of balloons. I don't think anything else happened besides me being in the town of balloons." Kari explains.

Sora nods. "Ah I see...you like inflation, don't you?" Sora says.

Kari gives Sora a puzzled look. "Inflation? inflation of what? Balloons?"

Sora chuckles. "Well, kinda...but I'm thinking of something a little diffrent." Sora says, as she goes over to her closet and pulls out what appears to be an air tank.

Kari looks at it. "Where did you get that?" she asks.

"Someone let me have it...anyway, I'm going to show you what I mean by inflation." Sora says. Sora takes the hose on the tank and stuffs it into her mouth. Then, she turns the valve on the tank.

Kari watches in amazement as Sora's middle starts to swell up. Sora starts to look round as she continues to blow herself up. She keeps this up until her body is in an orb shape. Her limbs were mostly absorbed by her body. When she feels she had enough, she spits out the hose and turns off the tank.

Kari is speachless for a moment. Kari walks over to Sora and pokes her. Sora giggles.

"Whoa...can I try that?" Kari asks.
