Kari turns to Gatomon. "See that little white ball on the shelf over there? Pick it up." Kari says.

Gatomon nods and does so. As she hold the ball, it starts to cover her body. This continues until everything but her eyes and stripes are white. Like Kari and Sora, Gatomon has a rubbery sheen.

"Whoa. I'm made of rubber. Cool." Gatomon turns to Kari. "But how does this help you?" she asks.

Sora turns to Gatomon. "Well, we need you to help push us around, and by making you rubbery, we won't end up getting popped by your claws."

"Oh." Gatomon says.

---
132222121211111211211.title: BalloonGatomon

1322221212111112112112.content:
Gatomon puffed herself up till she was as big as Kari and Sora.
Sora: "....Ok now what are we going to do?"
Kari: "Well we could blow up each other or deflate and try some helium."
1322221212111112112112.title: inflating Gatomon

choices: Blow up till the fill the room
132222121211111211212.content:
"Well, let's try your idea then~" Sora purred.

"Hey, Gatomon! Do come over here for a moment!" Kari called out.

A soft hissing came from the other room, as Gatomon soon waddled inside and giggled seeing her round friends.

"Well, well look at you round cute balls~"

"You can compliment us later Gatomon, mind taking that balloon over there?" Kari asked nodding her head

Blinking, Gatomon picked up the object and sound found herself becoming much shinier like a balloon. Cooing the feline was starting to get what the girls had in mind, soon she stuffed the hose in her mouth and began to swell and balloon. True to Kari's plan, Gatomon was becoming many rounder and sphere-like than either of them, as her paws, feet, and tail sunk into her body leaving her just with her head. Once she reached their size, she spat out the hose and giggled.

"Oooo! Look at me! Gatomon the ball!" She declared proudly and then purred "Aaah! This feels so nice and relaxing. I just wanna stay like this an not care about anything else~"
132222121211111211212.title: Kari's idea.

13222212121111121122.content:
Sora: "Lets use helium."
Kari: "Ok."
Kari gets out a helium tank and takes 2 hoses and hands one to Sora and they both put the hose in their navle.
Kari: "Ready?"
Sora: "Yes."
Kari turns the tank up full blast and they both inflate into big balls, soon they start to float into the air, soon they both look like they are going to pop.
13222212121111121122.title: Helium is still fun

choices: It is something that will come to be.
She dreamed of where Kamiya really came from.
She's weird and wants to be inflated.
133.content:
"Hum...I think I should ask mom. I'm sure she'd be the most understanding out of everyone I know." thinks Kari, turning to Gatomon a moment later. "Gatomon, I think I'd like to spend some time with my mom, alone if you don't mind."

"Sure thing, Kari. I'll just hang out here if you need me." says Gatomon, as she hops up on the bed and lays down. Kari strokes her head a bit and heads off.

Luckily for Kari, her mom was simply relaxing in her room. "Mom, can I talk with you about something?" she asks, walking over to her. Kamiya looks over at Kari and nods as Kari crawls into bed next to her. "Go ahead, tell me what's on your mind, Kari."

Kari decides it would be best to be straightforward with her. "Well, I had this dream where I was in a town made out of balloons. I was just like I normally was, of course, as opposed to being a balloon, but everyone else was a balloon. The thing is, I've never seen anything like that before and I haven't been thinking about balloons recently. So basically...what do you think all that means?"
133.title: Mother knows best

choices: Go and find the rubber town with her friends
Stay and learn how to inflate with Mom
Learn more about her home and people
1332.content:
Kamiya nodded knowingly as she sat up, petting along Kari's hair. "I knew this day would come. You were too young to remember, but I came here with you from another world." She slowly slipped out of bed as Kari sat up, confused as her mother walked toward her large closet. "A world not too different from the place your friend Gatomon is from."

"Another world? Wait, You mean the digital world?" Kari hopped out of bed, following her mother as she pulled a large ornate tank out, silver with all sorts of swirling fringes. Brass piping stuck out on top with a large gem in the center. She took the hose from it and slowly inserted it into her bellybutton as she continued, the tank giving a slow hiss.

"Yes my dear, though we came only when you were just a little balloon." She gave a gasp as the air began to fill her belly, stretching her middle out wider as her sides bulged out, thighs expanding larger. As she inflated, her skin took on a deeper, violet color. "Oooo, I forgot how good this feels! The two of us are from a place called Rubberelle, a town where everything and every one is rubbery and inflatable." She stretched out wider, limbs sinking into her body as her form became vivid purple, her neck and head stretching out on top till it was just another part of her rubbery form. Tiny hands and feet stuck out at points along her spherical body, guiding her along as she floated around the room with a giggle.

Kari's mind reeled with this new information, smiling wide as somehow the appearance of her mom as a swollen balloon seemed right somehow. It was certainly something she'd want to try herself, but there was that town she mentioned, a place within the digital world no less.
1332.title: She dreamed of where Kamiya really came from.

choices: Kari ends up swelling up just like Kamiya!
Kari ends up swelling up better or worse than Kamiya!
13322.content:
Kari particularly wanted to visit Rubberelle before doing anything else. But without being able to balloon up, Kari felt she wouldn't be able to get very far. Also, Kari was simply eager to try swelling up for the first time she could ever remember. "I don't know if it's time or not...but I'd really like to blow up just like you, mom!"

Kamiya smiles. "Of course, dear, I've already got the equipment out anyway, so I'll just get you plugged in and then guide you from there. There's more to it than simply filling yourself with air, after all." She gently pulls out the hose from her belly button, and floats over to Kari with it.

"Ah, more to it? I see...what exactly do you mean, then?" Asks Kari, as she looks over her mother's form wondering just what her secret is, though she already had a feeling what it might involve.

Kari lets out a gentle cooing noise as Kamiya carefully inserts the hose into Kari's belly button. "You see...once you start swelling, you need to try to picture yourself becoming a balloon as you fill up. And the opposite is true if as you deflate. Otherwise you'll be filled up or emptied but your form won't change at all." The latter part makes Kari giggle a bit, amused by the prospect of deflating while being all balloon-like.

Giving a quick nod, Kari smiles. "Alright, then, let's try it, then! I'm ready when you are!" With that said, Kamiya floats over to the tank and starts it up, watching as Kari swells up for the first time since she was very young...
13322.title: Mother's Lesson

choices: She gets swollen, but her head doesn't balloon out as well.
Kari starts to take on a shape even more balloon-like than her mother's!
133222.content: As Kari swelled up, it was clear she wasn't swelling up exactly as her mother did...
133222.title: Beginner or Pro?

choices: She's meant to be a queen to her people.
She's ment to bring her people and humans together.
1332222.content:
As Kari had closed her eyes in order to help her further concentrate, she was unable to see the look of awe on Kamiya's face. If she could see herself, she'd have noticed that her skin had already turned a rather vibrant shade of pink as she expanded. Furthermore, instead of swelling up all around, she swelled up in a more oval-like shape, much like that of a proper balloon. An amazing yet somehow familiar feeling pulsed through her entire body as her head and neck started to join the rest of her body, the familiarity intensifying as her form swelled to completion.

At it's peak, Kari's mind became flooded with memories from her life as a balloon, which most importantly gave her the knowledge of where exactly Rubberelle was in the digital world. Physically, Kari's body glowed brightly, soon followed by the formation of a nozzle on the very bottom of her body. Her clothing stretched in such a way that it looked more natural on a girl of her shape and size, and then the glowing stopped. Kari simply floated in all her very balloon-like glory, fully aware of what she'd become without having to actually see herself.

"Oh my gosh, Kari...that was amazing...you've become more of a balloon than me!" Kamiya gives Kari a big hug almost immediately, which Kari happily returns.

"I can't believe it myself, mom...but it feels so wonderful and natural to be like this that I can't imagine myself being any other way right now..." Kari wiggles her nozzle back and forth a little to acknowledge her awareness of how much of a balloon she's become. "So how hard is it to end up like this, anyway...?"

Kamiya gently rubs Kari as she starts to explain. "It's not really hard, so much as it takes a lot of transforming back and forth. Though, you always were something of a natural, my little balloon." She decides right here and now would be a good time to tell Kari about how special she really is...
1332222.title: The Chosen Balloon

choices: Try to convince Mom to help.
13322221.content:
Kamiya floats over the bed, descending slowly to the cushions as Kari does the same, her distended form hovering close by. "There's an old legend told by our people about natural balloons like yourself. That in times of hardship there will be a new queen born, one who can expand without limit."

"Wow! Do you really think I'm like that?" Kari hovered and fluttered her hands excitedly, giving a squeal more at the thought of the inflation potential more then any sort of royal heritage.

Her mother gave a giggle. "It'd be hard to argue against it. You certainly have the shape of a natural princess. Maybe you'll be able to unlock even more of your potential someday." She slowly floated toward the tank, reattaching the hose to her naval as she began to shrink down. "As much as I would love to expand with you, my dear, I've got to get ready for work now."

"Aww, but you can't go! Not after showing me all this! We have to go see my homeland!" Kari pouted, her plump lips turning up as her mother returned to her normal shape.

"I...It's not so simple hon." She gives her daughter a gentle pet, her skin creaking like rubber as she heads to the shower. "Just try to keep practicing with it...maybe we'll be able to do some cloudfloating tomorrow, ok?" She gave her a gentle kiss on the forehead before she left the bedroom.

"Hmph...I can't wait that long...I'm going to find Rubberelle and become the biggest balloon ever!" Kari vowed as she floated near the tank. Part of her wanted to remain inflated forever, yet she also knew that deflating might be necessary to move around town. One thing was for sure; if she was going to find her homeland, she'd need help.
13322221.title: Princess Balloon

choices: Leave Sora and Mimi as is and see what they can do once they get to Rubberelle
Try to use your balloon princess powers to give Sora and Mimi more swollen forms
133222211.content:
How to get to Rubberelle was one thing, but Kari knew she'd need some protection to get there as well. Not particularly wanting to deflate, Kari figured the best way would be to call over the girls she knew best...

---

Sora and Mimi were absolutely stunned to see Kari in her current form, to say the least. "This...isn't an act, right? You're seriously blown up like a balloon? This is so unreal..." Mimi says as she pokes Kari a bit, the rubbery and airy feel of her body confirming she was indeed a big living balloon.

"It doesn't seem like you to fully embrace the role of princess though...especially with the goal of being the biggest balloon ever..." Sora rubs the back of her head a bit.

Kari gently floats in front of them, giggling a little from Mimi poking her. "Well...being a balloon princess who was the biggest ever would just be so inspiring for all the other balloon people, wouldn't it? Then we'd all be balloons like me...hehe...think of it, a whole kingdom of lovely balloons, with me and my mom ruling them all and providing for my family!"

"Well when you put it that way it seems a lot more noble...but still very, very strange." Says Mimi. "But, I'm always more than happy to help a friend!"

Sora nods in agreement. "I'm in too, so just what are we going to do, anyway? We're not exactly balloons, so I dunno how far we'd be able to help you..."
133222211.title: Forming the Party

choices: They begin to swell into balloon girls too
1332222111.content:
"Well, maybe I can change that...Mom did say I had all kinds of potential to unlock." Kari hovered between her friends, concentrating as her rubbery sides stretched out, vibrating with a low hum. It was impressive and even a little funny, but it really didn't do much.

"Maybe we have to rub her, like static maybe?" Mimi giggled as her arms wrapped around the balloon girl, giving her a squeeze against her body. Kari gave a short cry as Mimi rubbed her over her head, her hair getting frazzeled and sticking to Kari's surface. "Oops...heh, maybe not." As she gave her a last squeeze though, Sora noticed a small pink cloud push out of Kari's nozzle.

"Huh...what's that? Looks like the air inside you is different." She watched as the cloud vaporized quickly. "Maybe that's how it works?" Sora gave a shrug as Kari floated up above her friends.

"Maybe. Let me see." She concentrated again, sides bulging and expanding as she grew wider and larger, her surface straining. Finally she relaxed her balloon nozzel, a blast of pink air covering her friends complacently. Sora and Mimi gave a little cough as the felt an odd tingle over their bodies.
1332222111.title: Magical Air

choices: Stay in town and see what other kind of fun they can have
13322221111.content:
The pink cloud enveloped both girls, giving their skin a shiny texture. Mimi's increasingly green sides expanded outward, blowing up rounder and plumper as Sora took on a deep red color, her belly growing fat and bloated. Together they grew and swelled, their round bodies absorbing their limbs as their head and neck grew into one, spreading across the top of their rubber surface. A short nozzle sprung out the bottom of both girls as they floated up toward Kari, both quite egg-shaped but not as pointed as Kari was. They giggled as they drifted around the room, bouncing off walls and the couch.

"Wow, hehe I'm surprised that worked." Kari gave her friends a hug, well as best as she could anyway. "I wonder what else I can do." The princess thought to herself.

"Hehehe, this is fun! I feel so light." Mimi giggled, hovering closer to the roof.

"Yeah, this feels great, but how are we going to go out now, we're way too big to fit through the door." Sora squeaked against one of the tables. Kari nodded, drifting around before looking upward.

"Oh yeah, the Skylight...I always wondered why Mom had a latch to open it in the middle." She floated up higher and higher, nudging against it as it slowly turned, the window opening just enough to let the balloons float freely.
13322221111.title: They begin to swell into balloon girls too

choices: They appear before a large cloud city
They exit in the middle of a warm jungle
133222211111.content:
The trio giggled among the clouds for a bit until they rested on a nearby roof, looking like a bunch of escaped toys. "Hehe, alright Kari, so how do you think we should get there?" Sora pressed herself along the corner as Kari thought to herself.

"Hm..you know, when Mimi rubbed me, I sort of felt...something..."

"Was it my hair?"

"No, I mean...some kind of magic...let me see if I can remember..." Kari closed her eyes, pressing her body against a bit of insulation poking out the roof. Thankfully it was soft enough not to pop her, but it did generate a lot of static build up. Blue sparks flew off the pink girl as all of a sudden a bolt of energy zapped from her body, opening up a violet vortex above her. "Oh..wow..." Kari starred at it as she floated up, her friends following closely.

"You're just full of surprises aren't you?" Sora quipped as they entered the portal.

"Yep, surprises and air!" Kari squeaked.
133222211111.title: Head to the digital world

choices: Someone she knows (Another Digidestined girl maybe?)
A curvy mother and her teenage daughter.
133222211112.content:
Kari and the other girl-balloons floated freely over her house, delighting in the wind as they drifted over the city. As Kari looked down, she saw all sorts of people going about their lives. People who should have as much fun as she did. "Hmm...you know...maybe we should stick around for a bit..."

"What, I thought you wanted to go find out more about your people?" Mimi looked over to her friend as they drifted toward a cloud. She noticed a shining glimmer in Kari's eye.

"Yeah, I mean...eventually...but first I just want to see what I can do." She didn't hesitate in drifting closer to the city park, her friends trying to keep up with the pink blimp as she looked around for potential playmates...potential subjects...
133222211112.title: Stay in town and see what other kind of fun the...

1332222111121.content:
High above the heads of the citizens of the city the three ballooned girls drift over the park looking down at the people on the ground. They smile at how the people don't seem to be able to notice three large balloon people over them. They drift quietly enjoying the feeling of the breeze blowing over their bloated bodies, until Mimi notices something.

"Hey, girls look over there."

The other two turn in the direction that Mimi's stubby hand is pointing in, and there lying on the ground looking wistfully up at the sky is Yolei, the last girl in the digidestened group.

A rather wicked grin works its way across Kari's face. "Well, well, someone's playing hooky from their partime job at their parent's convienence store."

Similar grins bloom on Sora's and Mimi's faces.

"Are you two thinking what I'm thinking?"

"Yes Sora I believe we are, let's see if we can't get her attention."

Down at ground level Yolei was laying on her back on a hill side far from the more crowded sections of the park looking up at the clouds, and let's of a whistful sigh.

"I wonder what it''s like to fly?"

True she had flown by riding on Halsimon's and Aquilamon's back but that was different than flying under her own power. As the kept watching the clouds drift by her rumination is interupted by seeing three balls start to drift overhead one punk, one red, and one green.

"Aw, did some kid lose their balloons?"

For Yolei free floating balloons were both depressing and facinating, depressing because some little kid is probably crying their eyes out right now, but they were also facinating because they were free, free to fly anywere and everywere, wherever the wind took them, oh if only they could talk, the things they would say about the things they've seen.

"Hey, Yolei!"

Yolei's train of thought is derailed as she suddenly hears a set familiar voices call out to her.

"Kari, Sora, Mimi is that you?"

"Yep it's us!"

"Well, where are you?"

"Look up."

"What do you mean look up?"

"Seriously look up!"

"Okay fine whatever but this better, be, important?"

Yolei is stunned as the three balloons she saw over head drift lower and lower, and as they got closer she was able to make out a few more details, like how they had hands and feet. And as they drew even closer she could start to make out several very familiar features like mouths and eyes, and noses, and a number of other facial features that made up the faces of three of her closest friends. Once the three balloon girls were a few feet over head they wave to their stunned friend.

"Hey Yolei how's it going?"

Rather than answer Kari's question Yolei first takes off her glasses gives them a good spray of cleaning solution and wipes them hard with her cleaning cloth, after realising that wasn't the problem, she then gives her self a good hard pinch in the side.

"Ouch! Nope not dreaming. So any of you want to tell me what the HELL IS GOING ON!"

Realizing that outburst was the product of Yolei's incredible surprise the three balloons drift down a little lower so she didn't need to look up at them and strain her neck, where Kari starts explaining what happened to her this morning, Mimi and Sora chiming in with their own little tidbits of info.

"So after drifitng along for a while we came across you and decided to 'drop in' so to speak."

Yolei stands their completely gobsmacked before reaching out and giving each girl a little poke, making each one giggle in turn.

"You're, you, you really are balloon people."

"Yes we are, you wanna try?"

"Huh?"

"Well if I could turn Sora and Mimi into balloon girls I bet I could do the same for you."

"It's pretty fun Yolei."

"Yeah, come to the balloony side, all are welcome, all are welcome."

Yolei stands there sliently for a few minutes debating inwardly what to do until finally she says,
1332222111121.title: Someone she knows (Another Digidestined girl ma...

choices: Yolei turning into a balloon just like the others
Yolei turns into a different kind of balloon person
13322221111211.content:
Smiling at Yolei's eagerness to be transformed Kari was more than happy to oblige.

"Okay now just hold on a second Yolei, I need a minute to focus."

Kari closes her eyes and concentrates like when she changed Sora and Mimi, and like earlier her baloonie body starts to expand as the metamorphic gasses start to form inside her.

Sora and Mimi wait with bated breath excited to see what Yolei would look like as a balloon girl.

"Alright Yolei breath deep!" cheered Kari as the pink gas flows out of her nozzle.

Yolei obeys the balloon queen in the making and takes a deep breath of the pink fumes, coughing slightly at the very intense smell of latex.

Almost immediately the changes start, with Yolei's skin taking on a bright lavender color scheme, ending with....
13322221111211.title: "Okay Kari, let me have it!"

choices: try to find a way to Kari's true home
133222211112111.content:
Yolei gives off a delighted squee as her body starts to round out. paying little mind to how her arms and legs start to sink into her progressively more spherical torso. Her outfit just barely managing to stretch fast enough to fit her new physique. finally with a hollow thunk her head spreads out to perfectly fit the balloon shape.

Now the balloon trio has become a quartet, what next?
133222211112111.title: Yolei turning into a balloon just like the others

13322221112.content:
The girls watched as the cloud enveloped them, breathing in the gas as Sora and Mimi started to expand. Wider and wider they grew, their clothing stretching around their bodies easily, hands and feet sinking into their spherical bodies. Just as their heads flattened out on top, they trembled and deflated back to normal, both girls sitting up dazed. "Oof...well that didn't work!" Sora rubbed her head as she sat up, Mimi huffed, picking up a stone in frustration, but when she tossed it it lightly bumped against the ground as though it was a balloon.

"Ooo, maybe not!" Mimi giggled, picking up one of the bricks stacked on the roof as it turned rubbery and hollow. It squished under her hand as she giggled. With a little concentration, the brick went back to normal, thumping onto the ground. "Looks like I have some balloon powers now!" She bounced up and down with a giggle, eager to experiment as she picked up various objects around her, turning them into balloons and back again. She gripped Kari as they both sunk down a bit. "I can turn anything rubbery now!"

"H-hey watch it! What about you Sora" Kari looked over at her friend as she stood up. She touched a rock, but nothing happened.

With a sigh, Sora pulled her knees up in disappointment. "Hmph...I guess you and Mimi have all the luck." She looked about as she saw one of the pidgeons on the roof. Her eyes flashed a rubbery red hue as it suddenly looked back at her. With a slow woosh, it began to swell and inflate, growing so round and full that it could barely walk as it wobbled toward her. Sora blinked in surprise. "Ah! What the...stay back." She commanded, the bird pausing and moving backward. "Hmm...hop..." She watched as it bounced on it's round body a few times. With a slow smile, she commanded the balloon-bird to do a few other tricks before forcing it to deflate. When it was empty, the pidgeon shrugged it's wings and flew off, with no memory of the incident.

Sora stood up with a wicked look in her eye as Mimi gave a playful grin. "Kari...We'd love to help you with your people and all, but right now we want to test out our powers."

"Hehe I understand. I need to do some practicing too. Let's meet back up here in a few hours then?" Kari giggled as the girls nodded, giving each other a big hug before heading their separate ways, at least for now.
13322221112.title: Magical air, Magical girls!

choices: It's all just a hollow inside!
The stuff inside also rubberized, and fused with the can!
133222211122.content:
Once outside, Mimi looked around, wondering what she'd try to experiment on first. "So many ideas, but which to do first...oh, of course, maybe I should see if I can balloon things at a distance..." She notices a small soda can laying next to a garbage can and figures she can kill two birds with one stone. She holds her hand out and concentrates, and all at once the can turns rubbery. Mimi gasps as the can suddenly shoots up without her doing anything else to it, soon realizing it's because she was intending to make the can float into the trash bin, but instead it was simply floating away. Soon, the balloon-can gets caught on something and gets a hole in it. It shoots around until it lands at Mimi's feet. Mimi turns it back to it's normal state, expecting the can to return to it's previous shape, but instead the can remains as it was, now a flat circle of aluminum

"Ooooh, that certainly answered a lot of questions I had...so I can make objects floaty and if they deflate as balloons they'll be deflated when they're not balloons too! I wonder what else...well, first thing's first, I suppose!" Mimi then focuses on the trash can, and has soon rubberized it. This time, she manages to pull the now floating object over to herself. She takes the flattened can and tries to take the lid off the trash can, only to find that the trash can and it's lid are fused together. Out of curiosity, she gives it a shake, only to find that there's nothing rattling inside.

Wanting to see inside of the can, Mimi decided to experiment with changing the color of the rubber. After some concentration, the container becomes a shade of translucent pink...
133222211122.title: Follow Mimi the Rubbermancer

1332222111221.content:
"Wow, it really is just a balloon now!." Mimi giggled, turning the can around in her hands. She pressed down on the can, making it squish out wider as she turned it to normal. Sure enough, the can retained its squat shape. She continued on through the park, picking up branches and bits of garbage, turning them into balloons and then either popping them or reshaping them into new forms. Several bits of trash she left as balloons to float high into the air, in her mind helping to clean the place up a bit more. On the side of the path, she found a tennis ball and tossed it up and down as she walked. Each time she caught it, she played with its density, making the rubber thicker or lighter until she decided to see how big she could make it. Mimi took the ball in both hands, focusing as the ball expanded wider and wider, straining into a big 3' wide light-green sphere until it burst into a dozen pieces. She collected them as best she could, trying to return them to normal, but finding she was unable to do so she tossed the pieces into a can.

A few hours passed as she laid her head on a rounded stump-balloon in the middle of a rubbery mattress of grass. Mimi looked over the pile of rounded sticks and cans of every color at her side, giggling as she looked over herself. "Hm...I think it's time for a new wardrobe." She sat up and touched her own clothing, her red coat and skirt turning to rubber as they slowly started to inflate around her, pushing her arms out as she squeezed and shifted them, pressing waves of color through the rubbery fabric as she fused and deflated various parts. When she was done, her clothing now resembled a red and blue latex bodysuit, fitting comfortably on her body. Her gloves and boots were fused into the clothing, with wide embellishments on the cuffs. Though more rubbery now, her cowgirl hat wasn't changed in the slightest. "Hehe, there we go, now I look like a superhero." She giggled outloud as stood up and did a few poses, looking at herself in the mirrored reflection of a trash can-balloon. In the middle of her flexing, she heard a soft clattering sound from behind.
1332222111221.title: Testing her limits

choices: A young girl starring back at her
13322221112211.content: "Hm? Who's there?" Mimi turned around to see...
13322221112211.title: An intruder approaches

133222211122111.content:
"Aah! I'm sorry miss, I didn't mean to interrupt you!" A blond girl not much younger than Mimi starred back at her, wearing a white and green dress as she bowed a bit. "Did you say you were a superhero?" She looked up at Mimi with wide eyes.

"I...er...well..." The truth was rather hard to believe, even as Mimi understood things. Plus the idea of being a costumed hero did seem appealing... "Yes, Yes I am in fact." She giggled to herself, striking another heroic pose with a grin. "What's your name, citizen?" Mimi said in her most heroic sounding voice she could muster.

"Wow, that's amazing! My name's Emi, we just moved to this city. Oh wow! I never knew magical heroes existed!"

"Haha, well we do try to keep our identities hidden...er...what makes you think I'm magical?" Mimi tilted her head a bit. Emi walked over and picked up one of the sticks, bright blue and shaped into the vauge form of a balloon-dog.

"You made this all balloon-like, I saw you do it earlier. Is that your power?"

"Um...yeah, I guess you can say that..." Mimi smiled proudly.

"That's great! Could I be your sidekick! Ooh, and do your powers work on people? Do you have any villians? What about weaknesses or heroic love interests?"

Mimi backed up a bit at the onslaught of questions. She never knew being a superhero required so much work! Still though, the first question seemed easy enough to answer..
133222211122111.title: False alarm

1332222111221111.content:
"Hehe, well I could use some help I suppose, though I wouldn't want you to get hurt..." Mimi patted her on the head. "Best leave fighting crime to the professionals."

"Oh...but...what about your powers? Could you make me all balloony and able to fight crime?" Emi stepped closer to her, looking up eagerly.

"Ah, I'm sure they don't work that way...I mean..not that I tried them..." Mimi looked aside. She had used her powers on inanimate objects and plants but never any animals or people. Sora may have been able to do so, but she was too nice for that, she thought to herself.

"Then why not give it a shot?" Emi smirked, puffing out her cheeks. "I bet I'd make a great balloon, see?"

"Um...well...ok...here we go..." Mimi touched her forehead, concentrating deeply.
1332222111221111.title: Join me!

choices: Make her a balloon toy to ride into battle on.
Use her like a  shape-shifting utility balloon.
13322221112211112.content:
Mimi's hand trembled as she stroked through Emi's hair, a rubbery shine coating her body from head to toe. Her body slowly started to look puffier as her middle bloated outward, becoming quite a bit chubbier all over. "Hehe..its working." Emi giggled as her body grew wider, belly stretching her rubbery dress out as her limbs fattened outward. Her middle swelled to nearly 3' wide, arms and legs sinking down as her neck widened.

"Wow, hehe...I can't believe it, but it's working! You look like my friend Kari now." Mimi giggled, petting the girl-balloon's head as she swelled wider and rounder, looseing much of her human form. Soon she was little more then a 4' wide ball, her rubbery braids the only thing not part of her round body as she hovered about three feet off the ground.

"Wow! Hehe you did it! I really am just a big balloon. So...can I be your sidekick now?" Emi looked to her with pleading eyes.

"Well, I can't leave you like this, so yeah, sure!" Mimi giggled, giving the globular girl a big hug. She rubbed her sides as she pondered how to reshape her new ally.
13322221112211112.title: Huh...I guess it does work.

choices: After seeing what Emi can do, Mimi wants to be a shape shifting balloon too.
133222211122111122.content:
"So, how will I help you fight crime?" Emi asked, eager to please.

Mimi rubbed her chin as she looked at the green, white, and blond sphere of a girl bobbing in front of her. She started thinking of what sort of uses she would have for a rubbery balloon, and then tried to think of which one would be the most useful. Suddenly, it dawned on her. Why did she have to choose? She already knew she could change the shape and density of any balloons she created; there was no reason to assume she couldn't do the same with Emi.

"Emi, you're going to be my trusty shape shifting utility balloon!" Mimi said with a grin.

"Utility balloon?' Emi asked. "That doesn't sound very cool. I was hoping I could help you beat up bad guys."

"On the contrary," Mimi said, "It is very cool. You can be whatever I need you to be to help fight crime! Like if I need to get somewhere high in a hurry," Mimi touched Emi, and she suddenly ballooned outward to a translucent ten foot sphere, her surprised face stretched out along the hemisphere facing the ground. Mimi then grabbed one of Emi's braids (that still inexplicably resisted getting absorbed) as the sphere girl started floating away. "Tada, Emi the Balloon Lift!"

"On the other hand," Mimi continued quickly, "If I need to get down somewhere in a hurry," Suddenly Emi dropped to the ground, resembling a squashed green and white cylinder two feet high and seven feet wide. "Emi the Balloon Cushion!" Mimi belly flopped onto her for emphasis.

Emi was about to say something, when she suddenly felt herself get very, very tall. At the same time, she got very, very thin.

Mimi held one end of the long balloon Emi had become up. Her face had been stretched along the first foot or so of the balloon, a single blond and flesh colored strip followed by a dozen or so feet of green and white. Unlike a normal long balloon, she was not perfectly rigid. "Since I can control your density, there's much more I can do with you in this form than just make balloon animals." Mimi explained, swinging Emi above her head. Emi felt one end of her become more dense, and then a sudden whoosh as Mimi cracked her in the air. "Emi the Balloon Whip!"

Emi then suddenly felt incredibly strange, even stranger than her other forms felt. None of them felt bad, quite the contrary, but they were all very different, and this was the most different of all. She was spread out wide, she knew that much, and she was looking straight up. She tried to move, and felt herself inch slowly to one side.

Before Emi could move much further, Mimi picked her up. The balloon girl was now a circular flat sheet of rubber, with her face on side surrounded by circles of blond, green, and white. "Of course balloons can be useful even if they aren't inflated. Say we need to get in a building somewhere, and the door's locked. I can just deflate you like this, and slide you under the door. Emi the Balloon Infiltrator!" She then folded Emi up, and, lacking any pockets on her newly created bodysuit, placed the bundle of rubber girl under her cowboy hat. "And as an added stealthy bonus, you're easy to conceal like this."

Finally, Mimi retrieved Emi from under her hat, and tossed her out onto the ground. "Naturally, I can inflate you again no problem, and I can do it as fast as I want. For example," Mimi grabbed a random inflated can and placed it on top of Emi. Then, with an audible BLOOMPF!, Emi suddenly and rapidly inflated into a 4 foot sphere, sending the can rocketing into the stratosphere. "Emi the Balloon Trap!"

Emi blinked, now in a form she was able to (surprisingly) call familiar. "Wow." She said, half in a daze. "I never really thought of it like that."

"Those are just a few of the things you can do, of course." Mimi said with a smile. "And naturally, your most important form of all;" Mimi touched Emi one last time, and she felt herself shift into something that felt vaguely familiar. She looked down, and noticed she looked like her old self, except perhaps a bit chubbier and puffier, and her entire body had a shiny sheen to it. What's more, her dress had been replaced by a bodysuit similar to Mimi's, except it was green and white instead of red and blue. "Tada! Emi the Balloon Sidekick!"

Emi suddenly threw her arms around Mimi, her rubber body squeaking against Mimi's rubber clothing. "Oh, this is the BEST! I love you... ah.." Emi blinked again. "...I don't think I ever got your name."

Mimi blushed. "Ehe. You can call me Mimi. I don't actually have a superhero name yet. I suppose we can work on that later."

"All right, Mimi!" Emi said cheerily, bouncing up and down. "Are we ready to fight crime?"
133222211122111122.title: Emi the Utililoon

choices: Go ahead and expand along with her.
She wants to see Kamiya get big first.
She wants to be the first to get big.
1333.content:
Kamiya smiles. "Maybe you're just a weird little girl looking to be inflated...you just aren't fully aware of it yet." she says, the 'weird' part sounding more like a term of endearment than insult. "You wandered into a town of balloons while not being inflated, so maybe your dream self went there to be inflated." Kamiya explains.

Kari giggles a little and blushes. "Well, I don't know...I mean, why would I suddenly think about that?"

"Maybe you saw it on TV and it left an impression deep in your mind that you weren't aware of until you got a chance to explore your subconscious?" suggests Kamiya.

Kari thinks for a moment. "Well...there was that one thing I saw last night, I really didn't think much of it afterwards but I thought it was interesting at the time...wait...now that I recall, I did start to imagine myself in the same situation."

Kamiya pats Kari on the head. "And that's usually how it begins, just like it is me. You start imagining yourself like that and soon enough you'll be wanting to make yourself like that."

This makes Kari's eyes widen a bit. "Wait, 'is with you'? You mean you've been inflating yourself and still do?" asks Kari, to which Kamiya nods.

"Oh yes, and interestingly enough I started right when I was around your age. I usually do it when no one else is around, so that's probably why you've never seen me that way." explains Kamiya, before a grin crosses her face. "Speaking of which...now that I know you're into expansion, would you mind joining me on one of my sessions? It might help ease you into it."

Kari blinks. "Ah...I don't even know if I actually want to go through with this yet..."
1333.title: Like Mother, Like Daughter.

choices: She wants to be (relatively) normal at some point.
13331.content:
Kari giggles and continues. "But I guess expanding together would be a good chance to bond."

Kamiya pats Kari on the head again. "Oh Kari, you're so wise and yet so young, it really make me proud to be your mother." says Kamiya as she heads off to get her supplies.

"Well, I certainly know where I got it from." replies Kari as she watches Kamiya pull out a pair of air tanks. "So those are what we're going to be using to expand?" Kari asks, expecting something more complex would be needed to expand a person.

Kamiya nods as she sets up the tanks. The ends of the tubes that come from each tank have a kind of suction cup on each end, presumably to keep the hose from being forced out. Kamiya brings one over to Kari. Kari happily opens her mouth and Kamiya gets the end secured to her mouth. The suction cup is transparent, so it doesn't obscure her face at all. "Ok, last chance to turn back, Kari. Are you ready?" Kamiya asks. Kari nods and 'mmmhums' around the hose. With that, Kamiya secures her own tube to her mouth and turns on the flow for both tanks at the exact same time and to the same rate.

Kari feels a tiny bit of discomfort for a moment before the pressure inside her causes her to start expanding outward. While expanding at the same rate, Kari's small body causes her to be relatively more expanded than Kamiya. Kari giggles around the hose as she feels her waistline swell out quickly, the rest of her following along with it. Her clothing stretches out along with her, and her skin tingles as it stretches further. Kari shuts her eyes and sighs as she starts to enjoy the feeling of her body starting to tingle all over.

Kamiya pats Kari as Kari grows to as wide as she is tall while Kamiya merely sports a three foot wide midsection. But Kamiya normally expands as wide as she is tall as well, so decides to keep Kari expanding along with her. Kari doesn't seem to mind at all, especially since it means her body will be stretched further, though Kari is slightly worried how Kamiya will stop the flow if she's not able to. However, her fears are put to ease as an auto-cutoff on each tank shuts off the moment it detects they've been filled with enough air to make them 5 feet wide. The hoses also become detached, allowing them to speak again.

Kamiya smiles as she rubs her daughter's surface. "Ah...seeing you like this reminds me of my first time, only I was twice as big...hehe, I was practically a big round ball with a head at that point." recalls Kamiya, as Kari wiggles her fingers and toes, which are just about all that stick out of her body besides her head, her shoes and socks having since fallen off. Her clothes have managed to remain intact, and look like they can take quite a bit more. "Of course, we're going to have to find you some clothes that will return to their shape once we deflate you...hrum...well, that is...IF you want to be deflated." Kamiya says, as she considers keeping Kari as a big inflated pet-girl. "But I'll leave that up to you."
13331.title: Mother + Daughter Bloating

choices: No smaller than the largest you've ever been.
133311.content:
Kari giggles, liking the sound of being able to remain inflated. "Hehe...now that you mention it, it's really nice to be like this, so I think I'll just stay inflated, then."

Kamiya smiles, and gives Kari a hug despite her puffiness, squishing against Kari in the process. "Don't worry, dear, I'll take good care of you, then. I just know you'll love life as a big, puffy girl."

"Mmmhum...so you did say if I wanted to be deflated...I'm just wondering how far you're going to be taking that." Kari asks, giggling a little.
133311.title: She decides to remain inflated.

choices: Kamiya already had that in mind
Kamiya needs to take care of Kari at a reasonable size.
1333112.content:
"It means just what I said. You won't be deflating at all, only inflating. I hope you don't mind, but it would be odd for a girl your age to grow shorter, right?" Kamiya asks, a smile on her face.

Kari nods, and looks like she's thrilled. "Ooh...that sounds like lots of fun! I wonder what it's going to be like, anyway?" she asks, still pleased with how large she is at this moment and more pleased that she's going to be much bigger in due time.

"Oh trust me, Kari, I've been there and loved it. You'll love it so much you'll only want to get bigger anyway." Kamiya explains.

Kari smiles. "So..why don't you stick with me, then? Wouldn't it be really nice to grow larger together?"
1333112.title: She's a Growing Girl

choices: Large enough to just barely fit within the city streets.
Large enough to just barely be as large as the city.
13331121.content:
Kamiya grins. "Ah, who said I wasn't? Do you really think I'd miss out on a chance to have some big fun with my daughter? I've actually been waiting for a chance to do something like this, and now that both you and me are together in this, I have nothing holding me back." she explains.

Kari giggles. "Yay, getting to do this with you makes it even better."

"Mmmhum, and we'll be able to keep each other company as well. After all, in the end everything is going to be absolutely tiny compared to us." says Kamiya.

Kari gives Kamiya a hug. "Hehehe...wow, this all sounds so wonderful, I can't wait to get started. So how are we going to inflate in the first place?"

"Ah, through a special talent you and I both possess. You see, once we puff up, from that point on we can inhale indefinitely, so all we do is just keep inhaling until we're as big as we want to be." explains Kamiya. "And since you're so eager to start, why don't you decide what a good stopping point would be for now?"*

With that, Kari grins, as she considers a couple of ideas that popped into her head.
13331121.title: Kamiya already had that in mind

choices: Take a break and show everyone how nice and big you are now!
Keep going, so you can REALLY show off your huge puffy bodies!
133311212.content:
"Ooooo...I feel like I just want to get absolutely huge and see where to go from there!" Kari exclaims, as she gently rubs her body against her mother's, followed shortly by Kamiya happily returning the favor. "Let's both swell up as big as the city!"

In agreement, Kamiya helps Kari squeeze outside and then guides her up to the roof. They hold each others hand and look at each other knowingly, before they begin to take the deepest breath they can possibly take. Together, the two of them begin to swell up rapidly, each growing a foot wider every second or so. Once they start to get large and light enough, the warm air helps gently lift the two in the air enough to keep them safely away from the city as they go for their massive goal. As they get larger, they find it easier to pull air into themselves, so what started seeming like it would take about a day ends up taking only a few hours.

---

"Oh wow, we really did it mom! We're both all puffy and city-sized!" Kari bumps into her mother excitedly, prompting Kamiya to gently rub her body against Kari's. They held on to each other in such away that they ended up face to face as they pressed their bodies together, despite their huge size.

"I'm glad you're enjoying being so massive and wide, because we've only just begun. We can take a break if you want, or we can start thinking of our next milestone...
133311212.title: Large enough to just barely be as large as the ...

choices: Swell up so big they permenantly orbit the planet....
Swell up so big they can be seen among the stars...
1333112122.content: On one hand, Kari really wanted to see just how big she and her mother could end up being. On the other hand, she wanted to make sure everyone would know she and Kamiya would be alive and well no matter how large they got. Kari got the impression from Kamiya suggesting they rest that she had the same idea, but Kari was starting to have a couple ideas of her own, something where they could grow huge and yet nobody would have to wonder long about what became of them...
1333112122.title: Being Seen by All.

13331121222.content:
"Ah, mom...do you think it would be possible to swell in such a way that no matter how far away we get from earth, everyone would be able to see us clearly? Because...I think I'd really like to see how much the two of us can swell...wouldn't that be so fun?" Kari gleefully smooshes against her mother as she says this, imagining the two of them swelling larger than anything and everything.

"Oh wow...if we could pull that off, we wouldn't even have to say goodbye...but unless we were more identifiable, nobody would be able to tell us apart from a large object in the sky...oooh, I think I have an idea. Let's try forcing air into our heads...if it works like I think it will, well, you'll see!" Kamiya tries to follow her own advice. As she does, Kari can see Kamiya's head suddenly bulge out until it's even with the surface of her body, once more allowing Kari to clearly see her mother's face regardless of distance. Kari giggles at her mother's funny appearance.

"Oooo! You're like a big human-shaped ball! Hehe, ok, okay, my turn!" Kari says, as she tries to repeat the process. For a moment, Kari winds up in more of a dumbbell shape with both her body and head inflated equally, but she soon settles into the same shape as Kamiya. "Whoo! I did it!" Kari and Kamiya nuzzle their faces together in celebration. "So...ready to go for it, mom?"

Kamiya gently smiles at her daughter. "Yes...in fact...let's get so big anyone can see us from anywhere, and I think I know the perfect place for us to aim for..." As she says this, Kamiya holds on to Kari's hand, and the both begin to swell up until they can no longer make themselves grow larger. Though by this point, the pressure difference guided them further along the way as they started to slowly drift away from the planet. "It'll take a long time, but I assure you once we get to where we're going, the whole universe will be able to watch us grow together..."

Kari giggles as they drift further away. "Oooooh...and we'll always be growing like this...I'm already getting excited!"

---

The pair found that the longer they spent drifting and growing, the more their existence became centered on the two of them. In time, Kari and Kamiya had only each other and their situation in mind, which they both found infinite amusement with, especially since they had each others company. Eventually, the two of them gently settled in the exact middle of the universe, with everyone in the universe able to watch them happily live together forever.
13331121222.title: Sphere-girls in Space

14.content: A stroll through the park?
14.title: Something else [1]?

choices: The oddly placed balloon factory (Now offers tours and demos.)
The bouncy magic shop (Why try. The joke is there.)
15.content:
Kari: "How about we go shopping?"

Gatomon: "For what? Is there something we need around the house?"

Kari: "No not really I just want to go out for a walk. Maybe find a nice new shop.

Gatomon: "Sounds great let's go."

Gatomon and Kari leave their house together and ahead off into the nearby shopping district where there are many, many stores but since it's early in the morning there isn't many people about. Kari looks around at the numerous stores that are open and says, "Where do you wanna go first Gatomon?"

Gatomon looks around and says, "I really don't care. I'm certain it'll be more fun if you pick Kari."
Kari, for a second considers telling Gatomon about her dream but decides to wait for a better moment to do so.

Kari takes one last look around and decide to go to the.....
15.title: Let's go shopping!

info.brief_description: It's an inflation story about Kari from Digimon. What are you expecting?
info.description:
This story contains Kari from Digimon, assorted other female characters from Digimon, and inflation. If any of those things make you jiggle uncomfortably, then you should probably back out and find somethin' else to read for your safety.

Edit: Holy crap, this story is 10 years old? Really? Wow. Well... happy 10th birthday, story!
